GP12garup1_u:4: oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /

GP12garup1_u:43: provāca sūraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavi nirṇayam // GarP_1,1.18 //

GP12garup1_u:83: kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /

GP12garup1_u:91: manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum /

GP12garup1_u:95: śṛṇu sūta / pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /

GP12garup1_u:101: ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam /
GP12garup1_u:104: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:107: kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā /
GP12garup1_u:108: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam // GarP_1,2.9 //
GP12garup1_u:111: tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,2.10 //
GP12garup1_u:112: pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara? /

GP12garup1_u:116: ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram // GarP_1,2.12 //
GP12garup1_u:120: tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham // GarP_1,2.14 //
GP12garup1_u:122: śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram // GarP_1,2.15 //
GP12garup1_u:124: yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca // GarP_1,2.16 //
GP12garup1_u:128: garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi // GarP_1,2.18 //
GP12garup1_u:130: gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu // GarP_1,2.19 //
GP12garup1_u:131: purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu /
GP12garup1_u:136: yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ // GarP_1,2.22 //
GP12garup1_u:137: candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /
GP12garup1_u:138: yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ // GarP_1,2.23 //
GP12garup1_u:140: yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu // GarP_1,2.24 //
GP12garup1_u:146: padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ // GarP_1,2.27 //
GP12garup1_u:148: sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca // GarP_1,2.28 //
GP12garup1_u:153: stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.30 //
GP12garup1_u:155: sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai // GarP_1,2.31 //
GP12garup1_u:157: yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:158: papraccha viṣṇuṃ devādyaiḥ śṛṇvatāmamaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.32 //
GP12garup1_u:162: ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ // GarP_1,2.33 //
GP12garup1_u:163: kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā /
GP12garup1_u:164: kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai // GarP_1,2.34 //
GP12garup1_u:174: śṛṇu rudra / pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.38 //
GP12garup1_u:176: ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.39 //
GP12garup1_u:179: niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ // GarP_1,2.40 //
GP12garup1_u:181: duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara / // GarP_1,2.41 //
GP12garup1_u:183: ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham // GarP_1,2.42 //
GP12garup1_u:186: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:187: sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,2.44 //
GP12garup1_u:193: ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham // GarP_1,2.46 //

GP12garup1_u:202: mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare /
GP12garup1_u:203: yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //
GP12garup1_u:208: yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,2.52 //

GP12garup1_u:230: iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ /

GP12garup1_u:243: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,3.7 //

GP12garup1_u:253: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana // GarP_1,4.1 //

GP12garup1_u:267: aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi /

GP12garup1_u:272: sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //
GP12garup1_u:273: apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara /

GP12garup1_u:282: ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,4.15 //

GP12garup1_u:298: utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm // GarP_1,4.22 //
GP12garup1_u:303: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā /

GP12garup1_u:308: jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai // GarP_1,4.27 //
GP12garup1_u:309: rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca /

GP12garup1_u:312: jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ // GarP_1,4.29 //
GP12garup1_u:314: svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān // GarP_1,4.30 //
GP12garup1_u:323: āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /

GP12garup1_u:326: mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām // GarP_1,4.36 //

GP12garup1_u:337: dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam /
GP12garup1_u:338: bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //
GP12garup1_u:346: tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:347: dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān // GarP_1,5.6 //
GP12garup1_u:349: bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām // GarP_1,5.7 //
GP12garup1_u:351: śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā // GarP_1,5.8 //
GP12garup1_u:352: tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup1_u:357: virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.11 //
GP12garup1_u:361: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //
GP12garup1_u:364: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:368: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:371: svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //
GP12garup1_u:373: phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ // GarP_1,5.19 //
GP12garup1_u:374: pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:375: te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ // GarP_1,5.20 //
GP12garup1_u:376: mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī /
GP12garup1_u:377: tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.21 //
GP12garup1_u:379: śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām // GarP_1,5.22 //
GP12garup1_u:383: devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau // GarP_1,5.24 //
GP12garup1_u:384: prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame /
GP12garup1_u:388: śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:391: khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // GarP_1,5.28 //
GP12garup1_u:392: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:393: bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ // GarP_1,5.29 //
GP12garup1_u:397: śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //
GP12garup1_u:399: medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //
GP12garup1_u:401: vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata // GarP_1,5.33 //
GP12garup1_u:403: kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //
GP12garup1_u:405: tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ // GarP_1,5.35 //
GP12garup1_u:406: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā /
GP12garup1_u:408: tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt /
GP12garup1_u:411: vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk /
GP12garup1_u:413: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:418: sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //
GP12garup1_u:422: divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.3 //
GP12garup1_u:431: tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,6.7 //
GP12garup1_u:433: puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau // GarP_1,6.8 //
GP12garup1_u:434: dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi /
GP12garup1_u:437: upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām // GarP_1,6.10 //
GP12garup1_u:439: sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // GarP_1,6.11 //
GP12garup1_u:442: prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa /
GP12garup1_u:445: nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //
GP12garup1_u:449: nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ // GarP_1,6.16 //
GP12garup1_u:451: śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara / // GarP_1,6.17 //
GP12garup1_u:452: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi /
GP12garup1_u:453: nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,6.18 //
GP12garup1_u:460: ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau /
GP12garup1_u:461: dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha // GarP_1,6.21 //
GP12garup1_u:463: pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā // GarP_1,6.22 //
GP12garup1_u:467: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām /
GP12garup1_u:470: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa /
GP12garup1_u:473: kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā // GarP_1,6.26 //
GP12garup1_u:478: lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ // GarP_1,6.28 //
GP12garup1_u:480: saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //
GP12garup1_u:482: pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.30 //
GP12garup1_u:489: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ // GarP_1,6.33 //
GP12garup1_u:493: apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.35 //
GP12garup1_u:494: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam /
GP12garup1_u:503: viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //
GP12garup1_u:504: vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:505: aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.41 //
GP12garup1_u:521: svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ // GarP_1,6.49 //
GP12garup1_u:522: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:523: svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // GarP_1,6.50 //
GP12garup1_u:525: vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā // GarP_1,6.51 //
GP12garup1_u:526: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:532: añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:535: śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike // GarP_1,6.56 //
GP12garup1_u:537: śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi // GarP_1,6.57 //
GP12garup1_u:548: gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:549: krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān // GarP_1,6.62 //
GP12garup1_u:557: īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā // GarP_1,6.66 //
GP12garup1_u:561: ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ // GarP_1,6.68 //
GP12garup1_u:567: dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ // GarP_1,6.71 //
GP12garup1_u:568: udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame /
GP12garup1_u:569: etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,6.72 //
GP12garup1_u:570: sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //
GP12garup1_u:571: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe uttānapādavaṃśādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:582: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:593: snānaṃ vastropavītañca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,7.4 //
GP12garup1_u:616: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:617: oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:618: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate pradyumnāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:619: oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:623: oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:624: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:625: oṃ kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:626: oṃ jaṃ khaṃ raṃ sudarśa nāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:627: oṃ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadaiyau namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:628: oṃ vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:629: oṃ ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:630: oṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ saṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:631: oṃ dhaṃ ṣaṃ vaṃ saṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:632: oṃ saṃ daṃ laṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:633: oṃ ṭhaṃ caṃ bhaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:638: viṣṇuśaktyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ pūjāṃ śṛṇu śubhapradām // GarP_1,7.7 //
GP12garup1_u:646: śraddhā ṛddhiḥ kalā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:647: oṃ hrīṅkārādyā namo 'ntāśca sarasvatyāśca śaktayaḥ // GarP_1,7.9 //
GP12garup1_u:653: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:662: teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,8.3 //
GP12garup1_u:665: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:666: pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //
GP12garup1_u:672: padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit // GarP_1,8.8 //
GP12garup1_u:674: dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //
GP12garup1_u:676: antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //
GP12garup1_u:678: dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale // GarP_1,8.11 //
GP12garup1_u:679: sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:681: hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:684: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim // GarP_1,8.14 //
GP12garup1_u:686: aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //
GP12garup1_u:688: tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,8.16 //
GP12garup1_u:689: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:695: dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam /
GP12garup1_u:705: ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt // GarP_1,9.6 //
GP12garup1_u:709: hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,9.8 //
GP12garup1_u:712: taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:715: guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:717: puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.11 //
GP12garup1_u:720: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:726: śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām /
GP12garup1_u:727: kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //
GP12garup1_u:729: catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam // GarP_1,10.2 //
GP12garup1_u:731: lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //
GP12garup1_u:733: oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.4 //
GP12garup1_u:736: oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.5 //
GP12garup1_u:737: oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.6 //
GP12garup1_u:738: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:745: yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet // GarP_1,11.2 //
GP12garup1_u:754: madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:757: padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet // GarP_1,11.8 //
GP12garup1_u:759: kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //
GP12garup1_u:760: tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā /

GP12garup1_u:762: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset /

GP12garup1_u:766: śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau /
GP12garup1_u:768: tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret /
GP12garup1_u:770: dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:781: manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ // GarP_1,11.20 //
GP12garup1_u:783: madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ // GarP_1,11.21 //
GP12garup1_u:785: dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //
GP12garup1_u:788: dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset /
GP12garup1_u:789: devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //
GP12garup1_u:795: añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī // GarP_1,11.27 //
GP12garup1_u:798: savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:799: tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ // GarP_1,11.29 //
GP12garup1_u:803: mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //
GP12garup1_u:805: navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā // GarP_1,11.32 //
GP12garup1_u:811: vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam // GarP_1,11.35 //
GP12garup1_u:813: nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ // GarP_1,11.36 //
GP12garup1_u:816: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam /
GP12garup1_u:817: ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam // GarP_1,11.38 //
GP12garup1_u:818: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā /
GP12garup1_u:819: ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet // GarP_1,11.39 //
GP12garup1_u:820: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:827: vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ // GarP_1,11.43 //
GP12garup1_u:829: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:834: oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ // GarP_1,12.1 //
GP12garup1_u:875_0: kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ
GP12garup1_u:875_1: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ
GP12garup1_u:875_2: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya
GP12garup1_u:875_3: iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye
GP12garup1_u:875_4: varuṇāya jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ
GP12garup1_u:875_5: īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya dhvajāya
GP12garup1_u:875_6: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye oṃ
GP12garup1_u:895: oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:900: evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,12.5 //
GP12garup1_u:901: arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:902: tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi // GarP_1,12.6 //
GP12garup1_u:904: pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit // GarP_1,12.7 //
GP12garup1_u:906: pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //
GP12garup1_u:911: vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet /
GP12garup1_u:914: gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ // GarP_1,12.12 //
GP12garup1_u:916: sudarśanaḥ śrīhariśca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ // GarP_1,12.13 //
GP12garup1_u:917: caturbhujo vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumna eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:926: oṃ mahācakrāya asurāntakṛt huṃ phaṭ oṃ huṃ sahasrāra huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,12.16 //
GP12garup1_u:928: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:933: namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam // GarP_1,13.1 //
GP12garup1_u:936: gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te // GarP_1,13.2 //
GP12garup1_u:942: musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām // GarP_1,13.4 //
GP12garup1_u:949: pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara /
GP12garup1_u:950: candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā // GarP_1,13.7 //
GP12garup1_u:951: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin /
GP12garup1_u:953: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:956: viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale // GarP_1,13.10 //
GP12garup1_u:959: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama /
GP12garup1_u:960: etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //
GP12garup1_u:965: iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:970: dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,14.1 //
GP12garup1_u:976: ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ // GarP_1,14.4 //
GP12garup1_u:978: mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.5 //
GP12garup1_u:980: boddhā buddhisthitaḥ sākṣī sarvajño buddhivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.6 //
GP12garup1_u:988: mukto buddho 'jaro vyāpī satya ātmāsmyahaṃ śivaḥ // GarP_1,14.10 //
GP12garup1_u:989: evaṃ ye mānavā vijñā dhyāyantīśaṃ paraṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:990: prāpnuyuste ca tadrūpaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,14.11 //
GP12garup1_u:991: iti dhyānaṃ samākhyātaṃ tava śaṅkara suvrata /
GP12garup1_u:992: paṭhedya etatsatataṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,14.12 //
GP12garup1_u:993: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dhyānayogo nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:998: narastanme paraṃ japyaṃ pathaya tvaṃ janārdana // GarP_1,15.1 //
GP12garup1_u:1002: yatpa vitraṃ paraṃ japyaṃ kathayāmi vṛṣadhvaja / /
GP12garup1_u:1005: bālacandra nibho bālo balabhadro balādhipaḥ // GarP_1,15.4 //
GP12garup1_u:1013: ātmā ca paramātmā ca pratyagātmā viyatparaḥ // GarP_1,15.7 //
GP12garup1_u:1019: apāraḥ paramārthaśca parāṇāṃ ca paraḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:1025: sarveśaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvaḥ sarvavitsarvadaḥ suraḥ // GarP_1,15.12 //
GP12garup1_u:1026: sarvasya jagato dhāma sarvadarśo ca sarvabhṛt (80) /
GP12garup1_u:1029: sarvasya jagato mūlaṃ sakalo niṣkalo 'nalaḥ (90) // GarP_1,15.14 //

GP12garup1_u:1059: latānāṃ ca patiścaiva vīrudhāṃ ca patistathā // GarP_1,15.27 //
GP12garup1_u:1061: patiścandramasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sukrasya patireva ca // GarP_1,15.28 //

GP12garup1_u:1070: merurmātā pramāṇaṃ ca mādhavo malavarjitaḥ // GarP_1,15.32 //
GP12garup1_u:1072: mahāśānto mahābhāgo madhusūdana eva ca // GarP_1,15.33 //
GP12garup1_u:1074: māyātmā māyayā baddho māyayā tu vivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,15.34 //
GP12garup1_u:1090: patiḥ śanaiścarasyaiva rāhoḥ ketoḥ patistathā // GarP_1,15.40 //
GP12garup1_u:1109: suparṇo ca mahāparṇo suparṇasya ca kāraṇ(290) /
GP12garup1_u:1112: buddhīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva kāraṇaṃ manasastathā // GarP_1,15.49 //
GP12garup1_u:1115: bhūtānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tadvatkāraṇaṃ ca vibhāvasoḥ // GarP_1,15.50 //
GP12garup1_u:1117: aṇḍasya kāraṇaṃ caiva prakṛteḥ kāraṇaṃ tathā // GarP_1,15.51 //
GP12garup1_u:1121: jihvāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva prāṇasyaiva ca kāraṇam /

GP12garup1_u:1124: indrasya kāraṇaṃ caiva kuberasya ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,15.54 //
GP12garup1_u:1127: yakṣāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva rakṣasāṃ kāraṇaṃ param // GarP_1,15.55 //
GP12garup1_u:1128: nṛpāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dharṃmasyaiva tu kāraṇam /

GP12garup1_u:1130: manūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva pakṣiṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:1133: siddhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva yakṣāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:1136: nadānāṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva nadīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ param /

GP12garup1_u:1143: dehātmā cendriyātmā ca ātmā buddhistathaiva ca /

GP12garup1_u:1148: pṛthivyāḥ paramātmā ca rasasyātmā tathaiva ca /

GP12garup1_u:1152: śrotrātmā ca tvagātmā ca jihvāyāḥ paramastathā // GarP_1,15.65 //
GP12garup1_u:1160: yatnavāṃśca tathā yatnaścarṃmo khaḍgī murāntakaḥ // GarP_1,15.68 //
GP12garup1_u:1163: yogī ca yogidhyeyo hariḥ śitiḥ // GarP_1,15.69 //
GP12garup1_u:1164: saṃvinmedhā ca kālaśca ūṣmā varṣā ma(na) tistathā(410) /
GP12garup1_u:1167: saṃvartaḥ kālakartā ca gautamo bhṛguraṅgirāḥ (420) // GarP_1,15.71 //
GP12garup1_u:1168: atnirvasiṣṭhaḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kutsa eva ca /

GP12garup1_u:1174: apānasya patiścaiva vyānasya patireva ca // GarP_1,15.74 //
GP12garup1_u:1176: śabdasya ca patiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sparśasya patireva ca // GarP_1,15.75 //

GP12garup1_u:1214: śaraṇyaścaiva nityaśca buddho muktaḥ śarīrabhṛt // GarP_1,15.90 //
GP12garup1_u:1221: narakasya nihantā ca triśīrṣasya vināśanaḥ (570) // GarP_1,15.93 //

GP12garup1_u:1227: udānaśca samānaśca bheṣajaṃ ca bhiṣak tathā // GarP_1,15.96 //
GP12garup1_u:1232: prabodhena vihīnaśca buddhyā caiva vi varjitaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:1254: tvacā na gamyaḥ kūrṃmaśca jihvāgrāhyastathaiva ca /

GP12garup1_u:1320: vākstho vaktā ca vaktavyo vacanaṃ vāṅniyāmakaḥ // GarP_1,15.136 //

GP12garup1_u:1353: vijñānaṃ vedyarūpaṃ ca jīvo jīvayitā tathā (950) // GarP_1,15.150 //

GP12garup1_u:1408: oṃ sahasraraśmaye ṭhaṭha kavacāya namaḥ // GarP_1,16.11 //
GP12garup1_u:1410: oṃ jvalajvala prajvalaprajvala ṭhaṭha namaḥ // GarP_1,16.12 //

GP12garup1_u:1534: pādāṅguṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe pādapṛṣṭhe gulphe jānuni liṅgake // GarP_1,19.10 //

GP12garup1_u:1549: gṛhe vivikhitā yatra tannāgāḥ saṃtyajanti ca /

GP12garup1_u:1554: evañcāṣṭadale padma dale varṇayugaṃ likhet // GarP_1,19.19 //
GP12garup1_u:1558: ke (kai) vakkre hṛdi liṅge ca pādayorgaruḍasya hi // GarP_1,19.21 //

GP12garup1_u:1565: a ā nyasettu pādāgre i ī gulaphe 'tha jānuni /

GP12garup1_u:1568: haṃso viṣādi ca harejjapto dhyāto 'tha pūjitaḥ // GarP_1,19.25 //
GP12garup1_u:1573: sa vāyunā samākṛṣya daṣṭānāṃ garalaṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:1579: viṣamṛddhiṃ na vrajecca uṣṇaṃ pibati yo ghṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:1580: pañcāṅgaṃ tu śirīṣasya mūlaṃ gṛñjanajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,19.31 //

GP12garup1_u:1594: pāśaṃ dhanuśca cakraṃ ca mudraraṃ śūlapaṭṭiśam // GarP_1,20.1 //
GP12garup1_u:1596: mantroddhāraḥ padmapātre ādi pūrvādike likhet // GarP_1,20.2 //
GP12garup1_u:1598: oṃ kāro brahma bījaṃ syāddhrīṅkāro viṣṇureva ca // GarP_1,20.3 //
GP12garup1_u:1599: hrīṅkā raśca śivaḥ śūle triśākhe tu kramānnyaset /
GP12garup1_u:1602: taddarśanāndrahā nāgā dṛṣṭvā vā nāśamāpnu yuḥ // GarP_1,20.5 //
GP12garup1_u:1603: dhūmārakte karaṃ madhye dhyātvā khe cintayennaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:1604: duṣṭā nāgā grahā meghā vinaśyanti ca rākṣasāḥ // GarP_1,20.6 //
GP12garup1_u:1606: oṃ jūṃ sūṃ hūṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,20.7 //
GP12garup1_u:1617: rākṣasā bhūtaḍākinyaḥ pradravanti diśo daśa // GarP_1,20.12 //
GP12garup1_u:1620: oṃ aiṃ brahayaintrai lokyaḍāmarāya namaḥ // GarP_1,20.13 //
GP12garup1_u:1625: viṣa śatrugaṇā bhūtā naśyante vajramudrayā // GarP_1,20.15 //
GP12garup1_u:1630: dhyātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca dahecchedakāstreṇa vai jagat /
GP12garup1_u:1644: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣādiharamantrabṛndanirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:1649: oṃ bhūrviṣṇave ādibhūtāya sarvādhārāya mūrtaye svāhā // GarP_1,21.1 //

GP12garup1_u:2107: tatra pūrvoktarūpaṃ tu bhāvayitvā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,31.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2109: āvāhya pūjayetsarvā devatā āsanasya yāḥ // GarP_1,31.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2155: anena vidhinā rudra sarvapāpaharaṃ param // GarP_1,31.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2156: yathātmani tathā deve nyāsaṃ kurvīta cāditaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2159: gandhapuṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ dadyāccaruṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,31.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2161: aṅgādīnāṃ svamantraiśca pūjāṃ kurvīta sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,31.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2215: viṣṇave devadevāya namo vai prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.24 //
GP12garup1_u:2218: devānāṃ prabhave caiva yajñānāṃ prabhave namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2219: munīnāṃ prabhave nityaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇave // GarP_1,31.26 //
GP12garup1_u:2227: elaṃ tu pūjayedviṣṇuṃ mūlamantreṇa śaṅkara // GarP_1,31.30 //
GP12garup1_u:2228: mūlamantraṃ japedvāpi yaḥ sa yāti naro harim /
GP12garup1_u:2233: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjāvidhirnāmaikatriṃśodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2238: yena vijñānamātreṇa naro yāti paraṃ padam // GarP_1,32.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2241: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ divyaṃ rahasyaṃ kāmadaṃ param // GarP_1,32.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2243: eka evāvyayaḥ śāntaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,32.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2245: sa eva māyāyā deva pañcadhā saṃsthito hariḥ // GarP_1,32.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2259: vidhinā yena kartavyaṃ yairvā mantraiśca śaṅkara / // GarP_1,32.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2260: ādau snānaṃ prakurvīta snātvā sandhyāṃ samācaret /
GP12garup1_u:2263: śoṣaṇādi tataḥ kuryād aṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti mantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,32.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2268: ātmano hṛdi padme tu dhyāyettu parameśvaram /
GP12garup1_u:2273: vyāpakaṃ mūlamantreṇa cāṅganyāsaṃ tataḥ param // GarP_1,32.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2299: oṃ vaṃ vāsudevāya parabrahmaṇe śivāya tejorūpāya vyāpine sarvadevādhidevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2322: pūjā caiva prakartavyā maṇḍale svastikādike // GarP_1,32.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2324: aṅganyāsaṃ ca kṛtvā tu mudrāḥ sarvāḥ pradaśayat /
GP12garup1_u:2325: ātmānaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca dhyātvā caiva pareśvaram // GarP_1,32.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2327: dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,32.21 //
GP12garup1_u:2337: indrādayo lokapālāḥ pūjyāḥ pūrvādiṣu sthitāḥ // GarP_1,32.26 //
GP12garup1_u:2338: adho nāga tadūddhva tu brahmāṇaṃ pūjayetsudhīḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2339: iti sthānakramo jñeyo maṇḍale śaṅkara tvayā // GarP_1,32.27 //
GP12garup1_u:2340: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ kṛtvā nyāsaṃ tu tasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:2342: snānaṃ vastraṃ tathācāmaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
GP12garup1_u:2344: kuryācchaṅkara mūlena japaṃ cāpi samarpayet // GarP_1,32.29 //
GP12garup1_u:2346: oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ sakarṣaṇāya ca // GarP_1,32.30 //
GP12garup1_u:2348: namo nārāyaṇāyaiva narāyaṇāṃ pataye namaḥ // GarP_1,32.31 //
GP12garup1_u:2352: mano vai vedavedyāya śaṅkhacakradharāya ca // GarP_1,32.33 //
GP12garup1_u:2360: tvadanyo nāsti deveśa nāsti trātā jagatprabho // GarP_1,32.37 //
GP12garup1_u:2361: tvāmava sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ gato 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2364: anyaiścavādakeḥ stātraiḥ stutvā vai nīlalohita // GarP_1,32.39 //
GP12garup1_u:2369: idaṃ ca yaḥ paṭhedrudra pañcatattvārcanaṃ naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2371: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcatattvā(viṣṇavar)
GP12garup1_u:2377: graharogādikaṃ sarvaṃ yatkṛtvā nāśameti vai // GarP_1,33.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2380: snānamādau prakurvīta pūjayecca hariṃ tata // GarP_1,33.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2382: sahasrāraṃ huṃ phaṭ namo mantraḥ praṇavapūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,33.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2384: dhyāyetmudarśanaṃ devaṃ hṛdi padme 'male śubhe // GarP_1,33.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2386: āvāhya maṇḍale devaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā hara // GarP_1,33.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2399: ugrāya caiva saumyāya caṇḍāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2401: māyāpañjarabhetre ca śivāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2403: kālāya mṛtyave caiva bhīmāya ca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,33.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2405: viṣṇurūpāya śāntāya cāyudhānāṃ dharāya ca // GarP_1,33.14 //
GP12garup1_u:2407: iti stotraṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ cakrasya tava kīrtitam // GarP_1,33.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2408: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:2410: sa pāpaṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā viṣṇulokāya kalpate // GarP_1,33.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2411: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sudarśanapūjāvidhirnāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2416: śṛṇvato nāsti tṛptirme gadatastava pūjanam // GarP_1,34.1 //
GP12garup1_u:2419: tacchṛṇuṣva jagannātho yena viṣṇuḥ pratuṣyati // GarP_1,34.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2421: pravakṣyāmi paraṃ puṇyaṃ tadādau śṛṇu śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2422: oṃ saiṃ kṣaiṃ śirase namaḥ iti praṇavasaṃyutaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2426: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase svāhāśiraḥ proktaṃ kṣūṃ vaṣaṭ tathā // GarP_1,34.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2427: oṃ kārayuktā devasya śikhā jñeyā vṛṣadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:2428: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya huṃ vai kavacaṃ parikīrtitam // GarP_1,34.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2429: oṃ kṣaiṃ netratrayāya vauṣaṭ netraṃ devasya kīrtitam /
GP12garup1_u:2430: oṃ haḥ astrāya phaṭ astraṃ devasya kīrtitam // GarP_1,34.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2431: pūjāvidhiṃ pravakṣyāmi nanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu ādau snātvā tathācamya tato yāgagṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,34.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2433: yaṃ kṣaiṃ ramiti bījaiśca kaṭhinīkṛtya lamiti // GarP_1,34.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2434: aṇḍamutpādya ca tataḥ oṃ kāreṇaiva bhedayet /
GP12garup1_u:2438: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ dhārayantaṃ caturbhujam // GarP_1,34.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2440: sucakraṃ sukapolaṃ ca ṣītāmbaradharaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,34.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2442: aṅgamantraistato nyāsaṃ mūlamantreṇa vai tathā // GarP_1,34.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2446: oṃ hayagrīvāsanasya āgacchata ca devatāḥ // GarP_1,34.15 //
GP12garup1_u:2448: dvāre dhāturvidhātuśca pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.16 //
GP12garup1_u:2450: asya madhyer'canaṃ kāryaṃ dvāre gaṅgāñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2452: garuḍaṃ pūjayedagre madhye śaktiñca pūjayet // GarP_1,34.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2459: kandaṃ nālaṃ ca padmaṃ ca madhye caiva prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.21 //
GP12garup1_u:2463: prahvī satyā tatheśānānugrahau śaktayo hyamūḥ // GarP_1,34.23 //
GP12garup1_u:2470: kartavyaṃ vidhinānena iti te hara kīrtitam /
GP12garup1_u:2483: tato hyācamanaṃ dadyādupavītaṃ tataḥ śubham // GarP_1,34.33 //
GP12garup1_u:2485: dhyātvā pādyādikaṃ bhūyo dadyāddevāya śaṅkara // GarP_1,34.34 //
GP12garup1_u:2487: oṃ kṣāṃ hṛdayāya namaḥ anena hṛdayaṃ yajet // GarP_1,34.35 //
GP12garup1_u:2488: oṃ kṣīṃ śirase namaśca śirasaḥ pūjanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:2489: oṃ kṣūṃ śikhāyai namaśca śikhāmetena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.36 //
GP12garup1_u:2490: oṃ kṣaiṃ kavacāya namaḥ kavacaṃ paripūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:2491: oṃ kṣaiṃ netrāya namaśca netraṃ cānena pūjayet // GarP_1,34.37 //
GP12garup1_u:2492: oṃ kṣaḥ astrāya nama iti astraṃ cānena pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:2493: hṛdayaṃ ca śiraścaiva śikhāṃ ca kavacaṃ tathā // GarP_1,34.38 //
GP12garup1_u:2495: koṇeṣvastraṃ yajedrudra netraṃ madhyai prapūjayet // GarP_1,34.39 //
GP12garup1_u:2497: śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ tathā cakraṃ gadāṃ pūrvāditor'cayet // GarP_1,34.40 //
GP12garup1_u:2498: khaḍgaṃ ca musalaṃ pāśamaṅkuśaṃ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2500: śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ tathā pītāmbaraṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:2502: brahmāṇaṃ nāradaṃ siddhaṃ guruṃ paraguruṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:2505: agniṃ yamaṃ nirṛtiṃ ca varuṇaṃ vāyumeva ca // GarP_1,34.44 //
GP12garup1_u:2508: vajraṃ śaktiṃ tathā daṇḍaṃ khaṅgaṃ pāśaṃ dhvajaṃ gadām /
GP12garup1_u:2509: triśūlaṃ cakrapadme ca āyudhānyatha pūjayet // GarP_1,34.46 //
GP12garup1_u:2513: devasya mūlamantreṇa pūjā kāryā vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,34.48 //
GP12garup1_u:2514: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ naivedyameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2515: pradakṣiṇaṃ namaskāraṃ japyaṃ tasmai samarpayet // GarP_1,34.49 //
GP12garup1_u:2517: oṃ namo hayaśirase vidyādhyakṣāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,34.50 //
GP12garup1_u:2519: namaḥ śāntāya devāya triguṇāyātmane namaḥ // GarP_1,34.51 //
GP12garup1_u:2523: nama ādyāya dāntāya sarvasattvahitāya ca // GarP_1,34.53 //
GP12garup1_u:2525: kartre hartre sureśāya sarvagāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,34.54 //
GP12garup1_u:2530: iti te kathitā pūjā hayagrīvasya śaṅkara /
GP12garup1_u:2531: yaḥ paṭhetparayā bhaktyā sa gacchetparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,34.57 //
GP12garup1_u:2532: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hayagrīvapūjāvidhirnāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2541: evaṃ jñātvā tu gāyattrīṃ japeddvādaśalakṣakam // GarP_1,35.3 //
GP12garup1_u:2543: jepa ca tripadā groktā arcane ca catuṣpadā // GarP_1,35.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2544: nyāse jape tathā dhyāne agnikārye tathārcane /
GP12garup1_u:2547: ūrvorguhye ca vṛṣaṇe nāḍyāṃ nābhau tanūdare // GarP_1,35.6 //
GP12garup1_u:2549: netre bhuvārlalāṭe ca pūrvasyāṃ dakṣiṇottare // GarP_1,35.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2551: indranīlaṃ ca vahniṃ ca pītaṃ śyāmaṃ ca kāpilam // GarP_1,35.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2552: śvetaṃ vidyutprabhaṃ tāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ krameṇa tat /
GP12garup1_u:2553: śyāmaṃ śuklaṃ tathā pītaṃ śvetaṃ vai padmarāgavat // GarP_1,35.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2555: arkavarṇasamaṃ saumyaṃ śaṅkhābhaṃ śvetameva ca // GarP_1,35.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2557: pūtaṃ bhavati tatsarvaṃ gāyattryā na paraṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,35.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2558: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gāyattrīnyāsanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2565: triḥ paṭhedāyatapraṇaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,36.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2569: āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne upaspṛśya yathāvidhi // GarP_1,36.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2571: praṇavena tu saṃyuktaṃ kṣipedvāri padepade // GarP_1,36.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2574: samuddhṛtyodakaṃ pāṇau japtvā ca drupadāṃ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:2577: divā rātrau ca yatpāpaṃ sarvaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt // GarP_1,36.8 //
GP12garup1_u:2581: triyugaṃ tu sahasreṇa gāyattrī hanti duṣkṛtam // GarP_1,36.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2584: oṃ bhūrvinyasya hṛdaye oṃ bhuvaḥ śirasi nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:2585: oṃ svariti śikhāyāṃ ca gāyattryāḥ prathamaṃ padam // GarP_1,36.12 //
GP12garup1_u:2594: taṃ hanti sūryaḥ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:2595: turīyasya padasyāpi ṛṣirnirmala eva ca // GarP_1,36.17 //
GP12garup1_u:2596: chandastu devī gāyattrī paramātmā ca devatā // GarP_1,36.18 //
GP12garup1_u:2597: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saṃdhyāvidhirnāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2601: gāyattrī paramā devī bhuktimuktipradā ca tām /
GP12garup1_u:2604: aṣṭottaraṃ sahasraṃ vā athavāṣṭaśataṃ japet // GarP_1,37.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2610: vedamātre ca sāṃkṛtyai brahmāṇī kauśikī kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:2611: sādhvyai sarvārthasādhinyai sahasrākṣyai ca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_1,37.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2618: uttare śikhare jātā bhūmyāṃ parvata vāsinī /
GP12garup1_u:2619: brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi yathāsukham // GarP_1,37.9 //
GP12garup1_u:2620: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gāyattrīkalpanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2624: navamyādau yajeddurgāṃ hrīṃ durge rakṣiṇīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:2627: gaurī kālī umā durgā bhadrā kāntiḥ sarasvatī // GarP_1,38.2 //
GP12garup1_u:2628: maṅgalā vijayā lakṣmīḥ śivā nārāyaṇī kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:2631: dhanurdhvajaṃ ḍamarukaṃ paraśuṃ pāśameva ca // GarP_1,38.4 //
GP12garup1_u:2633: vajra cakraṃ śalākāṃ ca aṣṭādaśabhujāṃ smaret // GarP_1,38.5 //
GP12garup1_u:2635_0: oṃ namo bhagavati cāmuṇḍe śmaśānavāsini kapālahaste mahāpretasamārūḍhe mahāvimānamālākule
GP12garup1_u:2635_1: kālarātri bahugaṇaparivṛte mahāmukhe bahubhuje sughaṇṭāḍamarukiṅkiṇīke aṭṭāṭṭahāse
GP12garup1_u:2635_2: kilikili huṃ sarvanādaśabdabahule gajacarmaprāvṛtaśarīre rudhiramāṃsadigdhe lolagrajihve
GP12garup1_u:2635_4: karālanetre hilihili lalajjihve hraiṃ hrīṃ bhṛkuṭimukhi oṃ kārabhadrāsane kapālamālāveṣṭite
GP12garup1_u:2635_5: jaṭāmukuṭaśaśāṅkadhāriṇi aṭṭāṭṭahāse kilikili huṃhuṃ daṃṣṭrāghorāndhakāriṇi sarvavighnavināśini
GP12garup1_u:2635_6: idaṃ karma sādhaya sādhaya śīghraṃ kurukuru kahakaha aṅkuśe samanupraveśaya vargaṃvargaṃ (vaṅgavaṅga)
GP12garup1_u:2636_0: kampayakampaya calacala cālayacālaya rudhiramāṃsamadyapriye hanahana kuṭṭakuṭṭa chindachinda
GP12garup1_u:2636_1: mārayamāraya anubūma anubūma vajraśarīraṃ sādhayasādhaya trailokyagatamapi duṣṭamaduṣṭaṃ
GP12garup1_u:2636_2: vā gṛhītamagṛhītam āveśaya āveśaya krāmayakramaya nṛtyanṛtya bandhabandha valgavalga
GP12garup1_u:2636_3: koṭarākṣi urdhvakeśi ulūkavadane karakiṅkiṇi karaṅkamālādhāriṇi dahadaha pacapaca
GP12garup1_u:2636_4: gṛhṇagahṇa maṇḍalamadhye praveśayapraveśaya kiṃ vilambasi brahmasatyena viṣṇusatyena
GP12garup1_u:2636_5: ṛṣisatyena rudrasatyena āveśaya āveśaya kilikili khilikhili milimili cilicili vikṛtarūpadhāriṇi
GP12garup1_u:2636_6: kṛṣṇabhujaṅga veṣṭitaśarīra sarvagrahāveśini pralambhoṣṭhi bhrūmagnanāsike vikaṭamukhi
GP12garup1_u:2636_7: kapilajaṭe brāhmi bhañjabhañja jvalajvala kālamukhi khalakhala kharakharaḥ pātayapā
GP12garup1_u:2636_8: taya raktākṣi dhūrṇāpayadhūrṇāpaya bhūmiṃ pātayapātaya śiro gṛhṇagṛhṇa cakṣurmolayamīlaya
GP12garup1_u:2636_9: bhañjabhañja pādau gṛhṇagṛhṇa mudrāṃ sphoṭayasphoṭaya huṃ hūṃ phaṭ vidāraya vidāraya
GP12garup1_u:2636_10: triśūlena bhedayabhedaya vajreṇa hanahana daṇḍena tāḍayatāḍaya cekraṇa chedayachedaya
