GP12garup1_u:3239: gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3240: pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //
GP12garup1_u:3241: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3245: prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:3255: atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam /
GP12garup1_u:3256: tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,47.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3260: caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3265: liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet // GarP_1,47.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3270: nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu /
GP12garup1_u:3279: traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ // GarP_1,47.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3281: nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ // GarP_1,47.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3282: garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha /
GP12garup1_u:3283: sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ // GarP_1,47.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3284: prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3289: etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ // GarP_1,47.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3295: valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //
GP12garup1_u:3296: vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:3297: uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,47.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3299: mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā // GarP_1,47.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3301: gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ // GarP_1,47.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3305: vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3308: yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu /
GP12garup1_u:3309: rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3317: prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā // GarP_1,47.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3323: kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3327: prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām // GarP_1,47.42 //
GP12garup1_u:3334: prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi // GarP_1,47.45 //
GP12garup1_u:3340: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3345: sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3347: svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3350: mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet /
GP12garup1_u:3353: dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,48.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3359: śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret // GarP_1,48.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3361: dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike // GarP_1,48.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3365: pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3367: agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3372: yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:3373: vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā // GarP_1,48.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3374: uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā /
GP12garup1_u:3375: bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3377: pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca // GarP_1,48.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3380: kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike /
GP12garup1_u:3383: dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // GarP_1,48.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3385: asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā // GarP_1,48.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3390: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3400: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:3401: aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm // GarP_1,48.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3407: vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu // GarP_1,48.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3410: ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:3413: kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.35 //
GP12garup1_u:3418: kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3426: lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //
GP12garup1_u:3432: sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī // GarP_1,48.44 //
GP12garup1_u:3433: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3438: ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām // GarP_1,48.47 //
GP12garup1_u:3440: kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.48 //
GP12garup1_u:3442: tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3444: snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,48.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3446: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā // GarP_1,48.51 //
GP12garup1_u:3448: tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.52 //
GP12garup1_u:3450: gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3455: sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:3458: yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet // GarP_1,48.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3460: kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //
GP12garup1_u:3464: vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet // GarP_1,48.60 //
GP12garup1_u:3465: rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam /
GP12garup1_u:3466: brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //
GP12garup1_u:3468: bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3470: nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3472: tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā // GarP_1,48.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3474: astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet // GarP_1,48.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3476: pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,48.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3477: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:3480: dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,48.68 //
GP12garup1_u:3486: agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit // GarP_1,48.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3488: pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim // GarP_1,48.72 //
GP12garup1_u:3496: pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā // GarP_1,48.76 //
GP12garup1_u:3498: purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //
GP12garup1_u:3502: niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3503: bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3504: tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,48.80 //
GP12garup1_u:3506: paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.81 //
GP12garup1_u:3510: evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.83 //
GP12garup1_u:3516: caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,48.86 //
GP12garup1_u:3517: agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī /
GP12garup1_u:3526: lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //
GP12garup1_u:3527: na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet /
GP12garup1_u:3528: īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //
GP12garup1_u:3530: oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,48.93 //
GP12garup1_u:3531: devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3536: arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,48.96 //
GP12garup1_u:3538: ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,48.97 //
GP12garup1_u:3540: āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,48.98 //
GP12garup1_u:3544: mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //
GP12garup1_u:3548: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3554: viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa / vai śṛṇu // GarP_1,49.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3561: bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3570: kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet // GarP_1,49.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3572: ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ // GarP_1,49.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3578: sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3580: jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3582: samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3583: bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3584: samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ // GarP_1,49.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3587: yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca /
GP12garup1_u:3589: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā /
GP12garup1_u:3590: tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī // GarP_1,49.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3592: pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // GarP_1,49.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3597: satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3601: prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // GarP_1,49.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3606: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām /
GP12garup1_u:3607: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām // GarP_1,49.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3609: ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ // GarP_1,49.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3613: yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3621: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3625: brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,49.36 //
GP12garup1_u:3627: ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3635: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3640: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3642: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,50.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3644: prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ // GarP_1,50.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3646: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3649: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam /
GP12garup1_u:3650: prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,50.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3651: na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3652: home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,50.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3654: ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,50.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3657: brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3659: gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:3665: apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane /
GP12garup1_u:3670: saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3674: prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3676: yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā // GarP_1,50.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3678: dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ // GarP_1,50.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3684: yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3696: tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam // GarP_1,50.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3703: ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ // GarP_1,50.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3705: vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam // GarP_1,50.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3707: guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret // GarP_1,50.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3716: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca /
GP12garup1_u:3719: mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari // GarP_1,50.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3720: adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3730: tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3737: drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,50.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3739: apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte // GarP_1,50.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3745: haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,50.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3746: anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet /
GP12garup1_u:3750: kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:3752: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3753: pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau // GarP_1,50.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3761: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata /
GP12garup1_u:3762: niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ // GarP_1,50.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3764: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3766: pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3767: āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3768: dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3770: narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam // GarP_1,50.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3772: tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //
GP12garup1_u:3777: mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret // GarP_1,50.69 //
GP12garup1_u:3779: kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret // GarP_1,50.70 //
GP12garup1_u:3780: vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3781: bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ // GarP_1,50.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3789: manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,50.75 //
GP12garup1_u:3797: akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3798: bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:3803: aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā // GarP_1,50.82 //
GP12garup1_u:3810: śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam /
GP12garup1_u:3812: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3823: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam // GarP_1,51.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3825: anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,51.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3826: yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare /
GP12garup1_u:3831: cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam // GarP_1,51.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3833: dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,51.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3834: bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:3835: vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,51.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3838: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca /
GP12garup1_u:3841: prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3844: dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3845: ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3849: yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,51.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3855: bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam // GarP_1,51.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3857: akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam // GarP_1,51.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3863: anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam // GarP_1,51.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3865: dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3873: yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe // GarP_1,51.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3875: ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,51.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3877: prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3883: mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,51.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3884: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3889: brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,52.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3892: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:3893: kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3894: jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam /
GP12garup1_u:3895: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3896: dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup1_u:3897: aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3901: setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,52.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3903: surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,52.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3905: suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ // GarP_1,52.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3910: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3911: patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3915: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3917: amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam // GarP_1,52.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3923: snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3936: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā /
GP12garup1_u:3937: na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3941: ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ // GarP_1,52.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3942: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3957: dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3958: dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3959: makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau /
GP12garup1_u:3965: rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3966: stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca /
GP12garup1_u:3967: pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3971: ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3977: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3982: medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3986: vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,54.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3988: jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale // GarP_1,54.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3990: kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // GarP_1,54.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3999: nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4000: plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,54.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4004: ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4006: nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara // GarP_1,54.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4007: tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī /
GP12garup1_u:4012: pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4017: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4038: vedasmṛtir narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā // GarP_1,55.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4039: tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4042: ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī // GarP_1,55.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4043: vidarbhā ca śatadrūśca nadyaḥ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4044: āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ // GarP_1,55.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4057: strīrājyāḥ saindhavā mlecchā nāsti kā yavanāstathā /
GP12garup1_u:4058: paścimena ca vijñeyā māthurā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // GarP_1,55.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4066: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4072: sukhodayastathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:4073: dhruvaśca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te // GarP_1,56.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4075: somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo baibhrājaścātra saptamaḥ // GarP_1,56.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4076: anutaptā śikhī caiva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4077: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāstatra nimnagāḥ // GarP_1,56.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4083: yonitoyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī // GarP_1,56.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4085: jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ śṛṇuṣvatān // GarP_1,56.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4097: gaurī kumudvatī caiva sandhyā rātrirmanojavā // GarP_1,56.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4102: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā /
GP12garup1_u:4103: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā // GarP_1,56.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4107: tāvaccaiva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // GarP_1,56.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4113: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4119: atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat /
GP12garup1_u:4120: mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam // GarP_1,57.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4122: bhūyastatra daiteyā vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ // GarP_1,57.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4123: raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tāñchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:4126: rudhirākhyo vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibho janaḥ // GarP_1,57.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4128: tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālastvadhaḥ śirāḥ // GarP_1,57.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4137: aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,57.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4138: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4143: yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava // GarP_1,58.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4153: dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale // GarP_1,58.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4161: hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ // GarP_1,58.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4166: pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai // GarP_1,58.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4170: suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // GarP_1,58.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4183: viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune // GarP_1,58.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4185: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ // GarP_1,58.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4196: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān // GarP_1,58.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4202: svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham // GarP_1,58.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4204: tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ // GarP_1,58.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4207: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4213: caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ // GarP_1,59.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4220: sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,59.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4227: vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4228: tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4234: pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā // GarP_1,59.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4236: saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare // GarP_1,59.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4239: dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4242: puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4244: aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū // GarP_1,59.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4252: revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū // GarP_1,59.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4253: anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4258: rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam // GarP_1,59.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4259: vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4260: eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,59.24 //
GP12garup1_u:4262: caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā // GarP_1,59.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4263: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GP12garup1_u:4264: aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā // GarP_1,59.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4269: reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā // GarP_1,59.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4271: trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4273: dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4274: kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet /
GP12garup1_u:4275: aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4279: meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī // GarP_1,59.33 //
GP12garup1_u:4280: vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule /
GP12garup1_u:4281: daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4282: etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4285: rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4289: kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ // GarP_1,59.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4297: bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ // GarP_1,59.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4298: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4299: ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4300: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine /
GP12garup1_u:4301: etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4302: haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4303: rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham // GarP_1,59.44 //
GP12garup1_u:4304: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4306: bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja / /
GP12garup1_u:4307: bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara / // GarP_1,59.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4313: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā // GarP_1,59.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4318: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4322: ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4323: aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,60.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4335: mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4336: sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:4337: bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4341: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe // GarP_1,60.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4353: artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet // GarP_1,60.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4355: vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,60.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4359: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet // GarP_1,60.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4361: nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4367: mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam // GarP_1,60.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4368: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4375: candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api // GarP_1,61.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4382: pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham // GarP_1,61.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4383: śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam /
GP12garup1_u:4384: janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,61.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4386: pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet // GarP_1,61.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4387: ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4390: dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ // GarP_1,61.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4391: kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:4394: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau // GarP_1,61.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4397: śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:4398: śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake // GarP_1,61.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4401: mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4402: jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ // GarP_1,61.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4404: budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet // GarP_1,61.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4405: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4406: tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ // GarP_1,61.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4407: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4410: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4412: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4420: kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4422: sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī // GarP_1,63.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4423: duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4426: dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4430: viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same // GarP_1,63.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4434: bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ // GarP_1,63.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4436: lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ // GarP_1,63.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4437: sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4444: triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GP12garup1_u:4445: dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4450: madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param // GarP_1,63.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4452: acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4458: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4462: yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam /
GP12garup1_u:4463: nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī // GarP_1,64.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4465: sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā // GarP_1,64.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4466: vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4467: bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī // GarP_1,64.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4469: viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham // GarP_1,64.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4474: streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā // GarP_1,64.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4475: aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4476: putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4477: yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau /
GP12garup1_u:4478: annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4484: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4486: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4488: tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4492: śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau // GarP_1,64.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4495: aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau // GarP_1,64.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4496: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4505: śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau // GarP_1,65.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4508: vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau /
GP12garup1_u:4513: nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām // GarP_1,65.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4514: tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4515: keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ // GarP_1,65.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4517: vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4525: balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4527: samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān // GarP_1,65.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4535: samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ // GarP_1,65.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4537: puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ // GarP_1,65.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4538: putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4542: māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4543: bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ // GarP_1,65.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4544: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4545: dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ // GarP_1,65.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4551: vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā // GarP_1,65.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4553: adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā // GarP_1,65.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4555: trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4561: samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu // GarP_1,65.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4573: saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau // GarP_1,65.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4575: niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau // GarP_1,65.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4577: medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4604: śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam /
GP12garup1_u:4605: niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ // GarP_1,65.53 //
GP12garup1_u:4609: tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā // GarP_1,65.55 //
GP12garup1_u:4610: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye /
GP12garup1_u:4611: kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam // GarP_1,65.56 //
GP12garup1_u:4612: bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām /
GP12garup1_u:4613: mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,65.57 //
GP12garup1_u:4614: āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam /
GP12garup1_u:4617: sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu // GarP_1,65.59 //
GP12garup1_u:4629: svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare // GarP_1,65.65 //
GP12garup1_u:4630: krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:4631: syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt // GarP_1,65.66 //
GP12garup1_u:4635: jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.68 //
GP12garup1_u:4637: nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,65.69 //
GP12garup1_u:4639: maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.70 //
GP12garup1_u:4643: āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.72 //
GP12garup1_u:4644: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4652: pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham /
GP12garup1_u:4672: vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //
GP12garup1_u:4674: nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam // GarP_1,65.87 //
GP12garup1_u:4676: cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ // GarP_1,65.88 //
GP12garup1_u:4677: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam /
GP12garup1_u:4678: pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ // GarP_1,65.89 //
GP12garup1_u:4682: narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,65.91 //
GP12garup1_u:4683: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4684: śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet // GarP_1,65.92 //
GP12garup1_u:4688: jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe // GarP_1,65.94 //
GP12garup1_u:4690: ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau // GarP_1,65.95 //
GP12garup1_u:4693: gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4696: aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau // GarP_1,65.98 //
GP12garup1_u:4697: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4698: āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham // GarP_1,65.99 //
GP12garup1_u:4701: nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4703: na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam /
GP12garup1_u:4706: snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ // GarP_1,65.103 //
GP12garup1_u:4707: strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā /
GP12garup1_u:4713: na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:4715: rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare // GarP_1,65.107 //
GP12garup1_u:4716: gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:4717: strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //
GP12garup1_u:4724: śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā // GarP_1,65.111 //
GP12garup1_u:4725: kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm /
GP12garup1_u:4726: aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā // GarP_1,65.112 //
GP12garup1_u:4729: vāmāvartaṃ nimnamalpaṃ duḥ khitānāṃ ca guhyakam /
GP12garup1_u:4730: grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svā dīrghayā ca kulakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,65.114 //
GP12garup1_u:4732: kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī // GarP_1,65.115 //
GP12garup1_u:4733: smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī /
GP12garup1_u:4734: pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā // GarP_1,65.116 //
GP12garup1_u:4735: udare śvaśuraṃ hanti patiṃ hanti sphicordvayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4736: yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //
GP12garup1_u:4737: stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4738: karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //
GP12garup1_u:4745: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4758: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,66.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4759: śālagrāmo dvārakā ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā /
GP12garup1_u:4760: vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4761: gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī /
GP12garup1_u:4764: prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,66.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4765: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:4766: īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo viṣuḥ // GarP_1,66.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4768: sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ // GarP_1,66.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4770: hemalambo vilaṃbaśca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ // GarP_1,66.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4773: paridhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4776: aśobhanāḥ śobhanāśca nāmnaivaite hi vatsarāḥ // GarP_1,66.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4778: rājā sā(mā) jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,66.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4779: ā ī ū ai au svarāṃśca likhetpañcāgnikoṣṭhake /
GP12garup1_u:4781: tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4787: kalāliṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhetpañcamastasya vai mṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4788: kalā tithistathā vāro nakṣatraṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,66.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4789: nāmodayasya pūrvaṃ ca tathā bhavati nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:4793: trailokyamohanaṃ bījaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tu padma(nna)gam // GarP_1,66.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4795: bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ceti jayādidāḥ // GarP_1,66.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4796: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4801: hareḥ śrutvā haro gaurīṃ dehasthaṃ jñānamabravīt // GarP_1,67.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4802: kujo vahnī raviḥ pṛthvī saurirāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4807: sthānasevāṃ tathā dhyānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rājadarśanam // GarP_1,67.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4811: śubhāśubhaviveko hi jñāyate tu svarodayāt // GarP_1,67.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4815: cakravacca sthitāstāstu sarvāḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,67.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4817: vāmā somātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravisannibhā // GarP_1,67.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4819: vāmā hyamṛtarūpā ca jagadāpyāyane sthitā // GarP_1,67.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4822: nirgame tu bhavedvāmā praveśe dakṣaiṇā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:4829: śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi // GarP_1,67.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4831: dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4835: yuddhādibhojane ghāte strīṇāṃ caiva tu saṃgame // GarP_1,67.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4839: vāmācāre 'thavā dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ // GarP_1,67.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4840: tanusthaḥ pṛcchate yastu tatra siddhirna saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4841: vaicchando vāmadevastu yadā vahati cātmani // GarP_1,67.21 //
GP12garup1_u:4843: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra saṃkramate śivā // GarP_1,67.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4844: ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:4845: prasthite bhāgato haṃse dvābhyāṃ vai sarvavāhinī // GarP_1,67.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4849: agrato vāmikā śreṣṭhā pṛṣṭhato dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4850: vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4851: vāme vāmā śubhe caiva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4852: jīvo jīvati jīvena yacchūnyaṃ tastvaro bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4856: yāvatṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ prathamo jayet /
GP12garup1_u:4859: pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram // GarP_1,67.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4860: anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram /
GP12garup1_u:4863: jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet // GarP_1,67.32 //
GP12garup1_u:4866: na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4867: atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4868: sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:4870: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4871: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam // GarP_1,67.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4873: śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,67.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4875: yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ // GarP_1,67.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4876: jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4877: meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,67.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4879: nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,67.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4881: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive // GarP_1,67.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4883: madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // GarP_1,67.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4885: madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4886: iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4891: indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4903: yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana // GarP_1,68.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4904: mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā /
GP12garup1_u:4907: prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4912: ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca /
GP12garup1_u:4917: dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā // GarP_1,68.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4919: ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,68.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4922: tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva /
GP12garup1_u:4926: ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4927: kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,68.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4929: loke 'sminparāmāṇumātramapi yadvajraṃ kraciddṛśyate tasmindevasamāśrayo hyavitathastīkṣṇāgradhāraṃ yadi // GarP_1,68.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4936: dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /
GP12garup1_u:4937: yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ // GarP_1,68.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4941: tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ // GarP_1,68.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4942: na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4944: ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā /
GP12garup1_u:4945: guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane // GarP_1,68.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4947: na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt // GarP_1,68.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4949: na tanna kuryāddhriyamāṇamāśu svacchandamṛtyorapi jīvitāntam // GarP_1,68.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4950: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:4952: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu supārśvamapetadoṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4954: tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram /
GP12garup1_u:4959: maṇiśāstravido vadanti tasya dviguṇaṃ rūpakalakṣamagramūlyam // GarP_1,68.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4962: yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:4969: sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,68.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4971: sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate // GarP_1,68.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4973: ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu // GarP_1,68.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4974: prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4975: alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya // GarP_1,68.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4981: parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ // GarP_1,68.45 //
GP12garup1_u:4983: pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ // GarP_1,68.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4987: jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ // GarP_1,68.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4989: vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ // GarP_1,68.49 //
GP12garup1_u:4996: saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4998: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5003: muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri // GarP_1,69.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5004: tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu /
GP12garup1_u:5005: vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ // GarP_1,69.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5007: prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi // GarP_1,69.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5009: kambūdbhavaṃ teṣvadhamaṃ pradiṣṭamutpadyate yacca gajendrakumbhāt // GarP_1,69.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5013: mataṅgajāścāpi viśuddhavaṃśyāste mauktikānāṃ prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ // GarP_1,69.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5015: pāṭhīnapṛṣṭhasya samānavarṇaṃ mīnātsuvṛttaṃ laghu cātisūkṣmam // GarP_1,69.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5016: utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5020: te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye /
GP12garup1_u:5023: prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām // GarP_1,69.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5025: jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt // GarP_1,69.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5026: rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat /
GP12garup1_u:5029: na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ // GarP_1,69.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5030: hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye /
GP12garup1_u:5031: nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti // GarP_1,69.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5034: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu /
GP12garup1_u:5036: mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā /
GP12garup1_u:5038: sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva /
GP12garup1_u:5039: na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma // GarP_1,69.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5041: nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya // GarP_1,69.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5042: vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta /
GP12garup1_u:5051: cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān /
GP12garup1_u:5052: na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti // GarP_1,69.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5054: mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca // GarP_1,69.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5056: yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam // GarP_1,69.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5057: ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram /
GP12garup1_u:5058: dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam // GarP_1,69.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5059: ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām /
GP12garup1_u:5060: guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5062: kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya // GarP_1,69.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5064: adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt // GarP_1,69.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5066: navasaptatimāpnuyātsvamūlyaṃ yadi na syādguṇasampadā vihīnam // GarP_1,69.31 //
GP12garup1_u:5067: triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate /
GP12garup1_u:5070: pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,69.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5075: ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu viddham // GarP_1,69.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5076: mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:5077: dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā śucicikraṇena // GarP_1,69.36 //
GP12garup1_u:5079: vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ // GarP_1,69.37 //
GP12garup1_u:5082: evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5087: sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //
GP12garup1_u:5088: tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam // GarP_1,69.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5091: evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5092: na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ // GarP_1,69.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5093: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanaṃ nāma muktāphalaparīkṣā nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5098: asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena // GarP_1,70.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5100: laṅkādhipenārdhapathe sametya svarbhānuneva prasabhaṃ niruddhaḥ // GarP_1,70.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5105: tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5112: sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ // GarP_1,70.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5118: anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām // GarP_1,70.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5121: kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu /
GP12garup1_u:5122: nirarciṣo 'ntarbahulā bhavanti prabhāvavanto 'pi nataiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5126: na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,70.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5128: sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,70.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5130: arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,70.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5132: na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5140: kārṣṇyāttathā siṃhaladeśajātaṃ muktābhidhānaṃ nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt // GarP_1,70.22 //
GP12garup1_u:5142: yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ // GarP_1,70.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5143: strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim /
GP12garup1_u:5144: ākrāntamūrdhā ca tathāṅgulibhyāṃ yaḥ kālikāṃ pārśvagatāṃ bibharti // GarP_1,70.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5146: tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5147: prāpyāpi ratnākarajā svajātiṃ lakṣedgurutvena guṇena vidvān // GarP_1,70.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5150: vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit /
GP12garup1_u:5152: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5153: tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,70.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5154: guṇopapannena sahāvabaddhomeṇirna dhāryo viguṇo hi jātyā /
GP12garup1_u:5155: na kaustubhenāpi sahāvabaddhaṃ vidvānvijātiṃ bibhṛyātkadācit // GarP_1,70.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5156: cāṇḍāla eko 'pi yathā dvijātīnsametya bhūrīnapi hantyayatnāt /
GP12garup1_u:5159: na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit // GarP_1,70.31 //
GP12garup1_u:5161: guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti // GarP_1,70.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5166: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5171: dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau // GarP_1,71.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5180: tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān /
GP12garup1_u:5181: mūrchāparītaḥ sahasaiva ghoṇārandhradvayena pramumoca sarvam // GarP_1,71.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5183: kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti // GarP_1,71.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5185: tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ // GarP_1,71.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5194: yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam /
GP12garup1_u:5203: tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5207: śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana // GarP_1,71.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5210: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā /
GP12garup1_u:5211: lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā // GarP_1,71.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5214: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5223: saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,71.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5228: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5233: deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam // GarP_1,72.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5244: tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5251: ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi // GarP_1,72.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5259: kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena // GarP_1,72.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5267: nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5269: tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam // GarP_1,72.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5270: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5275: parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā // GarP_1,73.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5287: cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ // GarP_1,73.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5295: tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya // GarP_1,73.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5296: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5298: sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa /
GP12garup1_u:5299: snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam // GarP_1,73.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5303: yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam // GarP_1,73.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5305: mūlyametanmaṇīnāṃ tu na sarvatra mahītale // GarP_1,73.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5307: tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati // GarP_1,73.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5309: palasya daśamo bhāgo dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,73.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5310: itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye // GarP_1,73.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5311: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5319: kaukaṇṭakanāmā syātsa eva yadi lohitāpītaḥ // GarP_1,74.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5320: ālohitastu pītaḥ svacchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ sa ekoktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5323: atyantalohito yaḥ sa eva khalu padmarāgasaṃjñaḥ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5324: api cendranīlasaṃjñaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ sunīlaḥ san // GarP_1,74.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5326: dhāraṇaphalaṃ ca tadvatkiṃ tu strīṇāṃ sutaprado bhavati // GarP_1,74.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5327: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5332: tataḥ prasūtaṃ pavanopapannaṃ karketanaṃ pūjayatamaṃ pṛthivyām // GarP_1,75.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5334: nīlaṃ punaḥ khalu sitaṃ paruṣaṃ vibhinnaṃ vyādhyādidoṣakaraṇena ca tadvibhāti // GarP_1,75.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5335: snigdhā viśuddhāḥ samarāgiṇaśca āpītavarṇā guravo vicitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5337: patreṇa kāñcanamayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptaṃ yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam /
GP12garup1_u:5338: rogapraṇāśanakaraṃ kalināśanaṃ tadāyuṣkaraṃ kulakaraṃ ca sukhapradaṃ ca // GarP_1,75.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5339: evaṃvidhaṃ bahuguṇaṃ maṇimāvahanti karketanaṃ śubhalaṅkṛtaye narā ye /
GP12garup1_u:5340: te pūjitā bahudhanā bahubāndhavāśca nityojjvalāḥ pramuditā apite bhavanti // GarP_1,75.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5342: tejo 'tidīpti kulapuṣṭivihīnavarṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśaṃ vapurudvahanti // GarP_1,75.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5344: tasyottamasya maṇi śāstravidāṃ mahimnā tulyaṃ tu mūlyamuditaṃ tulitasya kāryam // GarP_1,75.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5345: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5354: bhīṣmamaṇiṃ grīvādiṣu susampadaṃ sa sarvadā labhate // GarP_1,76.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5366: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5370: puṇyeṣu parvatavareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthānāntareṣu ca tathottaradeśagatvāt /
GP12garup1_u:5371: saṃsthāpitāḥ svanakhabāhugateḥ prakāśaṃ saṃpūjya dānavapatiṃ prathite pradeśe // GarP_1,77.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5374: gandharvavahnikadalīsadṛśāvabhāsā ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ // GarP_1,77.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5377: maṅgalyayuktā bahubhakticitrā vṛddhipradāste pulakā bhavanti // GarP_1,77.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5379: mṛtyupradāśca viduṣā parivarjanīyā mūlyaṃ palasya kathitaṃ ca śatāni pañca // GarP_1,77.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5380: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5389: madhyendupāṇḍuramatīva viśuddhavarṇaṃ taccendranīlasadṛśaṃ paṭalaṃ tule syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5390: saiśvaryabhṛtyajananaṃ kathitaṃ tadaiva pakrañca tatkila bhavetsuravajravarṇam // GarP_1,78.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5391: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5400: saṃskṛtaṃ śilpinā sadyo mūlyaṃ kiñcillabhettataḥ (dā) // GarP_1,79.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5401: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5406: cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ subhahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,80.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5408: sunīlakaṃ devakaromakañca sthānāni teṣu prabhavaṃ surāgam // GarP_1,80.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5409: anyatra jātaṃ ca na tatpradhānaṃ mūlyaṃ bhavecchilpiviśeṣayogāt /
GP12garup1_u:5410: prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5414: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5421: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā // GarP_1,81.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5423: prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam // GarP_1,81.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5425: vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ // GarP_1,81.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5427: prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5429: prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param // GarP_1,81.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5433: śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:5434: ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī // GarP_1,81.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5441: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā /
GP12garup1_u:5442: ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam // GarP_1,81.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5443: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5444: jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5445: sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:5446: eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ // GarP_1,81.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5447: pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5448: śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param // GarP_1,81.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5454: puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5456: mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā // GarP_1,81.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5458: vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ // GarP_1,81.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5459: gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī /
GP12garup1_u:5461: kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike /
GP12garup1_u:5462: virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5464: nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param // GarP_1,81.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5466: tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param // GarP_1,81.22 //
GP12garup1_u:5468: damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,81.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5470: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5471: idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5472: teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5476: śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī // GarP_1,81.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5478: mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī // GarP_1,81.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5481: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave /
GP12garup1_u:5483: etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5487: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5498: śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ // GarP_1,82.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5504: tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,82.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5507: yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5508: sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,82.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5509: gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5516: mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,82.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5519: lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5520: yuṣmānye pūjayiṣyanti tairahaṃ pūjitaḥ sadā // GarP_1,82.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5522: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā // GarP_1,82.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5524: snātukāmā gayātīrthaṃ vyāsa yāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,82.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5527: asaṃskṛtā mṛtā ya ca paśucorahatāśca ye /
GP12garup1_u:5528: sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5530: na tacchakyaṃ mayā vaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi // GarP_1,82.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5531: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5535: kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam /
GP12garup1_u:5536: viṣayaścāraṇaḥ puṇyo nadīnāṃ ca punaḥ punā // GarP_1,83.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5546: taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt // GarP_1,83.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5548: kāleśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5550: lokaṃ tvanāmayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,83.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5552: taṃ praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5554: dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5556: gāyattrīṃ pratarutthāya yastu paśyati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,83.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5558: sāvitrīṃ caiva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5559: sarasvatīṃ ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12garup1_u:5562: devaṃ gṛdhreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,83.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5564: prabhāseśaṃ prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_1,83.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5568: brahmeśvaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,83.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5570: phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām // GarP_1,83.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5572: aṅgāreśaṃ ca siddheśaṃ gayādityaṃ gajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,83.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5574: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,83.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5575: etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṝṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām /
GP12garup1_u:5577: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12garup1_u:5579: pṛthivyāṃ ca gayā puṇyā gayāyāṃ ca gayāśiraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5580: śreṣṭhaṃ tathā phalgutīrthaṃ tanmukhaṃ ca surasya hi // GarP_1,83.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5586: koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyāṃ ca gomake // GarP_1,83.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5590: uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5594: gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5596: tiladhenupradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenuṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5597: aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5599: gāyattre caiva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5601: pitṝṇāṃ tu kulaṃ brahmalokaṃ nayati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5606: dharmayūpe ca kūpe ta pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5609: rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsake /
GP12garup1_u:5613: gayāyāṃ na hi tatsthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5614: pañcakrośe gayākṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5616: janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍaṃ dadyātsvakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,83.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5617: eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattastava haste janārdana / /
GP12garup1_u:5620: gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇastathā // GarP_1,83.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5624: brahmāraṇyaṃ mahānadyāḥ paścimo bhāga ucyate // GarP_1,83.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5626: bharatasyāśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet // GarP_1,83.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5628: tatsmṛtaṃ campakavanaṃ tatra pāṇḍuśilāsti hi // GarP_1,83.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5632: padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.48 //
GP12garup1_u:5638: sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāddvādaśābdikī // GarP_1,83.51 //
GP12garup1_u:5639: śuklakṛṣṇāvubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasennaraḥ punātyāsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.52 //
GP12garup1_u:5640: gayāyāṃ muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaṃ ca aravindaṃ ca parvatam /
GP12garup1_u:5641: tṛtīyaṃ kraiñcapādaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,83.53 //
GP12garup1_u:5643: durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gayāyāṃ piṇḍapātanam // GarP_1,83.54 //
GP12garup1_u:5647: yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatrānṛṇo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5648: puṇyāṃ viśālāmāsādya nadīṃ trailokya viśrutām // GarP_1,83.56 //
GP12garup1_u:5650: śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5652: gayāstho yo dadātyannaṃ pitarastena putriṇaḥ // GarP_1,83.58 //
GP12garup1_u:5656: pabhdyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kila dāsyati // GarP_1,83.60 //
GP12garup1_u:5657: ātmajo vā tathānyo vā gayākūpe yadā tadā /
GP12garup1_u:5658: yannāmnā pātayetpiṇḍaṃ taṃ nayedbrahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,83.61 //
GP12garup1_u:5660: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā // GarP_1,83.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5666: teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //
GP12garup1_u:5668: pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ // GarP_1,83.66 //
GP12garup1_u:5670: sthānaṃ dehaparityāge gayāyāṃ tu vidhīyate // GarP_1,83.67 //
GP12garup1_u:5672: agniṣṭomaśataṃ puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.68 //
GP12garup1_u:5676: tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,83.70 //
GP12garup1_u:5678: mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.71 //
GP12garup1_u:5680: vasiṣṭhasyāśrame snātvā vājapeyaṃ ca vindati // GarP_1,83.72 //
GP12garup1_u:5683: samīpe tvagnidhāreti viśrutā kapilā hi sā /
GP12garup1_u:5687: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:5688: saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.76 //
GP12garup1_u:5689: dhautapāpo naro yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5693: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5697: udyatastu gayāṃ gantuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5704: varjayitvā kurukṣetraṃ viśālāṃ virajāṃ gayām // GarP_1,84.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5705: divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyāṃ śrāddhakṛdbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5706: vārāṇasyāṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrthe śoṇanade tathā // GarP_1,84.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5708: uttaraṃ mānasaṃ gatvā siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām // GarP_1,84.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5710: kāmānsa labhate divyānmokṣopāyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,84.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5711: dakṣiṇaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā maunī piṇḍādi kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:5715: nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:5717: tatra snātvā divaṃ yāti śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5722: madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ // GarP_1,84.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5726: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,84.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5732: śrāddhaṃ piṇḍodakaṃ kāryaṃ madhye vai kūpayūpayoḥ // GarP_1,84.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5734: tṛtīye 'bahni brahmasado gatvā snātvātha tarpaṇam // GarP_1,84.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5735: kṛtvā śrāddhādikaṃ piṇḍaṃ madhye vai yūpakūpayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5744: anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare // GarP_1,84.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5745: atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha /
GP12garup1_u:5746: snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmaham // GarP_1,84.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5747: rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na cehāvartate punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5751: pitaro yānti devatvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:5752: muṇḍapṛṣṭe padaṃ nyastaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā // GarP_1,84.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5754: gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍānnāmnā yeṣāṃ tu nirvapet // GarP_1,84.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5756: pañcame 'hni gandālole snātvā vaṭatale tataḥ // GarP_1,84.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5760: kṛte śrāddhe 'kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,84.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5762: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ puttrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,84.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5772: gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,84.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5774: dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamabravīt // GarP_1,84.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5775: ke yūyaṃ teṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam /
GP12garup1_u:5776: ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śabham // GarP_1,84.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5777: mama putra pitā rakto brahmahā pāpakṛtparam /
GP12garup1_u:5778: ayaṃ pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇa ṛṣayo 'nena ghātitāḥ // GarP_1,84.41 //
GP12garup1_u:5779: avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada /
GP12garup1_u:5781: kṛtakṛtyo viśālo 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ yayau /
GP12garup1_u:5784: yeṣāṃ dāho na kriyāca ye 'gnidagdhāstathāpare // GarP_1,84.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5785: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:5788: tathā mātāmahaścaiva pramātāmaha eva ca // GarP_1,84.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5792: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5798: asmatkule mṛtā ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5800: pitavaṃśe mṛtā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5802: mātāmahakule ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5804: ajātadantā ye kecidye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5807: svagotre paragotre vā gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5810: ātmopaghātino ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5812: daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhirvāpi teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5814: vidyuccaurahatā ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5815: raurave cāndhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5817: asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5822: athavā vṛkṣayoni sthāstebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5826: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ yeṣāṃ tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5830: te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā // GarP_1,85.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5831: ye me pitṛkule jātāḥ kule mātustathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:5832: guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,85.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5834: kriyālo pahatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ paṅgavastathā // GarP_1,85.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5838: maya gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkatiḥ kṛtā // GarP_1,85.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5844: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5848: yeyaṃ pretaśilā khyātā gayāyāṃ sā tridhā sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:5851: pretatvaṃ ye gatā nṝṇāṃ mitrādyā bāndhavādayaḥ // GarP_1,86.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5853: ato 'tra munayo bhūpā rājapatnyādayaḥ sadā // GarP_1,86.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5855: gayāsurasya yanmuṇḍaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yataḥ // GarP_1,86.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5861: gadādharādayo devā ādyā ādau vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_1,86.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5869: yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kṛṣṇobuddho 'tha kalkyapi // GarP_1,86.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5873: gadādharaṃ suraiḥ sārdhamādyaṃ gatvā dadāti yaḥ // GarP_1,86.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5874: arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
GP12garup1_u:5875: dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5885: jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5894: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam /
GP12garup1_u:5901: subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5903: nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet // GarP_1,86.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5904: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5911: brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5913: kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5914: siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:5915: ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5921: putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī // GarP_1,86.37 //
GP12garup1_u:5925: pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī // GarP_1,86.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5927: tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,86.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5928: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5940: sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā // GarP_1,87.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5942: citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ // GarP_1,87.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5944: ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā // GarP_1,87.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5946: tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5950: vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,87.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5956: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:5957: indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5959: tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ // GarP_1,87.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5964: munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā // GarP_1,87.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5965: harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5966: gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,87.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5968: raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5978: śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5986: āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā // GarP_1,87.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5987: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām /
GP12garup1_u:5992: nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5998: ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.30 //
GP12garup1_u:6001: tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6006: aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha // GarP_1,87.34 //
GP12garup1_u:6008: sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // GarP_1,87.35 //
GP12garup1_u:6009: teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6015: pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.38 //
GP12garup1_u:6021: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6023: dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:6031: baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.44 //
GP12garup1_u:6033: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ // GarP_1,87.45 //
GP12garup1_u:6047: surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.52 //
GP12garup1_u:6060: indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.57 //
GP12garup1_u:6063: ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:6065: tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.59 //
GP12garup1_u:6067: ajito muktaśukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.60 //
GP12garup1_u:6069: vacovṛddhā devagaṇāḥ pañca proktāstu saptakāḥ // GarP_1,87.61 //
GP12garup1_u:6071: eko devaścaturdhā tu vyāsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.62 //
GP12garup1_u:6073: aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ // GarP_1,87.63 //
GP12garup1_u:6075: dhanurvedaśca gāndharvo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ // GarP_1,87.64 //
GP12garup1_u:6076: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma spatāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6081: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pitṛsto traṃ krauñcukiṃ prāha tacchṛṇu // GarP_1,88.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6086: nimuktasaṃgaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā procuḥ svapitaro munim // GarP_1,88.3 //
GP12garup1_u:6088: vatsa kasmāttvayā puṇyo na kṛto dāra saṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6098: akṛtvā ca kathaṃ māṇḍyaṃ svargatiṃ prāptumicchasi // GarP_1,88.8 //
GP12garup1_u:6100: mṛtasya narakaṃ tyaktvā kleśa evānyajanmani // GarP_1,88.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6103: bhavatyato mayā pūrvaṃna kṛto dārasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,88.10 //
GP12garup1_u:6107: mama tvapaṅkadigdho 'pi vidyāmbhobhirvaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,88.12 //
GP12garup1_u:6112: kiṃ tu nopāyamārgo 'yaṃ yatastvaṃ putra vartase // GarP_1,88.14 //
GP12garup1_u:6115: evaṃ na bandho bhavati kurvataḥ kāraṇātmakam /
GP12garup1_u:6116: na ca bandhāya tatkarma bhavatyanatisannibham // GarP_1,88.16 //
GP12garup1_u:6118: sukhaduḥ khātmakairvatsa puṇyā puṇyātmakaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,88.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6123: tatkathaṃ karmaṇo mārge bhavanto yojayanti mām // GarP_1,88.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6126: kiṃ tu vidyāpariprāptau hetuḥ karma na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,88.20 //
GP12garup1_u:6127: vihitākaraṇānartho na sadbhiḥ kriyate tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6132: anuṣṭhānā bhyupāyena bandhayogyāpi no hi sā // GarP_1,88.23 //
GP12garup1_u:6136: vṛddho 'haṃ sāmprataṃ ko me pitaraḥ sampridāsyati /
GP12garup1_u:6140: nūnaṃ bhāvi bhavitrī ca nābhinandasi no vacaḥ // GarP_1,88.26 //
GP12garup1_u:6142: babhūvuḥ sahasādṛśyā dīpā vātahatā iva // GarP_1,88.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6145: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmajñānamā nāmāṣṭāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6154: kiṃ karomi kra gacchāmi kathaṃ me dārasaṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6160: ārādhanāya sa tadā paraṃ niyamamāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6167: sṛṣṭvā prajāḥ sutānvipra samutpādya kriyāstathā // GarP_1,89.8 //
GP12garup1_u:6169: satvaṃ yathoktaṃ pitṛbhiḥ kuru dāraparigraham // GarP_1,89.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6171: ta eva tuṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ pradāsyanti tavepsitam /
GP12garup1_u:6172: patnīṃ sutāṃśca santuṣṭāḥ kiṃ na dadyuḥ pitāmahāḥ // GarP_1,89.10 //
GP12garup1_u:6175: nadyā vivikte puline cakāra pitṛtarpaṇam // GarP_1,89.11 //
GP12garup1_u:6180: devairapi hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhottaraiḥ // GarP_1,89.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6181: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante maharṣibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6200: santarpyate jagatkṛtsnaṃ nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ // GarP_1,89.23 //
GP12garup1_u:6207: pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā /
GP12garup1_u:6208: tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam // GarP_1,89.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6209: pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6211: pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau /
GP12garup1_u:6213: tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān /
GP12garup1_u:6215: somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti /
GP12garup1_u:6217: yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6218: ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ // GarP_1,89.32 //
GP12garup1_u:6220: kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu // GarP_1,89.33 //
GP12garup1_u:6221: kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām /
GP12garup1_u:6222: teṣāñca sānnidhyamihāstu puṣpagandhāmbubhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu // GarP_1,89.34 //
GP12garup1_u:6223: dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu /
GP12garup1_u:6224: ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim // GarP_1,89.35 //

GP12garup1_u:7314: pravāse tu mṛte bhūyaḥ kṛtvā kuśamayaṃ dahet // GarP_1,107.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7316: śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet // GarP_1,107.33 //

GP12garup1_u:7320: śrotra ca prokṣaṇīṃ dādyadājyasthālīṃ ca cakṣuṣoḥ // GarP_1,107.35 //

GP12garup1_u:7346: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /

GP12garup1_u:7349: kālo janayate sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo 'pi saṃharet // GarP_1,108.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7356: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām /
GP12garup1_u:7357: alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati // GarP_1,108.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7359: paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana // GarP_1,108.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7362: sa bandhuryo hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yastu poṣakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7363: tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate // GarP_1,108.15 //

GP12garup1_u:7366: sa jīvati guṇā yasya dharmo yasya sa jīvati /

GP12garup1_u:7368: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā /

GP12garup1_u:7375: yasyedṛśī bhavedbhāyyā sa devendrona mānuṣaḥ // GarP_1,108.21 //
