GP12garup1_u:7381: alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā // GarP_1,108.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7383: sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,108.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7386: vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā /
GP12garup1_u:7387: krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta // GarP_1,108.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7388: saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau hyatapayaiva)?haime /
GP12garup1_u:7389: utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit // GarP_1,108.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7390: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca /
GP12garup1_u:7391: dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ // GarP_1,108.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7392: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7399: grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7400: varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe /
GP12garup1_u:7403: na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7406: arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena /
GP12garup1_u:7407: rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena // GarP_1,109.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7408: adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7409: arthairvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavatyakāle svajano 'pi śatruḥ // GarP_1,109.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7410: āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /
GP12garup1_u:7411: māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim // GarP_1,109.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7412: vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7413: puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ // GarP_1,109.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7415: mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam // GarP_1,109.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7416: sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7420: yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan /
GP12garup1_u:7422: nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /
GP12garup1_u:7423: viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7425: vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet // GarP_1,109.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7428: kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7429: kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ // GarP_1,109.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7430: kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7431: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān // GarP_1,109.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7434: vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret // GarP_1,109.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7435: yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7436: na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7437: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7438: mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam // GarP_1,109.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7439: yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7440: kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam // GarP_1,109.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7442: ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7445: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7447: sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate /
GP12garup1_u:7449: na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane /
GP12garup1_u:7452: arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana // GarP_1,109.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7454: vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā // GarP_1,109.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7456: pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam // GarP_1,109.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7457: durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7458: tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam // GarP_1,109.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7460: mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye // GarP_1,109.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7461: strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7463: na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet /
GP12garup1_u:7464: na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7468: hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // GarP_1,109.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7469: suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam /
GP12garup1_u:7470: yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka / // GarP_1,109.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7472: toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ // GarP_1,109.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7473: nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam /
GP12garup1_u:7474: nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ // GarP_1,109.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7476: nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ // GarP_1,109.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7478: sukhānāñca sutānāñca jīvitasya varasya ca // GarP_1,109.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7479: rājā na tapto dhanasaṃcayena na sāgarastṛptimagājjalena /
GP12garup1_u:7480: na paṇḍitastṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptaṃ na cakṣurnṛpadarśanena // GarP_1,109.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7481: svakarma dharmārjitajīvitānāṃ śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām /
GP12garup1_u:7485: na dānena na mānena nārjavena na savayā /
GP12garup1_u:7486: na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamā striyaḥ // GarP_1,109.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7488: śanaiḥ kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca pañcaitāni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,109.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7490: śāśvataṃ saguṇā vidyā suhṛnmitraṃ ca śāśvatam // GarP_1,109.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7491: ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7492: te śocanīyā iha jīvaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa mṛgāścaranti // GarP_1,109.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7495: ye bālabhāve na paṭhanti vidyāṃ kāmāturā yauvananaṣṭavittāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7496: te vṛddhabāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathābjam // GarP_1,109.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7497: tarke 'pratiṣṭhā śrutayo vibhinnāḥ nāsāvṛṣiryasya mataṃ na bhinnam /
GP12garup1_u:7498: dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ // GarP_1,109.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7501: anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pareṅgitajñānaphalā hi buddhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7502: udīritorthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti darśitam // GarP_1,109.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7503: arthādbhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchetsatyādbhraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca /
GP12garup1_u:7504: yogādbhraṣṭaḥ satyaghṛtiñca gacchedrājyādbhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca // GarP_1,109.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7505: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7510: dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hyadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca // GarP_1,110.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7511: vāgyantrahīnasya narasya vidyā śastraṃ yathā kāpuruṣasya haste /
GP12garup1_u:7512: na tuṣṭimutpādayate śarīre hyandhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ // GarP_1,110.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7514: vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_1,110.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7519: arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7520: ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret // GarP_1,110.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7525: na rājñā saha mitratvaṃ na sarpo nirviṣaḥ kracit /
GP12garup1_u:7526: na kulaṃ nirmalaṃ tatra strījano yatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7530: na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana // GarP_1,110.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7532: athavā pṛthivīpālo mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ // GarP_1,110.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7534: mūrdhni vā sarvalokānāṃ śīrṣataḥ patito vane // GarP_1,110.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7536: na ca virauti na cāpi sa śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā // GarP_1,110.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7540: adhaḥ khalenāpi kṛtasya vahnernādhaḥ śikhā yāti kadācideva // GarP_1,110.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7541: na sadaśvaḥ kaśāghātaṃ siṃho na gajagarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:7542: vīro vā paranirdiṣṭaṃ na sahedbhīmaniḥ svanam // GarP_1,110.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7543: yadi vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vāśu daivānna tu khalajanasevāṃ kāṅkṣayennaiva nīcām /
GP12garup1_u:7544: na tṛṇamadanakārye sukṣudhārto 'tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiramuṣṇaṃ prāyaśaḥ kuñcarāṇām // GarP_1,110.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7548: tānyeva kāleṣu vipatkarāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇyapi dāruṇāni // GarP_1,110.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7552: svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ // GarP_1,110.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7554: bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya vai sadā // GarP_1,110.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7556: sānukūle tu daive śaṃ puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7558: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sadā bhavet // GarP_1,110.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7559: dhaninaḥ śrotriyo rājā nadī vaidyastu pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7560: pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāttatratra saṃsthitim // GarP_1,110.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7562: pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset // GarP_1,110.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7564: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,110.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7566: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti sarvajño nāsti kutracit // GarP_1,110.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7567: na sarvavitkaścidihāsti loke nātyantamūrkho bhuvi cāpi kaścit /
GP12garup1_u:7568: jñānena nīcottamamadhyamena yo 'yaṃ vijānāti sa tena vidvān // GarP_1,110.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7569: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7574: sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyaṅnityaṃ parīkṣayet // GarP_1,111.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7576: nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitaṃ dharmeṇa pālayet // GarP_1,111.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7580: pararāṣṭraṃ mahīpālairbhoktavyaṃ na ca dūṣayet // GarP_1,111.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7581: nodhaśchindyāttu yo dhenvāḥ kṣārārtho labhate payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7582: evaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prayogeṇa pīḍyamānaṃ na vardhate // GarP_1,111.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7586: prajāḥ pālayituṃ śaktaḥ pārthivo vijitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,111.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7589: satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7590: kintu vai vanitāpāṅgabhaṅgilolaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,111.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7591: vyāghrīva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāśca śatrava iva prabhavanti gātre /
GP12garup1_u:7592: āyuḥ paristravati bhinnaghaṭādivāmbho loko na cātmahitamācaratīha kaścit // GarP_1,111.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7593: niḥ śaṅkaṃ kiṃ manuṣyāḥ kuruta parahitaṃ yuktamagre hitaṃ yanmodadhvaṃ kāminībhirmadanaśarahatā mandamandātidṛṣṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:7594: mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena // GarP_1,111.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7596: ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7598: yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7600: rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye // GarP_1,111.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7602: sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate // GarP_1,111.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7606: yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7607: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca /
GP12garup1_u:7608: te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ // GarP_1,111.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7609: andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7610: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // GarP_1,111.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7612: indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7616: sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7617: manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7618: samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet // GarP_1,111.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7620: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī // GarP_1,111.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7621: dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva /
GP12garup1_u:7622: saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ prapannāḥ // GarP_1,111.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7625: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7628: mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7630: śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate // GarP_1,111.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7631: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7632: vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7634: sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ // GarP_1,111.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7636: ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate // GarP_1,111.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7637: udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:7638: daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā // GarP_1,111.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7639: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7645: bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7646: tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila // GarP_1,112.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7648: tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā // GarP_1,112.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7654: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7656: sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7658: krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7662: śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7664: āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7672: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,112.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7673: akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:7674: viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe // GarP_1,112.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7676: ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7678: prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti // GarP_1,112.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7680: sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ // GarP_1,112.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7683: aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ // GarP_1,112.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7685: durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7690: yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7691: tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ // GarP_1,112.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7694: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7699: paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ // GarP_1,113.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7703: bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha // GarP_1,113.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7707: vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ // GarP_1,113.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7709: tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7714: vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7715: akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam // GarP_1,113.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7716: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:7717: mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate // GarP_1,113.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7718: varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam /
GP12garup1_u:7719: varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam // GarP_1,113.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7721: pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana // GarP_1,113.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7722: viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7723: nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7724: ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7725: te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā // GarP_1,113.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7726: brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe /
GP12garup1_u:7727: rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe // GarP_1,113.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7728: dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:7729: dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe // GarP_1,113.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7734: ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham /
GP12garup1_u:7736: na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe /
GP12garup1_u:7737: na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi // GarP_1,113.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7738: dugastrikūṭaḥ parikhā samudro rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7739: śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,113.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7740: yasminvayasi yatkāle yaddivā yacca vā niśi /
GP12garup1_u:7741: yanmuhūrte kṣaṇe vāpi tattathā na tadanyathā // GarP_1,113.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7744: purādhītā ca yā vidyā purā dattañca yaddhanam /
GP12garup1_u:7745: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hyagre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ // GarP_1,113.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7748: sthūlajaṅgho yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7749: ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaste duḥ khabhājanam // GarP_1,113.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7750: na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7751: svayaṃ kṛtena gacchanti svayaṃ baddhāḥ svakarmaṇā // GarP_1,113.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7753: śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // GarP_1,113.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7756: bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca yaḥ karoti śubhāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7760: prāptavyamarthaṃ labhate manuṣyo devo 'pi taṃ vārayituṃ na śaktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7761: ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na tu tat pareṣām // GarP_1,113.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7762: sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bila ākhuśca dhāvati /
GP12garup1_u:7763: naraḥ śīghratarādeva karmaṇaḥ kaḥ palāyate // GarP_1,113.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7766: yer'thā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7767: dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt // GarP_1,113.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7768: annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7769: tānyeva yadi dharmārtho na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam // GarP_1,113.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7771: yo 'nnārthaiḥ śuciḥ śaucānna mṛdā vāriṇā śuciḥ // GarP_1,113.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7773: sarvabhūte dayā śaucaṃ jalaśaucañca pañcamam // GarP_1,113.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7774: yasya satyañca śaucañca tasya svargo na durlabhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7775: satyaṃ hi vacanaṃ yasya so 'śvamedhādviśiṣyate // GarP_1,113.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7778: yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaścaiva susaṃyatam /
GP12garup1_u:7779: vidyā tapaśca kīrtiśca sa tīrthaphalamaśnute // GarP_1,113.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7781: na kruddhaḥ paruṣaṃ brūyādetatsādhostu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7783: kāle śrutvā hitaṃ vākyaṃ na kaścitparituṣyati // GarP_1,113.43 //
GP12garup1_u:7785: alabhyaṃ labhyate martyaistatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,113.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7789: prabhāte 'nyadiśo yānti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7791: yastvekastvarito yāti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7795: kuśāgreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭaṃ prāptakālo na jīvati // GarP_1,113.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7797: prāptavyānyeva prāpnāti duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,113.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7799: ācodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7800: svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam // GarP_1,113.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7801: śīlaṃ kulaṃ naiva na caiva vidyā jñānaṃ guṇā naiva na bījaśuddhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7802: bhāgyāni pūrvaṃ tapasārjitāni kāle phalantyasya yathaiva vṛkṣāḥ // GarP_1,113.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7803: tatra mṛtyuryatra hantā tatra śrīryatra sampadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7804: tatra tatra svayaṃ yāti preryamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_1,113.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7806: yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindanti mātaram // GarP_1,113.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7808: sukṛtaṃ bhuṅkṣva cātmīyaṃ mūḍha kiṃ paritapyase // GarP_1,113.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7809: yathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7810: tathā janmāntare tadvai kartā ramanugacchati // GarP_1,113.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7812: ātmano balivamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati // GarP_1,113.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7814: vicārya khalu paśyāmi tatsukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,113.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7815: yatra sneho bhayaṃ tatra sneho duḥ khasya bhājanam /
GP12garup1_u:7816: snehamūlāni duḥ khāni tasmistyakte mahatsukham // GarP_1,113.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7817: śarīramevāyatanaṃ duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7818: jīvitañca śarīrañca jātyaiva saha jāyate // GarP_1,113.60 //
GP12garup1_u:7819: sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥ khaṃ sarva mātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7821: sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥ khaṃ duḥ khasyānantaraṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7822: śukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cakravatparivartate // GarP_1,113.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7824: vartamānena varteta na sa śokena bādhyate // GarP_1,113.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7825: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre trayośottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7834: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,114.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7835: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje /
GP12garup1_u:7839: mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano vaset /
GP12garup1_u:7842: yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7844: śakyate prasaro boddhuṃ na hyaraktasye catasaḥ // GarP_1,114.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7845: kṣaṇo nāsti raho nāsti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7851: parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi śokena rahitam /
GP12garup1_u:7852: paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ // GarP_1,114.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7853: agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7854: nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7856: śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7857: kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit // GarP_1,114.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7861: yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7863: na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,114.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7864: sa paṇḍito yo hyanuñjayedvai miṣṭena bālaṃ viniyena śiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:7865: arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa // GarP_1,114.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7866: chalena mitraṃ kaluṣeṇa dharmaṃ paropatāpena samṛddhibhāvanam /
GP12garup1_u:7867: sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste // GarP_1,114.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7869: niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,114.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7870: sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7871: madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham // GarP_1,114.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7873: kadācitkupitaṃ mitraṃ sarvaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśayet // GarP_1,114.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7878: vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:7879: rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7880: viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam /
GP12garup1_u:7881: viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,114.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7883: priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā // GarP_1,114.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7885: divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ // GarP_1,114.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7888: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7889: prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7890: sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam /
GP12garup1_u:7891: uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7895: trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,114.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7896: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:7897: na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,114.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7899: sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam // GarP_1,114.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7900: nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām /
GP12garup1_u:7901: dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm // GarP_1,114.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7904: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7906: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7908: bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7909: āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ // GarP_1,114.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7917: keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,114.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7919: antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7921: bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati // GarP_1,114.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7924: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:7925: sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate // GarP_1,114.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7927: mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam // GarP_1,114.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7930: namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7931: śuṣkavṛkṣāśca mūrkhāśca bhidyante na namanti ca // GarP_1,114.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7932: aprārthitāni duḥ khāni yathaivāyānti yānti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7933: mārjāra iva lumpeta tathā prārthayitāra naraḥ // GarP_1,114.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7935: viparītamanārye ca yathecchasi tathā cara // GarP_1,114.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7937: dvikarṇasya tu mantrasya brahmāpyanta na budhyate // GarP_1,114.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7938: tayā gavā kiṃ kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī /
GP12garup1_u:7939: kor'tha putreṇa jātena yo na vidvānna dhārmikaḥ // GarP_1,114.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7941: kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7943: vanaṃ suvāsitaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7944: eko hi guṇavānputro nirguṇena śatena kim /
GP12garup1_u:7945: candro hanti tamāṃsyeko na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam // GarP_1,114.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7947: prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putraṃ mitravadācaret // GarP_1,114.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7953: yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktamaśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ // GarP_1,114.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7955: snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayo vai hyanākulāḥ // GarP_1,114.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7956: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:7957: sarveṣāṃ sa pitā hi syātsarveṣāmanupālakaḥ // GarP_1,114.64 //
GP12garup1_u:7962: apahṛtya parasvaṃ hi yastu dānaṃ prayacchati /
GP12garup1_u:7963: sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthāstasya tatphalam // GarP_1,114.67 //
GP12garup1_u:7966: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:7967: niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // GarP_1,114.69 //
GP12garup1_u:7971: caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñjātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ // GarP_1,114.71 //
GP12garup1_u:7974: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7975: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate // GarP_1,114.73 //
GP12garup1_u:7977: madīyā iti matvā vai na hi harṣayuto bhavet // GarP_1,114.74 //
GP12garup1_u:7978: cittāyattaṃ dhātuvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ citte naṣṭe dhātavo yānti nāśam /
GP12garup1_u:7979: tasmāccittaṃ sarvadā rakṣaṇīyaṃ svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti // GarP_1,114.75 //

GP12garup1_u:8873: aiśvaryavittādi sadākṣayaṃ me tathāstu me santatirakṣayaiva // GarP_1,137.10 //
GP12garup1_u:8875: tvaṃ parataḥ parasmātsa brahmabhūtaḥ parataḥ parasmāt /
GP12garup1_u:8876: tathācyutaṃ me kuru vāñchitaṃ sadā mayā kṛtaṃ pāpaharāprameya // GarP_1,137.11 //
GP12garup1_u:8883: saptamīṃ pūjayedviṣṇuṃ durgāṃ śambuṃ raviṃ kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:8884: teṣāṃ lokaṃ samāpnoti sarvakāmāṃśca nirmalaḥ // GarP_1,137.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8888: dhanado 'gniḥ pratipadi nāsatyo dastra arcitaḥ // GarP_1,137.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8890: nāgāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ kārtikeyaḥ saptamyāṃ bhāskaror'thadaḥ // GarP_1,137.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8892: indro daśamyāṃ dhanada ekādaśyāṃ munīśvarāḥ // GarP_1,137.18 //
GP12garup1_u:8894: caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaro 'pare // GarP_1,137.19 //
GP12garup1_u:8895: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tithivāranakṣatrādivratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8901: viṣṇunābhyabjato brahmā dakṣo 'ṅguṣṭhācca tasya vai // GarP_1,138.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8902: tato 'pitarvivasvāṃśca tataḥ sūnurvivasvataḥ manurikṣvākuśaryātī nṛgo dhṛṣṭaḥ praṣadhrakaḥ // GarP_1,138.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8903: nariṣyantaśca nābhāgo diṣṭaḥ śaśaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:8905: ilāyāṃ tu budhājjāto rājā rudra purūravāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8908: karūṣātkṣattriyā jātā kārūṣā iti viśrutāḥ // GarP_1,138.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8926: tatputraśca sumantiśca ete vaiśālakā nṛpāḥ // GarP_1,138.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8958: vijayādruruko jajñe rurukāttu vṛkaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.29 //
GP12garup1_u:8960: ṣaṣṭiḥ putra sahasrāṇi sumatyāṃ sagarāddhara // GarP_1,138.30 //
GP12garup1_u:8968: sudāsasya ca saudāso nāmnā mitrasahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8971: tato daśaratho rājā tasya cailavilaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.36 //
GP12garup1_u:8979: kuśasya cātithiḥ putro niṣadho hyatitheḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.40 //
GP12garup1_u:8980: niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nalasya ca nabhāḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8991: maroḥ prasuśrutaḥ putrastasya codāvasuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9009: kṣemāri tastvanenāśca tasya rāmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.55 //
GP12garup1_u:9015: vijayasya ṛtaḥ putraḥ ṛtasya sunayaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,138.58 //
GP12garup1_u:9017: bahulāśvo dhṛteḥ putro bahulāśvātkṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,138.59 //
GP12garup1_u:9018: janakasya dvaye vaṃśe ukto yogasamāśrayaḥ // GarP_1,138.60 //
GP12garup1_u:9019: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9023: sūryasya kathito vaṃśaḥ somavaṃśaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
GP12garup1_u:9025: atreḥ somastasya bhāryā tārā suraguroḥ priyā /
GP12garup1_u:9026: somāttarā budhaṃ jajñe budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ // GarP_1,139.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9032: balākāśvastasya putro balākāśvāt kuśaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9035: kanyā satyavatī dattā ṛcīkāya dvijāya sā /
GP12garup1_u:9048: vibhostu suvibhuḥ putraḥ suvibhoḥ sukumārakaḥ // GarP_1,139.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9054: vijayaḥ saṃjayasyāpi vijayasya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9060: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata // GarP_1,139.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9061: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruñca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣapārvaṇī /
GP12garup1_u:9071: jayadhvajo madhuḥ śūro vṛṣaṇaḥ pañca savratāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9085: kauśikasya ṛciḥ putraḥ tataścaidyo nṛpaḥ kila /
GP12garup1_u:9086: kuntiḥ kilāsya putro 'bhūtkuntervṛṣṇiḥ sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,139.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9088: daśārhasya suto vyomā jīmūtaśca tadātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9090: tato madhuratho jajñe śakunistasya cātmajaḥ // GarP_1,139.34 //
GP12garup1_u:9094: puruhotro hyanoḥ putro hyaṃśuśca puruhotrataḥ // GarP_1,139.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9114: tadātmajo vilomā ca vilomnastumburuḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,139.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9116: tasyāhukaścāhukī ca kanyā caivāhukasya tu // GarP_1,139.47 //
GP12garup1_u:9119: śrīdevī śāntidevī ca vasudeva uvāha tāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9128: pṛthā ca śrutadevī ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ // GarP_1,139.53 //
GP12garup1_u:9130: sā dattā kuntinā pāṇḍostasyāṃ dharmānilendrakaiḥ // GarP_1,139.54 //
GP12garup1_u:9132: mādrayāṃ nāsatyadastrābhyāṃ kuntyāṃ karṇaḥ purābhavat // GarP_1,139.55 //
GP12garup1_u:9140: niśaṭhaścolmuko jāto devakyāṃ ṣaṭ ca jajñire // GarP_1,139.59 //
GP12garup1_u:9142: ṛjudāso bhadradevaḥ kaṃsa evāvadhīcca tān // GarP_1,139.60 //
GP12garup1_u:9146: śreṣṭhā jāmbavatī cāṣṭau jajñire tāḥ sutānbahūn // GarP_1,139.62 //
GP12garup1_u:9177: iti śrīgāruḍe mahupārāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9186: jaleyuḥ santateyuśca rodrāśvasya sutā varāḥ // GarP_1,140.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9192: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putro gargo vai saṃkṛteḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9193: gargādamanyuḥ putro vai śiniḥ putro vyajāyata /
GP12garup1_u:9200: bṛhatkarmā tasya putrastasya putro jayadrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9204: nṛpasya sṛmaraḥ putraḥ sukṛtiśca pṛthoḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,140.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9212: purañjayaḥ sudhīrācca tasya putro vidūrathaḥ // GarP_1,140.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9230: sudhanuśca pīkṣicca jahnuścaiva kuroḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,140.25 //
GP12garup1_u:9238: sahadevācca ca somāpiḥ somāpeḥ śrutavānsutaḥ // GarP_1,140.29 //
GP12garup1_u:9252: dhṛrāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuñca taddāsyāṃ vidurantathā // GarP_1,140.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9254: śataputraṃ duryodhanādyaṃ pāṇḍoḥ pañca prajajñire // GarP_1,140.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9256: śatānīkaḥ śrutakarmā draupadyāṃ pañca vai kramāt // GarP_1,140.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9257: yaudheyī ca hiḍimbā ca kauśī caiva subhadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:9258: vijayā vai reṇumatī pañcabhyastu sutāḥ kramāt // GarP_1,140.39 //
GP12garup1_u:9262: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe candravaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9269: nṛcakṣuśca mukhābāṇaḥ medhāvī ca nṛpañjayaḥ // GarP_1,141.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9273: kṣemakaśca tataḥ śūdraḥ pitā pūrvastataḥ sutaḥ // GarP_1,141.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9280: kṛtañjayo dhanañjayaḥ saṃjayaḥ śākya eva ca // GarP_1,141.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9286: kṣemyaśca suvrato dharmaḥ śmaśrulo dṛḍhasenakaḥ // GarP_1,141.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9288: iṣuñjayaśca ityete nṛpā bārhadrathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,141.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9292: yāti bhūḥ pralayaṃ cāpsu hyāpastejasi pāvakaḥ // GarP_1,141.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9294: ahaṃ buddhau matirjove jīvo 'vyakte tadātmani // GarP_1,141.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9296: avināśyaparaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsvargādi nāśi hi // GarP_1,141.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9298: dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9299: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9306: matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam // GarP_1,142.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9308: mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9312: amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ // GarP_1,142.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9318: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,142.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9320: yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9328: rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9330: āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā // GarP_1,142.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9332: rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ // GarP_1,142.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9334: sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham // GarP_1,142.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9335: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:9336: karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā // GarP_1,142.17 //
GP12garup1_u:9337: pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:9338: pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,142.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9340: taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9348: tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati // GarP_1,142.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9350: bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,142.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9357: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā /
GP12garup1_u:9360: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9373: astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9375: janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm // GarP_1,143.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9376: ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām /
GP12garup1_u:9377: śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe // GarP_1,143.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9381: sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā // GarP_1,143.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9383: rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā // GarP_1,143.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9385: rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,143.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9386: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9389: sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9391: nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī // GarP_1,143.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9395: nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā // GarP_1,143.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9401: sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9402: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte /
GP12garup1_u:9405: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9407: jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī /
GP12garup1_u:9409: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha /
GP12garup1_u:9410: śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,143.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9412: gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ // GarP_1,143.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9418: pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ // GarP_1,143.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9419: dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm /
GP12garup1_u:9426: bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam // GarP_1,143.31 //
GP12garup1_u:9428: rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili // GarP_1,143.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9429: svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:9430: tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate // GarP_1,143.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9431: yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape /
GP12garup1_u:9432: tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //
GP12garup1_u:9438: dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ // GarP_1,143.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9440: veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau // GarP_1,143.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9442: vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati // GarP_1,143.39 //
GP12garup1_u:9444: rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //
GP12garup1_u:9446: atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ // GarP_1,143.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9450: rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān // GarP_1,143.43 //
GP12garup1_u:9457: sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9458: savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm // GarP_1,143.47 //
GP12garup1_u:9462: putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9464: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ // GarP_1,143.50 //
GP12garup1_u:9466: svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ // GarP_1,143.51 //
GP12garup1_u:9467: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9474: kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam // GarP_1,144.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9476: damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ // GarP_1,144.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9480: keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ // GarP_1,144.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9482: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ // GarP_1,144.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9484: tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // GarP_1,144.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9489: narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9490: balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ // GarP_1,144.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9491: aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau /
GP12garup1_u:9493: mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām // GarP_1,144.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9494: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9505: śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9512: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,145.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9517: dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ // GarP_1,145.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9523: ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame // GarP_1,145.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9528: gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:9530: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam /
GP12garup1_u:9533: yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā // GarP_1,145.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9548: pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha /
GP12garup1_u:9553: ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe // GarP_1,145.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9554: tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:9556: yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare /
GP12garup1_u:9560: nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān // GarP_1,145.30 //
GP12garup1_u:9561: tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā /
GP12garup1_u:9566: aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi // GarP_1,145.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9570: aiṣikāstreṇa taṃ jitvā jagrāhārjuna uttamam // GarP_1,145.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9572: snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān // GarP_1,145.36 //

GP12garup1_u:9582: duṣṭānāñca vadhārthāya hyavatāraṃ karoti ca // GarP_1,145.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9587: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9593: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhirvikāro duṣṭa āmayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9596: saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam // GarP_1,146.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9598: nidānamāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpaṃ yena lakṣyate // GarP_1,146.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9602: saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,146.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9605: vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9610: sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti // GarP_1,146.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9616: sarveṣāmeva rogāṇāṃ nidānaṃ kupitā malāḥ // GarP_1,146.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9628: pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān // GarP_1,146.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9639: rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9640: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9650: indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma // GarP_1,147.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9652: aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave // GarP_1,147.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9660: na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9669: mohastandrāliptatiktāsyatā ca jñeyaṃ rūpaṃ śleṣmapittajvarasya // GarP_1,147.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9671: taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,147.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9672: sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9676: sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9679: koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam // GarP_1,147.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9690: tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā // GarP_1,147.21 //
GP12garup1_u:9692: śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite // GarP_1,147.22 //
GP12garup1_u:9693: pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9694: dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9696: caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ // GarP_1,147.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9711: iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ // GarP_1,147.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9713: prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ // GarP_1,147.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9714: pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase /
GP12garup1_u:9716: dāhaḥ pittayute miśraṃ miśre 'ntaḥ saṃśraye punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9717: jvare 'dhikaṃ vikārāḥ syurantaḥ kṣobho malagrahaḥ // GarP_1,147.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9718: bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9720: vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt /
GP12garup1_u:9721: varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pittaśleṣmānvitaṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9722: kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9739: malaṃ jvaroṣṇadhātūnvā sa śīghraṃ kṣapayettataḥ // GarP_1,147.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9742: prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:9743: ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,147.48 //
GP12garup1_u:9744: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:9745: eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9751: doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī // GarP_1,147.52 //
GP12garup1_u:9753: kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate // GarP_1,147.53 //
GP12garup1_u:9756: āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9759: doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //
GP12garup1_u:9777: kramo yatnena vicchinnaḥ satāpo lakṣyate jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.65 //
GP12garup1_u:9782: bhūmau sthitaṃ jalaiḥ siktaṃ kālaṃ naiva pratīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:9783: aṅkurāya yathā bījaṃ doṣabījaṃ bhavettathā // GarP_1,147.68 //
GP12garup1_u:9787: utkleśo gauravaṃ dainyaṃ bhaṅgo 'ṅgānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇam // GarP_1,147.70 //
GP12garup1_u:9793: svedo 'titṛṣṇā vamanaṃ daurgandhyaṃ vā sahiṣṇutā // GarP_1,147.73 //
GP12garup1_u:9796: antardāho bahiḥ śaityaṃ śvāso hikkā hi majjame /
GP12garup1_u:9799: uttarottaraduḥ sādhyāḥ pañcānye tu viparyaye // GarP_1,147.76 //
GP12garup1_u:9805: sa vai hāridrako nāma jvarabhedo 'ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,147.79 //
GP12garup1_u:9807: tīkṣṇo 'tha vā divā mando jāyate rātrijo jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.80 //
GP12garup1_u:9811: tadardhaṃ śītalaṃ dehe hyardhaṃ coṣṇaṃ prajāyate // GarP_1,147.82 //
GP12garup1_u:9812: kāye pittaṃ yadā nyastaṃ śleṣmā cānte vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9813: uṣṇatvaṃ tena dehasya śītatvaṃ karapādayoḥ // GarP_1,147.83 //
GP12garup1_u:9819: svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛtiyogimano 'nnalipsā kaṇḍūśca mūrdhni vigatjvaralakṣaṇāni // GarP_1,147.86 //
GP12garup1_u:9820: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaranidānādikaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9827: kupitaṃ paittikaiḥ pittaṃ dravaṃ raktañca mūrchati // GarP_1,148.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9833: chardhitaśchardibai bhatsyaṃ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ // GarP_1,148.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9841: bahvauṣadhāni pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham // GarP_1,148.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9842: anubandhī kapho yatra tatra tasyāpi śuddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:9843: kaṣāyāḥ svādavo yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalā hitāḥ // GarP_1,148.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9847: anubandhi balaṃ yasya śāntapittanarasya ca // GarP_1,148.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9851: na hi saṃśodhanaṃ kiñcidasya ca pratilominaḥ // GarP_1,148.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9854: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:9855: tatra doṣo 'tra gamanaṃ śivāstra iva lakṣyate // GarP_1,148.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9857: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe raktapittanidānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9861: āśukārī yataḥ kāsaḥ sa evātaḥ pravakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:9864: teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ // GarP_1,149.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9866: ūrdhvaṃ pravṛttaḥ prāpyo rastasminkaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan // GarP_1,149.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9868: kṣipannivākṣiṇī kliṣṭasvaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan // GarP_1,149.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9872: soṃgaharṣo kaphaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṛchrānmuktvālpatāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,149.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9874: pittāsṛgvamanaṃ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṃ dhūmako madaḥ // GarP_1,149.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9880: upasyantaḥ kṣato vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī // GarP_1,149.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9881: kupitaḥ kurute kāsaṃ kaphaṃ tena saśoṇitam /
GP12garup1_u:9882: pītaṃ śyāvañca śuṣkañca grathitaṃ kupitaṃ bahu // GarP_1,149.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9893: supyate tudyata iva hṛdayaṃ pacatīva ca /
GP12garup1_u:9898: yāpyau vā balināṃ tadvatkṣatajo 'pi navau tu tau // GarP_1,149.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9900: miśrā yāpyāśca ye sarve jarasaḥ sthavirasya ca // GarP_1,149.20 //
GP12garup1_u:9903: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kāsanidānā nāmaikonapañcāśaduttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9917: preritaḥ prerayankṣudraṃ svayaṃ sa samalaṃ marut /
GP12garup1_u:9918: pratilomaṃ śirā gacchedudīrya pavanaḥ kapham // GarP_1,150.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9927: sa yāpyastamakaḥ sādhyo narasya balino bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:9938: yo dīrghamucchvasityūrdhvaṃ na ca pratyāharatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,150.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9940: ūrdhvaṃ samīkṣate bhrāntamakṣiṇī paritaḥ kṣipan // GarP_1,150.17 //
GP12garup1_u:9942: ete sidhyeyuravyaktāḥ vyaktāḥ prāṇaharā dhruvam // GarP_1,150.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9943: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śvāsanidānā nāma pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9949: hikrā bhakṣyodbhavā kṣudrā yamalā mahatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:9952: karoti hikrāṃ śvasanaḥ mandaśabdāṃ kṣudhānugām // GarP_1,151.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9953: samaṃ sandhyānnapānena yā prayāti ca sānnajā /
GP12garup1_u:9954: āyāsātpavanaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣudrāṃ hikrāṃ pravartayet // GarP_1,151.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9956: vṛddhimāyāsato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdabam // GarP_1,151.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9958: pariṇāmānmukhe vṛddhiṃ pariṇāme ca gacchati // GarP_1,151.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9959: kampayantī śiro grīvāṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:9961: yamalā veginī hikrā pariṇāmavatī ca sā /
GP12garup1_u:9963: stambhayantī tanuṃ vācaṃ smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca muñcatī /
GP12garup1_u:9969: gambhīreṇa nidānena gambhīrā tu susādhayet // GarP_1,151.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9970: ādye dve varjayedanye sarvaliṅgāṃ ca veginīm /
GP12garup1_u:9973: sarve 'pi rogā nāśāya na tvevaṃ śāghrakāriṇaḥ // GarP_1,151.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9974: hikrāśvāsau yathā tau hi mṛtyukāle kṛtālayau // GarP_1,151.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9975: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hikrānidānā nāmaikapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9983: yacca rājā ca yakṣmā ca rājayakṣmā tato mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9988: tairudīrṇo 'nilaḥ pittaṃ vyarthaṃ codīrya sarvataḥ // GarP_1,152.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9990: mukhāni srotasāṃ ruddhvā tathaivātivisṛjya vā // GarP_1,152.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9992: rūpaṃ bhaviṣyatastasya pratiśyāyo bhṛśaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,152.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9998: bāhvoḥ pratodo jihvāyāḥ kāye baibhatsyadarśanam // GarP_1,152.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10004: jyotirdivi davāgnīnāṃ jvalatāṃ ca mahīruhām // GarP_1,152.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10007: sthite pārśve ca rugbodhe sandhisthe bhavati jvaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10018: vidāho manasaḥ sthāne bhavantyanye hyupadravāḥ // GarP_1,152.20 //
GP12garup1_u:10021: raso hyasya na raktāya māṃsāya kurute tu tat /
GP12garup1_u:10022: upaṣṭabdhaḥ samantācca kevalaṃ vartate kṣayī // GarP_1,152.22 //
GP12garup1_u:10026: svarabhedo bhavettasya kṣāmo rūkṣaścalaḥ svaraḥ // GarP_1,152.24 //
GP12garup1_u:10028: pittāttālugale dāhaḥ śoṣo bhavati santatam // GarP_1,152.25 //
GP12garup1_u:10030: svayaṃ viruddhaiḥ sarvaistu sarvāliṅgaiḥ kṣayo bhavet // GarP_1,152.26 //
GP12garup1_u:10033: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yakṣmanidānā nāma dvipañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10052: madhuraṃ lavaṇaṃ bhūri prasaktaṃ lomaharṣaṇam // GarP_1,153.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10058: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'rocakanidānā nāma tripañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10063: kṛmihṛdrogaliṅgaiśca smṛtāḥ pañca tu hṛdgatāḥ // GarP_1,154.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10065: bhidyate śuṣyate stabdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śūnyatā bhramaḥ // GarP_1,154.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10073: tamaḥ praveśo hṛllāsaḥ śothaḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaphastrutiḥ // GarP_1,154.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10078: ṣaṣṭhī syādupasargācca vātapitte ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,154.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10082: saṃśoṣya tṛṣṇā jāyante tāsāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇam // GarP_1,154.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10099: yā ca pānātipānotthā tīkṣṇāgre snehapākajā // GarP_1,154.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10103: yā tṛṣṇā jāyate tīvrā sopasargātmikā smṛtā // GarP_1,154.20 //
GP12garup1_u:10104: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āmlapittanidānā nāma catuḥ pañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10118: madhyamottamayoḥ sandhiṃ prāpya rājāsano madaḥ // GarP_1,155.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10123: niśceṣṭaḥ sannavākśete tṛtīye 'tra made sthitaḥ // GarP_1,155.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10125: dharmādharmaṃ sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ mānānarthaṃ hitāhitam // GarP_1,155.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10132: vibhedaṃ prasabhaṃ tṛṣṇā saumyo glānirjvaro 'ruciḥ // GarP_1,155.11 //
GP12garup1_u:10136: pittāddāhajvaraḥ svedo moho nityaṃ ca vibhramaḥ // GarP_1,155.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10138: sarvaje sarvaliṅgatvaṃ jñātvā madyaṃ pibettu yaḥ // GarP_1,155.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10145: vikāraiḥ kliśyate jātu na sa śarīramānasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10160: kāsaḥ śyāvāruṇā cchāyā mūrchāyāṃ mārutātmakaḥ // GarP_1,155.25 //
GP12garup1_u:10161: pittena raktaṃ pītaṃ vā nabhaḥ paśyanviśettamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10175: mriyeta śīghraṃ śīghraṃ ceccikitsā na prayujyate // GarP_1,155.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10179: yuktāyuktaṃ ca samaṃ yuktiṃ yuṅkte na madyena // GarP_1,155.34 //
GP12garup1_u:10182: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe madātyayādinidānaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10186: athārśasāṃ nidānaṃ ca vyākhyāsyami ca suśruta / /
GP12garup1_u:10187: sarvadā prāṇināṃ māṃse kīlakāḥ prabhavanti ye // GarP_1,156.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10197: tatra hetuḥ sahotthānāṃ bālye bījopataptatā // GarP_1,156.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10199: devatānāṃ prakope hi sānnipātasya cānyataḥ // GarP_1,156.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10221: mārutaḥ purato mūḍhaḥ prāyo nābheradhaścaran // GarP_1,156.17 //
GP12garup1_u:10226: indriyārtheṣu laulyaṃ ca krodho duḥ khopacārataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10227: āśaṅkā grahaṇī śothaḥ pāṇḍugulmodareṣu ca // GarP_1,156.20 //
GP12garup1_u:10233: kṛśo bhṛśaṃ hatotsāho dīnaḥ kṣāmo 'tha niṣprabhaḥ // GarP_1,156.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10271: na stravanti na bhidyante pāṇḍusnigdhatvagādayaḥ // GarP_1,156.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10277: kekābhaḥ pīḍyate duḥ khaiḥ śoṇitakṣayasambhavaiḥ // GarP_1,156.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10283: tena tīvrā rujā koṣṭhapṛṣṭhahṛtpārśvagā bhavet // GarP_1,156.48 //
GP12garup1_u:10285: bastau ca sutarāṃ śūlo gaṇḍaśvayathusaṃbhavaḥ // GarP_1,156.49 //
GP12garup1_u:10290: ete ca vātajā rogā jāyante bhṛśadāruṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10293: sahajāni tu doṣāṇi yāni cābhyantare valau // GarP_1,156.53 //
GP12garup1_u:10295: dvandvajāni dvitīyāyāṃ valā yānyāśritāni ca // GarP_1,156.54 //
GP12garup1_u:10297: bāhyāyāṃ tu valau jātānyekadoṣolbaṇāni ca // GarP_1,156.55 //
GP12garup1_u:10299: meḍhrādiṣvapi vakṣyante yathāsvaṃ nābhijāni tu // GarP_1,156.56 //
GP12garup1_u:10301: vyāno gṛhītvā śleṣmāṇaṃ karotyarśastvaco bahiḥ // GarP_1,156.57 //
GP12garup1_u:10308: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'śonidānā nāma ṣaṭpañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10325: rūkṣaṃ saphenamacchaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ va muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10334: bhayena kṣubhite citte śāyite drāvayetsa (ccha) kṛt // GarP_1,157.11 //
GP12garup1_u:10341: atīsāreṣu yo nāti yatnavān grahaṇīgadaḥ // GarP_1,157.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10343: sāmaṃ śakṛnnirāmaṃ vā jīrṇaṃ yenātisāryate // GarP_1,157.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10345: sāmaṃśīrṇamajīrṇena jīrṇe pakvaṃ tu naiva ca // GarP_1,157.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10348: sa caturdhā pṛthagdoṣaiḥ sannipātācca jāyate // GarP_1,157.17 //
GP12garup1_u:10352: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kārśyaṃ vamaka stamako jvaraḥ // GarP_1,157.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10359: cirādduḥ khaṃ dravaṃ śuṣkaṃ tundāraṃ śabdaphenavat /
GP12garup1_u:10374: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍetisāranidāna nāma saptañcāśaduttaraśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10389: sapicchaṃ saniruddhaṃ ca sarvaiḥ sarvātmakaṃ malaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10391: mūtraṃ sapittaṃ sakaphaṃ saśukraṃ vā tadā kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:10392: saṃjāyate 'śmarī ghorā pittaṃ goriva rocanā // GarP_1,158.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10398: baddhaṃ baddhvā sukhaṃ mehedacchaṃ gomedakopamam // GarP_1,158.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10404: pittena dahyate bastiḥ pacyamāna ivoṣṇavān // GarP_1,158.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10406: bastirnistudyata iva śleṣmaṇā śītalo guruḥ // GarP_1,158.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10407: aśmarī mahatī ślakṣṇā madhuvarṇātha vā sitā /
GP12garup1_u:10408: etā bhavanti bālanāṃ teṣāmeva ca bhūyasām // GarP_1,158.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10410: sukrāśmarī tu mahatī jāyate śukradhāraṇāt // GarP_1,158.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10416: asau vā vāyunā bhinnā sā tvasminnamulomage // GarP_1,158.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10422: binduśaśca pravarteta mūtraṃ bastau tu pīḍite // GarP_1,158.22 //
GP12garup1_u:10433: na nireti niruddhaṃ vā mūtrātītaṃ tadalparuk // GarP_1,158.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10438: ākṣiptamalpamūtrasya vastau nābhau ca vā male /
GP12garup1_u:10441: antarvasti mukhe tṛṣṇā sthirālpaṃ sahasā bhavet // GarP_1,158.31 //
GP12garup1_u:10443: mūtritasya striyaṃ yāto vāyunā śukramuddhṛtam // GarP_1,158.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10451: mūtraṃ vartayate pūrvaṃ saraktaṃ raktameva vā // GarP_1,158.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10452: uṣṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kṛcchrāduṣṇavātaṃ vadanti tam /
GP12garup1_u:10455: pittaṃ kapho dvādapi vā saṃhanyetenilenacet // GarP_1,158.38 //
GP12garup1_u:10456: kṛcchrānmūtraṃ tadā pītaṃ raktaṃ śvetaṃ ghanaṃ sṛjet /
GP12garup1_u:10459: iti vistārataḥ proktā rogā mūtrapravartitāḥ // GarP_1,158.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10460: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mūtrāghātamūtrākṛcchanidāna nāmāṣṭapañcāśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10465: pramehā viṃśatistatra śleṣmaṇo daśa pittataḥ // GarP_1,159.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10471: majjābhaṃ majjamiśraṃ vā majjamehī muhurmuhuḥ // GarP_1,159.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10473: salasīkaṃ vivaddhaṃ ca hastimehī pramehati // GarP_1,159.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10474: madhumehī madhusamaṃ jāyate sa kila dvidhā /
GP12garup1_u:10479: madhuraṃ yacca meheṣu prāyo madhviva mehati // GarP_1,159.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10499: same samakṛtā doṣe paramatvāttathāpi ca // GarP_1,159.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10509: śukrābhaṃ śukramiśraṃ vā śukramehī pramehati // GarP_1,159.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10519: sadāhā kūrmasaṃsthānā jñeyā kacchapikā budhaiḥ // GarP_1,159.28 //
GP12garup1_u:10520: mahatī piḍikā nīlā vinatā nāma sā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:10522: raktā sitā sphoṭacitā dāruṇā tvalajī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:10523: masūrākṛti saṃsthānā vijñeyā tu masūrikā // GarP_1,159.30 //
GP12garup1_u:10525: putriṇī mahatī cālpā susūkṣmā piḍikā smṛtā // GarP_1,159.31 //
GP12garup1_u:10527: vidradherlakṣaṇairyuktā jñeyā vidradhikā tu sā // GarP_1,159.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10528: putriṇī ca vidārī ca duḥ sahā bahumedasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10538: bhaviṣyato mehagaṇasya rūpaṃ mūtre 'pi dhāvanti pipīlikāśca // GarP_1,159.37 //
GP12garup1_u:10539: tṛṣṇā pramehe madhuraṃ prapicchaṃ madhvāmaye syādvividhovikāraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10540: sampūraṇādvā kaphasambhavaḥ syātkṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣvanilātmako vā // GarP_1,159.38 //
GP12garup1_u:10541: sampūrṇarūpāḥ kaphapittamehāḥ krameṇa ye vai ratisambhavāśca /
GP12garup1_u:10542: sakrāmate pittakṛtāstu yāpyāḥ sādhyo 'sti meho yadi nāsti diṣṭam // GarP_1,159.39 //
GP12garup1_u:10543: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pramehanidāna nāmaikonaṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10556: vṛttaḥ syādāyato yo vā smṛto rogaḥ sa vidradhiḥ // GarP_1,160.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10558: vahate tatra tatrāṅge dāruṇe grathito 'strutaḥ // GarP_1,160.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10573: kṣatottho vāyunā kṣiptaḥ sa raktaḥ pittamīrayan /
GP12garup1_u:10576: nābhau hi dhmātaṃ cedbastau mūtrakṛcchrañcajāyate // GarP_1,160.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10580: kukṣipārśvāntare caiva kukṣau doṣopajanma ca // GarP_1,160.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10582: pārśvayośca vyathā pāyau pavanasya nirodhanam // GarP_1,160.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10590: mṛte tu garbhage caiva sambhavecchvayatharghanaḥ // GarP_1,160.20 //
GP12garup1_u:10596: doṣo medaḥsu tatrāste savṛddhiḥ saptadhā gadaḥ // GarP_1,160.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10598: vātapūrṇaḥ kharasparśo rūkṣo vātācca dāhakṛt // GarP_1,160.24 //
GP12garup1_u:10612: supīḍito 'ntaḥ svanavān prayāti pradhmāpayanneti punaśca mūrdhni // GarP_1,160.31 //
GP12garup1_u:10616: ārtavasya ca doṣeṇa nārīṇāṃ jāyate 'ṣṭamaḥ // GarP_1,160.33 //
GP12garup1_u:10622: śuddho vā suddhihānirvā bhajeta spandanāni vā // GarP_1,160.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10630: tataḥ piṇḍakavacchleṣmā malasaṃsṛṣṭa eva ca // GarP_1,160.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10633: vedhaḥ sūcyeva viḍbhraṃśaḥ kṛcchre mūtraṃ pravartate /
GP12garup1_u:10634: gātre mukhe pade śothaḥ hyagnimāndyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,160.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10640: hīyate dīpyate śleṣmā svasthānaṃ dahatīvaca // GarP_1,160.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10648: ṛtau yā caiva śūlārtā yati vā yonirogiṇī // GarP_1,160.49 //
GP12garup1_u:10658: pākañcireṇa bhajate naidhate vidradhiḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,160.54 //
GP12garup1_u:10672: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10677: rogāḥ sarve 'pi mandāgnau sutarāmudarāṇi tu // GarP_1,161.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10681: ādhmāpya kukṣimudaramaṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ // GarP_1,161.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10685: puruṣāḥ syuḥ pretarūpā bhāvinastasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,161.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10687: jīrṇānnaṃ yo na jānāti so 'pathyaṃ sevatenaraḥ // GarP_1,161.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10694: sarvatra toye maraṇaṃ śocanaṃ tatra niṣphalam /
GP12garup1_u:10699: nātimātraṃ bhavellaulyaṃ narasya virasaṃ mukham // GarP_1,161.12 //
GP12garup1_u:10705: ādhmātamudare śabdamadbhutaṃ vā karoti saḥ // GarP_1,161.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10707: pittodare jvaro mūrchā dāhitvaṃ kaṭukāsyatā // GarP_1,161.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10732: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddhamalo gude /
GP12garup1_u:10735: apāno jaṭhare tena saṃruddho jvararukkaraḥ // GarP_1,161.30 //
GP12garup1_u:10739: nābherupari ca prāyo gopucchākṛti jāyate // GarP_1,161.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10745: vardhate tadadho nābherāśu caiti jalātmatām // GarP_1,161.35 //
GP12garup1_u:10746: udrikte doṣarūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsatṛṭbhramaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10761: hīnabalaṃ tathā ghoraṃ nāḍyāṃ spṛṣṭañca sapati // GarP_1,161.43 //
GP12garup1_u:10765: janmanaivodaraṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ kṛcchratamaṃ matam // GarP_1,161.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10766: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10775: tvaṅmāṃsayostu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān // GarP_1,162.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10776: svayaṃ haridrā hāridraṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ teṣu cādhikam /
GP12garup1_u:10777: yāto 'yaṃ prahatedugraḥ sa rogastena gauravam // GarP_1,162.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10783: mandaśaktirjvarī śvāsī karṇaśūlī tathā bhramī // GarP_1,162.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10797: srotasāṃ saṃkṣayaṃ kuryādanurudhya ca pūrvavat // GarP_1,162.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10800: yaḥ pittarogī seveta pittalaṃ tasya kāmalam /
GP12garup1_u:10805: upekṣayā ca śothādyāḥ sakṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ // GarP_1,162.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10807: vātapitte bhramastṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣo mṛdujvaraḥ // GarP_1,162.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10810: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ sa evāto nigadyate /
GP12garup1_u:10823: pacyate mārgagamanaṃ yānena kṣobhiṇāpi vā // GarP_1,162.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10835: śīghraṃ nāsau vā praśamenmadhye prāgdahate tanum // GarP_1,162.33 //
GP12garup1_u:10837: sābhilāṣī śakṛdbhedo gandhaḥ sparśasaho mṛduḥ // GarP_1,162.34 //
GP12garup1_u:10850: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10857: yathāttarañca duḥ sādhyastatra doṣo yathāyatham // GarP_1,163.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10859: dehe śīghraṃ viśantīha te 'ntare hi sthitā bahiḥ // GarP_1,163.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10872: yaṃyaṃ deśaṃ visarpaśca visarpati bhavetsasaḥ // GarP_1,163.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10873: śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāsu ca cīyate /
GP12garup1_u:10874: agnidagdha iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghragatvāddrutaṃ sa ca // GarP_1,163.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10881: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvātaṃ bahudhā kapham /
GP12garup1_u:10891: āmopaveśanaṃ lepaḥ srotasāṃ sa ca sarpati // GarP_1,163.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10898: śavagandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardamākhyamuśanti tam // GarP_1,163.21 //
GP12garup1_u:10905: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vīsarpanidānaṃ nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10914: tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyaṃ śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭhamuśantitam // GarP_1,164.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10920: kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // GarP_1,164.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10922: vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt // GarP_1,164.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10926: puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,164.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10928: puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10936: kāpālaṃ todabahulaṃ tatkuṣṭhaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,164.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10940: sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10949: antā rūkṣaṃ bahiḥ snigdhamantarghṛṣṭaṃ rajaḥ kiret /
GP12garup1_u:10960: puṇḍarīkaṃ bhavettaddhi citaṃ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ // GarP_1,164.26 //
GP12garup1_u:10962: sūkṣmā śyāmāruṇā rūkṣā prāyaḥ sphikpāṇikūrpare // GarP_1,164.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10972: tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā // GarP_1,164.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10982: sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //
GP12garup1_u:10991: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11006: śvetāstāmrāvabhāsāśca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te // GarP_1,165.6 //
GP12garup1_u:11008: cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //
GP12garup1_u:11020: sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //
GP12garup1_u:11023: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11028: sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,166.1 //
GP12garup1_u:11030: sa viśvakarmā viśvātmā viśvarūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,166.2 //
GP12garup1_u:11032: tadvaduktaṃ ca yatnena yatitavyamataḥ sadā // GarP_1,166.3 //
GP12garup1_u:11054: tatra sthānasthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathukṛcchratām // GarP_1,166.14 //
GP12garup1_u:11058: yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11061: tadāvaṣṭabhya hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet // GarP_1,166.17 //
GP12garup1_u:11062: sakṣipetparito gātraṃ hanuṃ vā cāsya nāmayat /
GP12garup1_u:11064: kapota iva kūjecca niḥ saṃgaḥ sopatantrakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11065: sa eva vāmanāsāyāṃ yuktastu marutā hṛdi // GarP_1,166.19 //
GP12garup1_u:11069: vyāpnoti sakalaṃ dehaṃ yatra cāyāmyate punaḥ // GarP_1,166.21 //
GP12garup1_u:11071: karoti jṛmbhāṃ sadanaṃ daśanānāṃ hatodyamam // GarP_1,166.22 //
GP12garup1_u:11073: dehasya bahirāyāmaṃ pṛṣṭhato hṛdaye śiraḥ // GarP_1,166.23 //
GP12garup1_u:11074: uraścotkṣipyate tatra skandho vā nāmyate tadā /
GP12garup1_u:11075: danteṣvāsye ca vaivarṇyaṃ hyasvedastatra gātrataḥ // GarP_1,166.24 //
GP12garup1_u:11091: tato 'sya kurute mṛdvīṃ vākśaktiṃ stabdhanetratām // GarP_1,166.32 //
GP12garup1_u:11097: raktamāśritya ca śirāḥ kuryānmūrdhadharāḥ śirāḥ? // GarP_1,166.35 //
GP12garup1_u:11099: tanuṃ gṛhītvā vāyuśca snāyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,166.36 //
GP12garup1_u:11107: asādhya eva sarvo hi bhaveddaṇḍāpatānakaḥ // GarP_1,166.40 //
GP12garup1_u:11111: bāhvoḥ karmakṣayakarī vipūcī veti socyate // GarP_1,166.42 //
GP12garup1_u:11113: tadā khañjo bhavejjantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnordvayorvadhāt // GarP_1,166.43 //
GP12garup1_u:11121: tadāsthi snāti tenorostathā śītānilena tu // GarP_1,166.47 //
GP12garup1_u:11129: satikṣepaṃ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate // GarP_1,166.51 //
GP12garup1_u:11130: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṃ cāpi suptakau /
GP12garup1_u:11134: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11141: sthūlānāṃ sukhināṃ cāpi kupyate vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.2 //
GP12garup1_u:11145: tathā vāto gude pīḍāṃ balāsaṃ vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.4 //
GP12garup1_u:11151: bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhurāvirbhavanti ca // GarP_1,167.7 //

GP12garup1_u:12047: vaṭikā modako vāpi cūrṇa syātsarvaroganut // GarP_1,174.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12049: lavaṇaiḥ kaṭukairyuktaṃ yathālābhaṃ ca geganut // GarP_1,174.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12051: sudhāṃ ca bālāṃ gaṇikāṃ saptaparṇasuvarcikām // GarP_1,174.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12063: ropaṇaṃ mṛdubhāvaṃ ca tailenānena kārayet // GarP_1,174.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12064: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brāhmīghṛtādivarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12074: vātajvaraharaḥ kvātho guḍūcyā mustakena ca // GarP_1,175.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12077: sājyaḥ kvāthaḥ śleṣmajaṃ tu saśuṇṭhiḥ sadurālabhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12082: jvaranucca kṛtaḥ kvāthastathā vai suradāruṇā // GarP_1,175.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12089: āmalakyā guḍūcyā ca madhuyuktaṃ sacandanam // GarP_1,175.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12099: bilvādipa pañcamūlasya kvāthaḥ syādvātike jvare // GarP_1,175.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12101: vātajvare tvayaṃ kvātho dattaḥ śāntikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,175.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12103: vidhāne kriyamāṇe 'pi ysaya saṃjñā na jāyate // GarP_1,175.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12105: tiktā pāṭhā parpaṭāśca viśālā triphalā trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12107: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaraharanānāyogādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12120: baddhamūlā ghanā dīrghāḥ snagdhāḥ syurnotpatanti ca // GarP_1,176.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12127: nīlī ca karavīraṃ ca guḍametaiḥ samaṃ śṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12131: jīrṇaṃ pakvaṃ lohacūrṇaṃ kāñjikaṃ kṛṣṇakeśakṛt // GarP_1,176.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12134: saindhavaṃ ca vacā hiṅgu kuṣṭhaṃ nāgeśvaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12135: śatapuṣpā devadāru ebhistailaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,176.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12147: valkalaiḥ sādhitairliptaṃ liṅgaṃ tena vivardhate // GarP_1,176.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12148: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe keśotpattyādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12160: puṣpaṃ rātryandhatāṃ hanti timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12161: caturbhāgāni śaṅkhasya tadardhena manaḥ śilā // GarP_1,177.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12163: chāyāśuṣkāṃ tu vaṭikāṃ kṛtvā nayanamañjayet // GarP_1,177.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12164: timiraṃ paṭalaṃ hanti piciṭaṃ ca mahauṣadham /
GP12garup1_u:12165: trikaṭu triphalāṃ caiva karaṃ jasya phalāni ca // GarP_1,177.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12171: saindhaṃvaṃ kaṭutailaṃ ca apāmārgasya mūlakam // GarP_1,177.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12174: oṃ dadru sara kroṃ hrīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ dadru sara hrīṃ hrīṃ oṃ uṃ ū sara krīṃ krīṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12175: ādyā hi vaśāmāyānti mantreṇānena cāñjanāt // GarP_1,177.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12182: prabhāte netrarogaiśca nityaṃ sarvaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,177.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12188: guñjāmūlaṃ chāgamūtre ghṛṣṭaṃ timiranucca tat raupyatāmrasuvarṇānāṃ hastaghṛṣṭaśalākayā // GarP_1,177.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12197: dhuttūrakaṃ gairikaṃ ca etaiḥ sādhitasikthakam // GarP_1,177.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12199: jātīpatraṃ ca carvitvā vidhṛtaṃ mukharoganut // GarP_1,177.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12201: muṣṭakaṃ kuṣṭhamelā ca yaṣṭikaṃ madhuvālakam // GarP_1,177.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12203: kaṣāyaṃ kaṭukaṃ vāpi tiktaśākasya bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,177.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12205: dantavraṇāni sarvāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchantyanena tu // GarP_1,177.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12209: mātuluṅgadalānyelā yaṣṭī madhu ca pippalī // GarP_1,177.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12210: jātīpatramathaiṣāṃ ca cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā tathā kṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12222: trisaptāhaṃ vāḥ piṣṭāni jyotiṣmatyāḥ phalāni hi /
GP12garup1_u:12227: dvibhāgaṃ chāgadugdhena tailaprasthaṃ tu sādhitam // GarP_1,177.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12231: ebhiśca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,177.39 //
GP12garup1_u:12235: dāhaṃ pittaṃ jvaraṃ śoṣaṃ mūrchāṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,177.41 //
GP12garup1_u:12240: dugdhaṃ pītaṃ tu saṃyuktaṃ gopurīṣarasena ca /
GP12garup1_u:12247: siddhaṃ tailaṃ kāñjikena tathā sarjarasena ca // GarP_1,177.47 //
GP12garup1_u:12251: śauvāñjanaṃ gokṣuraṃ vā varuṇacchannameva ca // GarP_1,177.49 //
GP12garup1_u:12252: saubhāñjanasya mūlaṃ ca etaiḥ kvathitavāri ca /
GP12garup1_u:12260: pītaṃ takreṇa mūlaṃ ca ārdrasya tagarasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12271: sarjarasāḥ sikthakaṃ ca jīrakaṃ ca harītakī /
GP12garup1_u:12279: pākaṃ ca vedanāṃ caiva saṃspṛśedvṛṣabhadhvaja // GarP_1,177.62 //
GP12garup1_u:12282: śarapuṅkhā lajjālukā pāṭhā caiṣāṃ tu mūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:12285: pākapūtiṃ vedanāṃ ca hanti vai rohito vraṇe // GarP_1,177.65 //
GP12garup1_u:12289: bhakṣayitvā hyajīrṇasya nāśo bhavati śaṅkara / // GarP_1,177.67 //
GP12garup1_u:12300: kṛtvā tu vaṭikāṃ nārī tilakena vaśī bhavet // GarP_1,177.71 //
GP12garup1_u:12305: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha iti sarvavaśyaprayogeṣu prayuktaḥ sarvakāmakṛt // GarP_1,177.73 //
GP12garup1_u:12307: citāgnau bhasma tacchatrordattaṃ śirasi śaṅkara // GarP_1,177.74 //
GP12garup1_u:12309: niḥ kṣiptaṃ ca purīṣaṃ vai vanamūṣikacarmaṇi // GarP_1,177.75 //
GP12garup1_u:12311: kṛṣṇakākasya raktena yasya nāma pralipya ca // GarP_1,177.76 //
GP12garup1_u:12312: cyutadale madhyamadhye tato niḥ kṣipyate hara / /
GP12garup1_u:12313: sa khādyate kākavṛndairnārī puruṣa eva ca // GarP_1,177.77 //
GP12garup1_u:12324: śarīraṃ yena sa pumānvṛddherdarpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_1,177.81 //
GP12garup1_u:12328: tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,177.83 //
GP12garup1_u:12330: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12332: sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12333: niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //
GP12garup1_u:12337: chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet // GarP_1,177.87 //
GP12garup1_u:12338: mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:12342: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12349: tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12352: cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12354: vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:12355: sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet // GarP_1,178.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12356: khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12359: guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyo bhavet // GarP_1,178.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12368: oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā /
GP12garup1_u:12372: oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12374: strīṇāmagre bhrāmayacca kṣaṇādvai sā vaśe bhavet // GarP_1,178.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12375: brahmadaṇḍīṃ vacāṃ patraṃ madhunā saha peṣayet /
