GP12garup1_u:12379: bhṛṅgarājasya mūlaṃ tu piṣṭaṃ śukreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:12380: akṣiṇī cāñjayitvā tu vaśī karyānnaraṃ kila // GarP_1,178.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12384: aṅguṣṭhe ca pade gulphe jānau ca jaghane tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12385: nābhau vakṣasi kukṣau ca kakṣe kaṇṭhe kapolake // GarP_1,178.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12386: oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candrakalāḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12387: strīṇāṃ pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitā nṛṇām // GarP_1,178.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12389: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12393: oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me /
GP12garup1_u:12408: tatpītvā labhate garbhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,178.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12412: palāśasya tu bījāni kṣaudreṇa saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12414: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hyaṣṭasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12421: dantāḥ syurlohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetā rudra na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12422: mūlakaṃ svidya mandāgnau rasaṃ tasya prapūrayet /
GP12garup1_u:12428: pacettailaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ naśyetkledaḥ prapūraṇāt // GarP_1,179.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12430: satapuṣpāvacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigra rasāñjanam // GarP_1,179.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12432: tathā granthirviḍaṃ mustaṃ madhuyuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,179.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12434: pakvatailaṃ haredāśu strāvādīṃśca na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12436: haridrā nimbapatrāṇi pippalyo maricāni ca // GarP_1,179.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12438: gomūtreṇa ca piṣṭvaiva kṛtvā ca vaṭikāṃ hara / /
GP12garup1_u:12441: eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarvanetrāmayā pahā // GarP_1,179.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12442: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12446: vacā māṃsī ca bilvañca tagaraṃ padmakesaram /
GP12garup1_u:12453: āliptā strī vaśaṃ yāti nānyaṃ puruṣamicchati // GarP_1,180.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12454: oṃ raktacāmuṇḍe amukaṃ me vaśamānaya ānaya oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hraḥ phaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:12455: imaṃ japtvāyutaṃ mantraṃ tilakena ca śaṅkara / /
GP12garup1_u:12458: madhu sarpiḥ sitāyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ tadbhagalepanāt // GarP_1,180.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12460: śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam // GarP_1,180.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12462: samūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇājyena peṣayet // GarP_1,180.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12464: daśavāraṃ prasūtāpi punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,180.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12465: sarṣapāśca vacā caiva madanasya phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12472: tena lepanato yonau bhagastambhastu jāyate // GarP_1,180.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12473: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12478: tathā payaḥ samāyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ śūlaharaṃ param // GarP_1,181.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12479: harītakī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12480: kāse śvāse ca hikkāyāṃ lihyātkṣaudraṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,181.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12482: naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaśca balavattaraḥ // GarP_1,181.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12484: śvāsaṃ kāsañca hikkāñca madhumiśraṃ vṛṣadhvaja / // GarP_1,181.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12485: nīlotpalaṃ śarkarā ca madhukaṃ padmakaṃ samam /
GP12garup1_u:12487: śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā caiva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā /
GP12garup1_u:12493: sudhā ca haritālañca śaṅkhabhasma manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12496: śaṅkhamāmalakaṃ patraṃ dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca // GarP_1,181.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12498: snigdhāḥ śvetāśca dantāśca bhavanti vimalaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,181.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12499: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12504: hemante śiśire caiva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate // GarP_1,182.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12505: bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12512: kandarpasadṛśo martyo nityaṃ bhavati śaṅkara / // GarP_1,182.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12514: ebhiśca racitāṃ jagdhvā taruṇo balavānbhavet // GarP_1,182.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12515: hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ pītvā tu kvathitodakaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12518: durbalaśca bhavetsthūlo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12520: kṣīrāśī ca kṣayī puṣṭiṃ medhāñcaivātulāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,182.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12523: manaḥ śilā śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ tailapakvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:12524: lomāni śātayatyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12525: mālūrasya rasaṃ gṛhya jalaukāṃ tatra peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12532: muṇḍītvakca vacā mustaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12533: carvitvā ca tvimaṃ sadyo jihvayā jvalanaṃ lihet // GarP_1,182.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12537: oṃ namo bhagavate jalaṃ stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ caracara /
GP12garup1_u:12540: areryo nikhaneddvāre pañcatvamu payāti saḥ // GarP_1,182.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12543: puṣpeṇa tu samaṃ piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ palaikataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12546: brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12547: yaṣṭi madhu palaikena pakvamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet // GarP_1,182.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12553: maricaṃ dadhi kuṣṭhañca nasye pāne viṣaṃ haret // GarP_1,182.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12559: vṛścikasya viṣaṃ hanti lepo 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja / // GarP_1,182.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12565: sukhaṃ prasūyate nārī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12568: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12575: devadārurasaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet // GarP_1,183.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12585: ūrustambhaṃ jayantyā vā saptarātreṇa nāśayet // GarP_1,183.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12588: vāyuḥ snāyugataṃ caiva agnimāndyaṃ ca nāśayet // GarP_1,183.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12592: raktapittaṃ vinaśyettu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,183.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12598: śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ jvaraṃ mantreṇa vai haret /
GP12garup1_u:12599: oṃ jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa phaṭ iti // GarP_1,183.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12600: puṣpamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā haste dattvā nakhaṃ spṛśet /
GP12garup1_u:12601: cāturthiko jvaro rudra anye caiva jvarāstathā // GarP_1,183.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12602: jmbūphalaṃ haridrā ca sarpasyaiva tu kañcukam /
GP12garup1_u:12606: pāmāṃ vicarcikāṃ kuṣṭhamabhyaṅgāddhi vraṇāni vai // GarP_1,183.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12608: plīhā vinaśyate rudra tathā sūraṇasevanāt // GarP_1,183.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12612: saindhavañca viḍaṅgāni somarājī tu sarṣapāḥ // GarP_1,183.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12615: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tryaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12623: pānādarśoharaṃ syācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,184.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12625: cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu lepo 'yaṃ arśarogaharaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,184.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12630: citāgniḥ khañjarīṭasya viṣṭhā pheno hayasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12632: adṛśyastridaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ punarmānavaiḥ śiva // GarP_1,184.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12633: tilatailaṃ yavāndagdhvā maṣīṃ kṛtvā tu lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:12634: tenaiva saha tailena agnidagdhaḥ sukhī bhavet // GarP_1,184.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12636: oṃ namo bhagavate ṭha ṭha chindhi chindhi jvalanaṃ prajvalitaṃ nāśaya nāśaya huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,184.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12637: kare baddhaṃ tu nirguṇḍyā mūlaṃ jvaraharaṃ drutam /
GP12garup1_u:12639: haste badhvā nāśayecca arśāṃsyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12642: triphalāyāstu cūrṇaṃ hi sājyaṃ kuṣṭhavināśanam // GarP_1,184.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12644: hareddhakkāṃ śvāsakāsau pītaṃ strīṇāñca garbhakṛt // GarP_1,184.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12647: viḍaṅgaṃ madhukaṃ pāṭhāṃ māṃsīṃ sarjarasaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12648: rahidrāṃ triphalāñcaiva mapāmārgaṃ manaḥ śilām // GarP_1,184.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12650: yoniṃ liṅgaṃ ca mrakṣeta strīpusoḥ syātpriyaṃ mithaḥ // GarP_1,184.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12651: namaste īśavaradāya ākarṣiṇi vikarṣiṇi mugdhe svāhā iti /
GP12garup1_u:12654: bīje naiṣāṃ jātikāyā rasena rasamardanam // GarP_1,184.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12660: lāṅgalikāyāḥ śākhā ca svarṇañca dahanādbhavet // GarP_1,184.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12665: vismayaṃ kurute caiva vṛṣavannātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,184.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12666: rātrau ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ kīṭaṃ khadyo tanāmakam /
GP12garup1_u:12672: yuddhe vijayate so 'pi mahāśūraśca jāyate // GarP_1,184.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12673: dantaṃ ḍuṇḍubhasarpasya mukhe saṃgṛhya vai kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:12674: tiṣṭhate ca jalāntastu nirvikalpaṃ sthale yathā // GarP_1,184.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12685: satakraṃ kuśamalaṃ vā markaṭī mūlameva vā /
GP12garup1_u:12686: kāñjikena ca vākucyā mūlaṃ vai dantaroganut // GarP_1,184.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12690: balā cātibalā yaṣṭī śarkarā madhusaṃyutā // GarP_1,184.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12696: takreṇa śarapuṅkhāṃ vā pītvā plīhāṃ vināśayet // GarP_1,184.36 //
GP12garup1_u:12699: śuṇṭhī sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu pītaṃ hṛdayaroganut // GarP_1,184.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12700: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyaśāstre caturaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12704: āṃ gaṇapataye iti ayaṃ gaṇapaternmantro dhanavidyāpradāyakaḥ // GarP_1,185.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12706: vyavahāre jayaḥ syācca śataṃ jāpānnṛṇāṃ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12707: tilānāṃ tu ghṛtāktānāṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ rudra homayet /
GP12garup1_u:12711: apājitaḥ syādyuddhe ca sarve tañca siṣevire // GarP_1,185.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12713: śikhāṃ baddhvā rājakule vyavahāre jayo bhavet // GarP_1,185.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12714: hrīṅkāraṃ savisargañca prātaḥ kāle narastu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12715: strīṇāṃ lalāṭe vinyasya vaśatāṃ nayati dhruvam // GarP_1,185.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12717: sotkāmāṃ kāminīṃ kuryānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12719: dṛṣṭimātre sadā tasya vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12721: kṛta ebhiśca tilake vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12723: tenaiva tilakaṃ kṛtvā trailokyaṃ vaśatāṃ nayet // GarP_1,185.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12726: sa karoti vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,185.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12729: etairvaitilakaṃ kṛtvā sā naraṃ yaṃ nirīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:12730: tatkṣaṇāttaṃ vaśe kuryā nnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12735: nijaśukraṃ gṛhī tvā tu vāmahastena yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup1_u:12736: kāminīcaraṇaṃ vāmaṃ liṃpetsa syātstriyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12738: ebhirlipte tu liṅge vai kāminīvaśakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12739: puṣpāṇi pañcaraktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12743: śvetasaṣarpa etaiśca liptaliṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12753: ebhistu kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ vai sarvaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12757: pītaḥ satakro 'tīsāraṃ kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12767: pītaṃ sarvañca mehantu kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12769: manaḥ śilāmarīcānāṃ sindūrasya palaṃ palam // GarP_1,185.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12771: pītaṃ snuhīgataṃ dugdhaṃ saindhavaṃ śūlanudbhavet // GarP_1,185.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12775: ebhiśca vartikāṃ kṛtvā tvakṣiṇī cāñjayettataḥ // GarP_1,185.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12777: vibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ samadhu śvāsanāśanam // GarP_1,185.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12786: carvitvā dantakīṭānāṃ vināśo hi bhaveddhara // GarP_1,185.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12787: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mantratantravaidyaprayodṛpañcāśītyadhiśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12791: pītaḥ sāro guḍūcyāśca madhunā ca pramehanut /
GP12garup1_u:12794: tathā hikkāṃ haretpītaṃ sauvarcalayutañca vai // GarP_1,186.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12806: dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt /
GP12garup1_u:12810: tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12813: ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param // GarP_1,186.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12816: bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam /
GP12garup1_u:12820: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai /
GP12garup1_u:12821: harītakīṃ saindhavañca citrakaṃ rudra pippalī // GarP_1,186.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12823: sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram // GarP_1,186.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12824: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12836: tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam // GarP_1,187.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12838: dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,187.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12840: tacca kāñjikasaṃyuktaṃ naraṃ kuryācca bhakṣitam // GarP_1,187.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12842: jagdhaṃ triphalayā kṣaudraṃ cakṣuṣmantaṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,187.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12843: andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12845: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:12849: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:12850: gṛhītvā navanītena teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca bhakṣayet // GarP_1,187.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12851: karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum /
GP12garup1_u:12854: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12855: vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ // GarP_1,187.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12857: śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12858: bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,187.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12859: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12865: tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt // GarP_1,188.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12867: tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12870: tena liptaṃ ciraṃ jātaṃ vraṇaṃ nāḍyāḥ praśāmyati // GarP_1,188.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12872: hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham // GarP_1,188.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12874: tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,188.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12884: bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12885: gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva // GarP_1,188.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12890: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12895: paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12899: śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut // GarP_1,189.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12901: ṛtuśuddhā ca lalanā kaṭau baddhvā prasūyate // GarP_1,189.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12909: sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12911: sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12916: trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12922: mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12923: haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12927: paṭṭasūtreṇa bhūteśa makarādibhayaṃ na vai // GarP_1,189.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12928: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12933: pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,190.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12942: niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12944: pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12950: pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12955: somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut // GarP_1,190.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12959: ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā // GarP_1,190.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12962: takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12969: mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai /
GP12garup1_u:12970: piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati // GarP_1,190.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12976: jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi // GarP_1,190.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12983: salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12988: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu /
GP12garup1_u:12991: prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12992: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12993: pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,190.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12995: manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,190.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12996: jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12998: dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13005: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13010: vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ // GarP_1,191.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13012: sa pannagairna dṛśyeta yāvajjīvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja // GarP_1,191.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13016: gṛhṇīyāllepato vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,191.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13019: mahākālasya vai mūlaṃ piṣṭaṃ tatkāñjikena vai /
GP12garup1_u:13020: voḍrāṇāṃ ḍuṇḍubhānāṃ ca tallopo harate viṣam // GarP_1,191.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13022: ghṛtena saha pītantu haretsarvāviṣāṇi ca // GarP_1,191.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13026: pītaḥ sadugdho hanyācca daṃśakasyaviṣaṃ ca vai // GarP_1,191.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13027: tathā kodravamūlasya mohasya hara eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13028: yaṣṭīmadhusamāyuktā tathā pītā ca śarkarā // GarP_1,191.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13029: sadugdhā ca trirātreṇa mūṣakānāṃ viṣaṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:13032: ghṛtaṃ saśarkaraṃ ṣītvā madyapānamado na vai // GarP_1,191.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13038: karañjaṃ piṣitaṃ caiva hyarkamūlaṃ ca śaṅkara // GarP_1,191.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13041: kharjūrakaviṣaṃ naśyettadā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13044: śatapuṣpā saindhavañca sājyaṃ vā tena lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:13045: śirīṣasya tu bījaṃvai siddha kṣīreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,191.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13053: nāgeśvaro daridre dve tathā mañjiṣṭhakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:13056: tilāśca sarṣapā hanyurviṣaṃ vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,191.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13057: ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara /
GP12garup1_u:13059: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13064: śuṇṭhyā bhāgāśca catvāro maricānāṃ dvayaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13072: balā cātibalā rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā ca punarnavā /
GP12garup1_u:13073: eraṇḍaḥ śārivā parṇo guḍūcī kapikacchukā // GarP_1,192.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13076: ājaṃ vā yadi gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ dattvā caturguṇam /
GP12garup1_u:13088: etaddhi puraṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ karṇaśūlāpahaṃ param // GarP_1,192.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13096: granthikaṃ viḍamustaṃ ca madhu śuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,192.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13106: gorocanā priyaṅguśca balā caiva tathā nakhī // GarP_1,192.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13107: saralaṃ saptaparṇaṃ ca lākṣā cāmalakī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13108: tathā tu padmakaṃ caiva hyetaistailaṃ prasādhayet // GarP_1,192.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13110: gacchati strīśataṃ rudra bandhyāpi labhate sutam // GarP_1,192.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13111: yavānī citrakaṃ dhānyaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ jīrakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13114: tathār'śogulmaśvayathuṃ hanti vahniṃ karoti vai // GarP_1,192.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13115: maricaṃ trivṛtaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:13116: devadāru haridre dve kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī ca candanam // GarP_1,192.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13118: eṣāñca kārṣiko bhāgo viṣasyārdhapalaṃ bhavett // GarP_1,192.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13120: mṛtpātre lohapātre vā śanairmṛdvagninā pacet // GarP_1,192.28 //
GP12garup1_u:13128: śaṅkhapuṣpī vacā somo brāhmī brahmasuvarcalāḥ // GarP_1,192.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13133: agnimantho vacā vāsā pippalī madhu saindhavam /
GP12garup1_u:13135: apāmārgaḥ guḍūcī ca vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāvarī /
GP12garup1_u:13145: katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.40 //
GP12garup1_u:13146: phenī rasāñjanaṃ kṣaudraṃ viḍaṅgāni manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:13147: eṣāṃ vartirhanti kācaṃ timiraṃ paṭalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,192.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13151: punarnavā gokṣurakaṃ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ vacā // GarP_1,192.43 //
GP12garup1_u:13159: pippalī ca kadambañca palāśaṃ lodhratindukam // GarP_1,192.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13163: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvinavatyadhika śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13170: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ kuryānnirmalāñca matiṃ parām // GarP_1,193.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13171: siddhārthakaṃ vacā hiṅgu karañjaṃ devadāru ca /

GP12garup1_u:13177: nimbaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haridre dve śigru sarṣapajaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13178: devadāru paṭolañca dhānyaṃ takreṇa gharṣitam // GarP_1,193.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13179: dehaṃ tailākta gātraṃ vai nayedudvartanena ca /

GP12garup1_u:13181: sāmudraṃ saindhavaṃ kṣāro rājikā lavaṇaṃ viḍam /
GP12garup1_u:13188: pariṇāmasamutthasya śūlasya ca hitaṃ param // GarP_1,193.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13190: śṛṅgī punarnavā śuṇṭhī jagdhā kāsaṃ nihanti vai // GarP_1,193.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13192: śarkarāyā samaṃ caiva jagdhaṃ jvaraharaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,193.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13193: triphalā badaraṃ drākṣā pippalī ca virekakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:13197: haṃsa eṣāñca viṇmūtraṃ māṃsaṃ vā roma śoṇitam /
GP12garup1_u:13202: dhyāto 'rcitaḥ stuto vāpi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,193.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13203: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe trinavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13208: yena rakṣā kṛtā śambhordaityānkṣapayataḥ purā // GarP_1,194.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13214: harirme rakṣatu śiro hṛdayañca janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,194.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13215: mano mama hṛṣīkeśo jihvāṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13216: prātu netre vāsudevaḥ śrotre saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ // GarP_1,194.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13217: pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇamaniruddhastu carma ca /
GP12garup1_u:13219: pārśvaṃ rakṣatu me cakraṃ vāmaṃ daityanivāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:13221: udaraṃ musalaṃ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ me pātu lāṅgalam /
GP12garup1_u:13222: ūrdhvaṃ rakṣatu me śārṅgaṃ jaṅghe rakṣatu nandakaḥ // GarP_1,194.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13223: pārṣṇo rakṣatu śaṅkhaśca padmaṃ me caraṇāvubhau /
GP12garup1_u:13224: sarvakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pātu māṃ garuḍaḥ sadā // GarP_1,194.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13225: varāho rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13226: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhaśca sarvataḥ pātu keśavaḥ // GarP_1,194.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13228: sāṃkhyācāryastu kapilo dhātusāmyaṃ karotu me // GarP_1,194.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13232: haṃso matsyastathā kūrmaḥ pātu māṃ sarvatodiśam // GarP_1,194.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13234: tathā nārāyaṇo devo buddhiṃ pālayatāṃ mama // GarP_1,194.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13236: vaḍavāmukho nāśayatāṃ kalmaṣaṃ yatkṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,194.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13237: padbhyāṃ dadātu paramaṃ sukhaṃ mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13240: rakṣoghnastu daśarathiḥ pātu nityaṃ mahābhujaḥ // GarP_1,194.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13243: kṛṣṇasya yo bālabhāvaḥ sa me kāmānprayacchatu // GarP_1,194.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13247: dhanyo 'haṃ nirbhayo nityaṃ yasya me bhagavānhariḥ // GarP_1,194.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13249: vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ baddhvā vicarāmi mahītale // GarP_1,194.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13253: yo māṃ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ yañcaḥ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā /
GP12garup1_u:13255: vāsudevasya yaccakraṃ tasya cakrasya ye tvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13256: te hi cchindantu pāpānme mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān // GarP_1,194.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13258: vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca // GarP_1,194.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13263: ayaṃ bhagavato mantro mantrāṇāṃ paramo mahān /
GP12garup1_u:13278: oṃ namo bhuvaneśāya trilokadhātre iha viṭi siviṭi siviṭi svāhā/
GP12garup1_u:13279_0: oṃ namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye saṃjñāpaya daityadānavayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācakūṣmāṇḍāntāpasmārakacchardanaduddharrāṇāmekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikacāturthikamauhūrtikadinajvararātrijvarasandhyājvarasarvajvarādīnāṃ
GP12garup1_u:13279_2: kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭadaṃṣṭra pūrvato rakṣatu oṃ hai hai
GP12garup1_u:13279_3: hai hai dinakarasahasrakālasamāhato jaya paścimato rakṣa oṃ nivi nivi pradīptajvalanajvālākāra
GP12garup1_u:13279_4: mahākapila uttarato rakṣa oṃ vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi gaurīgāndhārīviṣamohaviṣamaviṣamāṃ
GP12garup1_u:13279_5: mahohayatu svāhā dakṣiṇato rakṣa māṃ paśya sarvabhūtabhayopadravebhyo rakṣa rakṣa
GP12garup1_u:13279_6: jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate riputrāsāhaṅkṛtavādyato bhayanudabhayato 'bhayaṃ diśatucyutaṃ /
GP12garup1_u:13283: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiṣṇavakavacakathanaṃ nāma caturnavatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13292: tvadrūpāṇi ca sarvāṇi tasmāttubhyaṃ namo namaḥ // GarP_1,195.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13295: mṛnmayīṃ vahasi kṣoṇīṃ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13301: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup1_u:13314: oṃ viṣṇave iti imaṃ mantranyāsamudīrayet // GarP_1,196.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13318: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhastu rāmo rakṣatu parvate // GarP_1,196.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13320: karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13322: nārado 'nyārcanāddevaḥ kūrmo vai nairṛte sadā // GarP_1,196.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13327: madhuhā cāparāhne ca sāyaṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13331: śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgaṃ vai garuḍastathā /
GP12garup1_u:13333: śeṣaḥ sarpasvarūpaśca sadā sarvatra pātu mām /
GP12garup1_u:13334: vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaśca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13336: sa vaśī syādvipāpmā ca rogamukto divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,196.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13337: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13344: kṣityādiṣveva vargāśca hyete vai maṇḍalādhipāḥ // GarP_1,197.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13347: saṣaḍaṅgaḥ śivaḥ prokto hṛcchiraśca śikhā kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:13353: hṛdi pāṇitale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13364: karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaśca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau // GarP_1,197.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13366: vāyumaṇḍalasaṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset // GarP_1,197.13 //

GP12garup1_u:13370: kaniṣṭhādau hṛdādau ca śikhāyāṃ karayornyaset // GarP_1,197.15 //

GP12garup1_u:13385: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:13394: lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13399: tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,197.29 //

GP12garup1_u:13404: tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:13405: yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13407: kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13409: śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13411: patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā // GarP_1,197.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13413: vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13415: karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram // GarP_1,197.37 //

GP12garup1_u:13420: vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet /

GP12garup1_u:13447: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //
GP12garup1_u:13452: evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca /

GP12garup1_u:13454: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13459: oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:13460: oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13461: ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca /
GP12garup1_u:13462: aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13464: oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13466: oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram /
GP12garup1_u:13468: oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13469: ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace /
GP12garup1_u:13471: pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai /
GP12garup1_u:13472: dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet // GarP_1,198.2 //

GP12garup1_u:13476: rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai // GarP_1,198.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13482: jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā // GarP_1,198.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13484: mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā // GarP_1,198.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13485: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13486: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā // GarP_1,198.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13490: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13495: sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ // GarP_1,199.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13498: dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau /
GP12garup1_u:13499: dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13501: dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt // GarP_1,199.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13504: dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam /
GP12garup1_u:13505: dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13507: dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13508: dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam /
GP12garup1_u:13509: dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13511: dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13513: dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13521: siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13525: śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam // GarP_1,199.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13527: sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,199.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13528: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate /
GP12garup1_u:13529: śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13531: śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam // GarP_1,199.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13535: sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ // GarP_1,199.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13537: vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13541: kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13545: kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet // GarP_1,199.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13547: kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13551: sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ // GarP_1,199.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13553: gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham // GarP_1,199.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13557: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,199.32 //

GP12garup1_u:13564: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13577: saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane // GarP_1,200.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13583: vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ // GarP_1,200.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13584: māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:13586: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13593: ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī // GarP_1,201.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13598: asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13614: nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā // GarP_1,201.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13617: savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:13626: kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ // GarP_1,201.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13630: bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ // GarP_1,201.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13631: vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet /
GP12garup1_u:13634: bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ // GarP_1,201.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13637: pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:13640: mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13642: deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13644: prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām // GarP_1,201.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13648: catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13650: mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,201.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13654: ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi /
GP12garup1_u:13655: uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā // GarP_1,201.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13663: baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ // GarP_1,201.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13665: bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā // GarP_1,201.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13670: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13675: sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:13680: naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā // GarP_1,202.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13686: pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13690: ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha // GarP_1,202.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13691: pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:13692: dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva // GarP_1,202.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13698: pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā // GarP_1,202.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13700: mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt // GarP_1,202.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13702: utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā // GarP_1,202.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13703: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite /
GP12garup1_u:13704: garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,202.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13706: yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara // GarP_1,202.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13716: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam // GarP_1,202.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13718: jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet // GarP_1,202.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13720: balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva // GarP_1,202.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13726: strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,202.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13731: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13735: yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13736: lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet // GarP_1,203.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13737: śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13738: kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13745: kṣīre go-mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,203.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13750: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13755: ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_1,204.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13757: lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā // GarP_1,204.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13760: jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13761: śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarīndīvarī varī // GarP_1,204.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13762: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā /
GP12garup1_u:13763: dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā // GarP_1,204.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13767: tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā /
GP12garup1_u:13768: nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13775: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syānnādeyī sā ca kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13776: kaṇā kṛṣṇopakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhiketi ca // GarP_1,204.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13778: ūṣaṇaṃ maricaṃ jñeyaṃ śuṇṭhī viśvaṃ mahauṣadham // GarP_1,204.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13780: lāṅgalī halinī ca syāccheyasī gaja pippalī // GarP_1,204.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13783: ṣaḍgranthogrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13784: kuṭajo vṛkṣakaḥ śakro vatsako girimāllikā // GarP_1,204.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13786: mustakto meghanāmā syātkauntī jñeyā hareṇukā // GarP_1,204.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13787: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13788: padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā // GarP_1,204.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13792: ajājī jīrakaṃ jñeyā kāravī copakuñcikā // GarP_1,204.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13794: tagaraṃ syānnataṃ vakraṃ cocaṃ tvacavarāṅgakam // GarP_1,204.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13801: kāśmarī kaṭphalā jñeyā śrīparṇo ceti kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13802: śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ // GarP_1,204.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13804: pathyābhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī // GarP_1,204.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13808: dhātakī tāmraparṇo syātsamaṅgā kuñjarā matā // GarP_1,204.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13810: vidyādraktaṃ candanaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ raktacandanam // GarP_1,204.28 //
GP12garup1_u:13811: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā cārkapuṣpikā /
GP12garup1_u:13812: śṛṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca mahāghoṣā ca kīrtitā // GarP_1,204.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13814: mṛdvikā ca smṛtā drākṣā tathā gostanikā matā // GarP_1,204.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13816: sārañca gopavallī ca gopī bhadrā ca kathyate // GarP_1,204.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13817: dantī kaṭaṅkaṭerī ca jñeyā dāruniśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13818: haridrā rajanī proktā pītikā rātrināmikā // GarP_1,204.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13820: vasukoṭaśca vijñeyo vāśiraḥ kāmpillo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13822: ghaṇṭākaḥ śuṣkako jñeyo vaco 'tha sūcako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13824: vajravṛkṣo mahāvṛkṣaḥ snuhī snukca sudhā guḍā // GarP_1,204.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13828: jñeyā sugandhiparṇoti vāsantī kulajeti ca // GarP_1,204.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13831: indī varaṃ kuvalayaṃ padmaṃ nīlotpalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13836: kabarī kumbhako dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣudvidho dhanakṛttathā // GarP_1,204.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13838: prācī balā nadīkrāntā kākajaṅghātha vāyasī // GarP_1,204.42 //
GP12garup1_u:13842: aśvatthā bahupatrā ca vijñeyā cāmalakyapi // GarP_1,204.44 //
GP12garup1_u:13843: arūṣakraṃ patra śūkaṃ kṣīrī rājādanaṃ matam /
GP12garup1_u:13844: mahāpatraṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tameva karakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,204.45 //
GP12garup1_u:13847: vidyā kuntī nikumbhā ca tribhaṅgī tripuṭī trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:13848: saptalā yavatiktā ca carmā carmakaseti ca // GarP_1,204.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13850: gavākṣī cāmṛtā śvetā girikarṇo gavādinī // GarP_1,204.48 //
GP12garup1_u:13852: hemakṣīrī smṛtā pītā gaurī vai kāladugdhikā // GarP_1,204.49 //
GP12garup1_u:13856: pratyakpuṣpī kharī jñeyā apāmārgo mayūrakaḥ // GarP_1,204.51 //
GP12garup1_u:13858: jīvako jīvaśākaśca karburañca śaṭīṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,204.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13866: suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī // GarP_1,204.56 //
GP12garup1_u:13878: dhātukāśīśakāśī ca saṃjñeyaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,204.62 //
GP12garup1_u:13881: śilā manaḥ śilā jñeyā nepālī kulaṭīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13882: ālaṃ manastālakaṃ vā haritālaṃ vinirdiśet // GarP_1,204.64 //
GP12garup1_u:13886: mākṣikaṃ madhu ca kṣaudraṃ tacca puṣparasaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,204.66 //
GP12garup1_u:13888: sītā sitopalā caiva matsyaṇḍīśarkarā smṛtā // GarP_1,204.67 //
GP12garup1_u:13894: tripuṭaḥ puṭasaṃjñaśca kalāpo laṅgako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.70 //
GP12garup1_u:13896: picukaṃ pitalaṃ cākṣaṃ biḍālapadakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,204.71 //
GP12garup1_u:13899: palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet /
GP12garup1_u:13902: caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāścatvāra āḍhakaḥ // GarP_1,204.74 //
GP12garup1_u:13904: tulā palaśataṃ proktaṃ bhāgo viṃśatpalaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,204.75 //
GP12garup1_u:13909: śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkho vyāghro vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13911: raso gandharaso bole sarjaḥ sarjaraso mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13912: priyaṅguḥ phalinī śyāmā gaurī kānteti cocyate // GarP_1,204.79 //
GP12garup1_u:13914: śigruḥ śobhāñjano nāma jñānamānaśca kīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,204.80 //
GP12garup1_u:13916: moraṭā pīluparṇo ca tuṇḍī syāttuṇḍikerikā // GarP_1,204.81 //
GP12garup1_u:13917: madano gālavo bodho ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate /
GP12garup1_u:13920: dantī kākendutiktā syātkaṇṭakī ca vikaṅkataḥ // GarP_1,204.83 //
GP12garup1_u:13922: vayasthā ca viśalyā ca cchinnā chinnaruhā matā // GarP_1,204.84 //
GP12garup1_u:13926: nāmānyetāni ca hare vanyānāṃ bheṣajāṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13927: ato vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kumāroktañca śaunaka // GarP_1,204.86 //
GP12garup1_u:13928: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13934: suptiṅantaṃ padaṃ khyātaṃ supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13935: svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadikātmake // GarP_1,205.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13938: amauśaso dvitīyā syāttatkarma kriyate ca yat /
GP12garup1_u:13941: yena kriyate karaṇaṃ tatkartā yaḥ karoti saḥ // GarP_1,205.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13943: yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam // GarP_1,205.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13945: yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,205.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13947: ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet // GarP_1,205.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13953: anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate // GarP_1,205.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13955: aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare // GarP_1,205.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13961: nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayogake // GarP_1,205.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13963: hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13965: dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ nāma dhātustathaiva ca // GarP_1,205.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13966: bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13971: nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet // GarP_1,205.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13973: bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ // GarP_1,205.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13978: liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:13981: kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13983: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13988: viprāḥ svasāgatā vīdaṃ suttamaṃ syātpitṝṣabhaḥ // GarP_1,206.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13992: vadhvāsanañca pitrartho lanubandho naye jayet // GarP_1,206.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13993: nāyako lavaṇaṃ gāvasta ete na ta īśvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13994: devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau // GarP_1,206.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13995: amī aśvāḥ ṣaḍasyeti tanna vāk ṣaḍdalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:14002: kaḥśete caiva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kasko yāti ca gauravam // GarP_1,206.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14003: ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja /
GP12garup1_u:14006: kuṭīcchāyā tathā chāyā sandhayo 'nye tathedṛśāḥ // GarP_1,206.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14007: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14008: dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,206.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14012: taddhitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivo brāhayaṃ ca brahmatādayaḥ // GarP_1,206.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14016: ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣabrahmahaṇau halī // GarP_1,206.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14020: jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi // GarP_1,206.17 //
GP12garup1_u:14021: bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14026: paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumato bahavaḥ sunauḥ // GarP_1,206.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14028: sarvaviśvobha ye cobhau ekonyānyatarāṇi ca // GarP_1,206.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14036: truṭyati mriyate caiva cicīṣati ninīṣati // GarP_1,206.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14043: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācāradṛ nāma ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14047: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ natvā gaṇaṃ śambhuṃ sarasvatīm /
GP12garup1_u:14049: sarvādimadhyāntagalau mnau bhyau jrau stau trikā gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14052: sānusvāraśca pādānto vā ityukto dvimātrakaḥ // GarP_1,207.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14053: yadā nāpi kramaṃ yoge laghutāpi kvacidguroḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14055: jñeyaḥ pādaśca turyāṃśo yuk samaṃ viṣamantvayuk /
GP12garup1_u:14057: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14061: āryālakṣma tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā jo viṣame na hi /
GP12garup1_u:14062: ṣaṣṭhe jo nlau vāpi bhavet padaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dvitīyalāt // GarP_1,208.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14063: āditaḥ saptame hrasvā dvitīyārdhe śare tataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14070: ṣaṭ kalā viṣame cetsyuḥ same 'ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14071: samā parāśritā na syādvaitālīye ralau guruḥ // GarP_1,208.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14074: parāśrito dvitīyo laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣvapi // GarP_1,208.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14082: nikhile vā saitavasya mrau ntau cābdhestatpūrvakau // GarP_1,208.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14089: guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // GarP_1,208.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14093: saptaviṃśātilā gantā dalayo rucirā dvayoḥ // GarP_1,208.17 //
GP12garup1_u:14094: mātrāvṛttāni coktāni varṇavṛttāni vacmi vai // GarP_1,208.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14095: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14099: śrīrukthā gena sā jñeyā utyukthā strī gurudvayam /
GP12garup1_u:14100: mo nārī ro mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā // GarP_1,209.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14101: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā tayau smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:14102: nayābhyāṃ bālalalitā gāyatrīcchanda eva hi // GarP_1,209.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14104: bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā mamau gagau // GarP_1,209.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14105: māṇavakaṃ bhāttalagā mnau gau haṃsarutaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:14108: ranasaiḥ syāddhalamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:14109: bṛhatīchanda ityuktaṃ smau jagau sa virājitam // GarP_1,209.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14111: rajābhyāñca ragābhyāñca rukmavatī bhamau sagau // GarP_1,209.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14114: tau jo gāvindravajrā syājjatajgā gupapūrvikā // GarP_1,209.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14116: bhabhabhā gau dodhakaṃ syācchālinī matatā gagau // GarP_1,209.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14118: śrīrbhatau nanagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍūbhireva ca // GarP_1,209.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14120: rathoddhatār nau ralagāḥ svāgatā ranabhā gagau // GarP_1,209.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14121: vṛttā nanau sagau gaḥ syānnau ralau gaḥ samadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:14122: rajarā lgau śyenikā syājjasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam /
GP12garup1_u:14124: ranau bhasau candravartma vaṃśasthaṃ syājjatau jarau /
GP12garup1_u:14126: nbhau bhrau drutavilambitaṃ puṭaśca syānnanau mayau // GarP_1,209.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14128: nanararaiḥ samākhyātā nayanā yastathā bhavet // GarP_1,209.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14130: jasau jasau ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā // GarP_1,209.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14132: prayaṃvadā nabhajraiśca maṇimālā tayau tayau // GarP_1,209.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14134: pramitākṣarā sajasasairujjvalā tu nanau bharau // GarP_1,209.17 //
GP12garup1_u:14137: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamāvṛttaṃ turagaiśca rasairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14138: praharṣiṇī manau jrau gā vahnibhirdaśabhiryatiḥ // GarP_1,209.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14139: jabhau sajau go rucirā caturbhiśca grahairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14141: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau /
GP12garup1_u:14142: nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiśca rasairyatiḥ // GarP_1,209.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14144: nanarāḥ so ladhuguruḥ svaraiḥ proktāparājitā // GarP_1,209.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14146: vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā tabhjā jagau guruḥ // GarP_1,209.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14148: naranā ralagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā // GarP_1,209.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14152: vasusvarayatiḥ syācca najau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam // GarP_1,209.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14154: marau mayau yaśca bhavedukteyamati śarkarī // GarP_1,209.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14158: vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.29 //
GP12garup1_u:14160: ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14162: nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14164: bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,209.32 //
GP12garup1_u:14168: saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14169: vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:14171: digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14172: najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet // GarP_1,209.36 //
GP12garup1_u:14177: nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate /
GP12garup1_u:14180: guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ // GarP_1,209.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14183: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14188: same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau // GarP_1,210.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14189: gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau // GarP_1,210.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14190: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14191: pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14192: bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau // GarP_1,210.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14193: sagau same bhrau nagagā ākhyānakī tvathāsame /
GP12garup1_u:14194: tau jo gagau same pāde jatajā gurukadvayam // GarP_1,210.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14196: tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hyudāhṛtam // GarP_1,210.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14197: pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau /
GP12garup1_u:14198: same najau jarau gaśca vaitālīyaṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup1_u:14200: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syādayugme jarajā ragau // GarP_1,210.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14201: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'ddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14213: sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:14214: tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau // GarP_1,211.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14219: gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14220: nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14221: tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau // GarP_1,211.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14227: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14232: naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ // GarP_1,212.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14234: saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam /
GP12garup1_u:14236: pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet // GarP_1,212.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14239: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācā- chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14244: brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade // GarP_1,213.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14245: śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret /
GP12garup1_u:14246: śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14248: śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane // GarP_1,213.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14251: satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14252: aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14258: vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā // GarP_1,213.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14260: dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14266: pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14269: triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14270: samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ // GarP_1,213.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14285: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā /
GP12garup1_u:14286: varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14288: ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14294: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ // GarP_1,213.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14295: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā /
GP12garup1_u:14296: chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14302: ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā // GarP_1,213.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14304: ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa // GarP_1,213.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14306: ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā // GarP_1,213.32 //
GP12garup1_u:14307: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:14308: upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14309: sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā /
GP12garup1_u:14310: divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,213.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14312: vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ // GarP_1,213.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14314: manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.36 //
GP12garup1_u:14316: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14318: trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham // GarP_1,213.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14321: aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14322: kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai // GarP_1,213.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14324: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,213.41 //
GP12garup1_u:14327: khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14328: prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet // GarP_1,213.43 //
GP12garup1_u:14334: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat // GarP_1,213.46 //
GP12garup1_u:14336: mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ // GarP_1,213.47 //
GP12garup1_u:14343: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet /
GP12garup1_u:14344: amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi // GarP_1,213.51 //
GP12garup1_u:14346: abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau // GarP_1,213.52 //
GP12garup1_u:14348: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //
GP12garup1_u:14349: sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam /
GP12garup1_u:14351: stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam /
GP12garup1_u:14354: adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site // GarP_1,213.56 //
GP12garup1_u:14363: tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14365: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14367: ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha /
GP12garup1_u:14370: svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate // GarP_1,213.64 //
GP12garup1_u:14372: ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //
GP12garup1_u:14376: samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam // GarP_1,213.67 //
GP12garup1_u:14378: tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // GarP_1,213.68 //
GP12garup1_u:14380: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.69 //
GP12garup1_u:14387: pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam /
GP12garup1_u:14388: na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā // GarP_1,213.73 //
GP12garup1_u:14394: taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā // GarP_1,213.76 //
GP12garup1_u:14396: mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam // GarP_1,213.77 //
GP12garup1_u:14400: mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ // GarP_1,213.79 //
GP12garup1_u:14408: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // GarP_1,213.83 //
GP12garup1_u:14412: yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi // GarP_1,213.85 //
GP12garup1_u:14413: dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14414: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // GarP_1,213.86 //
GP12garup1_u:14415: kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GP12garup1_u:14416: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,213.87 //
GP12garup1_u:14421: śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.89 //
GP12garup1_u:14425: āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.91 //
GP12garup1_u:14429: kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //
GP12garup1_u:14430: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā /
GP12garup1_u:14431: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //
GP12garup1_u:14433: kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate // GarP_1,213.95 //
GP12garup1_u:14435: te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,213.96 //
GP12garup1_u:14442: vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14443: vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ // GarP_1,213.100 //
GP12garup1_u:14445: vaiśye nyāyārjitāḥ svārthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ // GarP_1,213.101 //
GP12garup1_u:14451: sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tuṣyettu svayaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,213.104 //
GP12garup1_u:14456: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet /
GP12garup1_u:14461: prātaḥ snānaṃ tadarthaṃ tu nityasnānaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_1,213.109 //
GP12garup1_u:14463: snānārhastu yadā snāti snānaṃ naimittikaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,213.110 //
GP12garup1_u:14467: snānaṃ samācaredyastu kriyāṅgaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,213.112 //
GP12garup1_u:14469: saraḥ sudevakhāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca // GarP_1,213.113 //
GP12garup1_u:14473: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ cāpi kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.115 //
GP12garup1_u:14477: tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāgaṃ puṇyaṃ tu sarvataḥ // GarP_1,213.117 //
GP12garup1_u:14479: gayāyāṃ ca kurukṣetre yattoyaṃ samupasthitam // GarP_1,213.118 //
GP12garup1_u:14481: putrajanmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ // GarP_1,213.119 //
GP12garup1_u:14482: rāhośca darśane snānaṃ praśastaṃ niśi nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:14485: yatphalaṃ dvādaśābdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet // GarP_1,213.121 //
GP12garup1_u:14488: prātaḥ snāyī bhavennityaṃ māsau dvau māghaphālgunau /
GP12garup1_u:14489: yastu māghaṃ samāsādya prātaḥ snāyī haviṣyabhuk // GarP_1,213.123 //
GP12garup1_u:14491: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi bhrātaraṃ suhṛdaṃ gurum // GarP_1,213.124 //
GP12garup1_u:14501: āgacchantu me pitara imaṃ gṛhṇantvapoñjalim // GarP_1,213.129 //
GP12garup1_u:14503: vasitvā vasanaṃ śuṣkaṃ sthalasthā starṇabarhiṣi // GarP_1,213.130 //
GP12garup1_u:14505: yadapāṃ krūramāṃsāttu yadamedhyaṃ tu kiñcana // GarP_1,213.131 //
GP12garup1_u:14507: gṛhītvānena mantreṇa toyaṃ savyena pāṇinā // GarP_1,213.132 //
GP12garup1_u:14511: punātu me tadindrastu varuṇaḥ sabṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,213.134 //
GP12garup1_u:14521: arcitaṃ syājjagādidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram // GarP_1,213.139 //
GP12garup1_u:14533: gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇaṃ agnyagāre śatādhikam // GarP_1,213.145 //
GP12garup1_u:14536: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14539: sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran // GarP_1,213.148 //
GP12garup1_u:14542: śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet /
GP12garup1_u:14545: vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.151 //
GP12garup1_u:14547: tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14548: udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.153 //
GP12garup1_u:14549: āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani /
GP12garup1_u:14550: yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //
GP12garup1_u:14552: prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //
GP12garup1_u:14558: tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,213.158 //
GP12garup1_u:14561: ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //
GP12garup1_u:14562: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14566: atha snānavidhiṃ vakṣye snānamūlā kriyā yataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14571: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdaṃ tāṃ tu gomayaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14572: adbhirmṛdbhiśca caraṇau prakṣālyātha karau tathā // GarP_1,214.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14576: oṃ uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthānamanveta vā /
GP12garup1_u:14580: oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14581: tebhirno adya savitota viṣṇurviśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:14582: sumitriyāna ityabañjalimākṛtyottareṇa toyaṃ paścādvirājya caiva viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:14583: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu /
GP12garup1_u:14584: durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smāndveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // GarP_1,214.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14586: prakṣālya hastā vācamya namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,214.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14587: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /
GP12garup1_u:14591: oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu /
GP12garup1_u:14592: viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi // GarP_1,214.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14595: oṃ mānastoke tanaye mā na āyuṣi mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14596: mā no vīrānrudrabhāmino 'badhīrhaviṣmantaḥ sadamitvā havāmahe // GarP_1,214.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14598: imaṃme varuṇe dvābhyāṃ tvannaḥ satvanna ityapi // GarP_1,214.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14600: oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake // GarP_1,214.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14601: oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14602: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14603: oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14605: oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau /
GP12garup1_u:14606: avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi /
GP12garup1_u:14607: oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca /
GP12garup1_u:14613: avadevairdevakṛtā manoyāsi samavatyai kṛtaṃ puṣpācchā devadhīmalpāhī // GarP_1,214.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14617: devīrāpa iti dvābhyāṃ āpodevā iti tryṛcā // GarP_1,214.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14618: drupadādiva iti ca śanno devīrapāṃ rasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14619: āpo devo pāvamānyaḥ punantvādyā ṛco nava // GarP_1,214.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14621: hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca pāvamānyastathā parāḥ // GarP_1,214.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14623: vāruṇyā bahavaḥ puṇyāḥ śaktitaḥ saṃprayojayet // GarP_1,214.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14625: ādāvante ca kurvīta abhiṣekaṃ yathākramam // GarP_1,214.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14627: antarjale japenmantraṃ triḥ kṛtvā cāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14630: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā japedbudhaḥ āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ smaredvā viṣṇamavyayam // GarP_1,214.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14634: gāyattrī vaiṣṇavī hyeṣā viṣṇoḥ saṃsmaraṇāya vai // GarP_1,214.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14637: āpo mā tasmādenasaḥ pāvamānaśca muñcatu iviṣmato vimā āpohaviṣmān āvirāsati /
GP12garup1_u:14638: haviṣmān deva asuro haviṣmān astu sūryaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14639: devīrāpo apā patnyā yaśca ūrmirhaviṣyaḥ indriyavānmādityantanaḥ taṃ devebhyo devatā dābhuśukralebhyasteṣāṃ bhāgakarṣivasisamudrasya dakṣiṇyāgrayāsimenāpograrbhiraśmatamodhoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14641: yābhirmitrāvaruṇasya siñcayābhirindramanayatyanna vātī vadrupadāṃ śanno devī apāmasṛgdvayasaṃsūrye santaṃ samāhitaṃ apāṃrasasya yo rasya yo gṛhṇāsyuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:14642: āpo devīrupasūrya madhumatīvayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsā māsthānātvarjihatāmoṣadhayaḥ sapippalāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14643: punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantvanāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā /
GP12garup1_u:14647: punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14648: punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ / punīhi mā /
GP12garup1_u:14649: pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat /
GP12garup1_u:14651: yatte pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā brahmā tena punātu mā /
GP12garup1_u:14659: tayāmadantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām /
GP12garup1_u:14660: citpa tirmā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14662: praṇitacchakeyaṃ devo vākpatirmā savitā tvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14665: punastacchakeyaṃ dyupatiṃ ayaṃ gauḥ pṛśrirakramīsadaśaśataṃ mātaraṃ punaḥ pitarañca prayasmaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14666: devo mā savitā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14667: tasya te pavitrapate pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ punātacchakeyam? /
GP12garup1_u:14668: oṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14670: snātvaivaṃ vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:14671: prakṣālya ca mṛdādbhiśca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā // GarP_1,214.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14673: drupadāṃ ca trirāvartya tathā caivāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14677: taccakṣurdeva iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi // GarP_1,214.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14679: gāyattrīṃ ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram // GarP_1,214.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14681: śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca // GarP_1,214.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14685: savyaṃ kṛtvā trirācamya śriyaṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṣitim // GarP_1,214.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14687: umāmarundhatīṃ caiva śacīṃ mātarameva ca // GarP_1,214.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14688: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva sāvitrīṃ śāntimeva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14689: svāhāṃ svadhāṃ dhṛtiṃ caiva tathaivāditimuttamām // GarP_1,214.39 //
GP12garup1_u:14694: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe snānavidhivivaraṇaṃ nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14788: teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānāṃ api bhadre saumanase syāma /
GP12garup1_u:14789: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsogniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14791: oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ kīlālaṃ parisnutaṃ svadhā stha tarpayata me pitṝn /
GP12garup1_u:14799: oṃ akṣanpitaro amīmadanta pitaro amī tṛpyantaḥ pitaraḥ śuṃ(sva)
GP12garup1_u:14800: dhadhvaṃ pibeha pitaro 'pi vānatrayāṃśca viśrayāṃśca bhavanapavitratvā rathapati te jātavedāḥ svadhābhiryajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ jupasva? /
GP12garup1_u:14801: oṃ ṇaduvātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14803: madhu dyaurastu naḥ pitā madhu mānno vanaspatirmadhubhām astu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ // GarP_1,215.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14805: oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namo vaḥ pitaro jīvāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namo vaḥ pitaro ghorāya namo vaḥ pitaro manyave /
GP12garup1_u:14806: namo vaḥ pitaro gṛhānna pitaro dattaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14807: namo vaḥ pitaro dadhme tadvaḥ pitaro vāsaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14810: ye cāsmākaṃ kule jātā aputrā gotriṇo mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14811: te tṛpyantu mayā dattaṃ vastraniṣpīḍanodakam // GarP_1,215.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14812: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devāditarpaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañjadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14817: prajvālya cāgniṃ paryukṣya-oṃ kraṣyādamagniṃ prahiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājyaṃ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14818: ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānat /
GP12garup1_u:14819: oṃ pāvaka vaiśvānara idamāsanaṃ araṇīgarbhasaṃskṛtatejorūpa mahābrahman muhūrtāstriṣu vaiśvānaraṃ pratibodhayāmi /
GP12garup1_u:14820_0: oṃ vaiśvānare na ubhayaṃ āprayātu parāvataḥ agnirna svadyutīrūpapṛṣṭho divi pṛṣṭho
GP12garup1_u:14820_1: 'śvi pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭhā vivevā oṣadhīcāviveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭho 'gniḥ namo
GP12garup1_u:14840: oṃ ye bhūtā pracaranti dīnāca nimihanto bhuvanasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:14841: tebhyo baliṃ puṣṭikāmo dadāmi mayi puṣṭiṃ puṣṭipatirdadātu /
GP12garup1_u:14843: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiśvadevanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14848: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā // GarP_1,217.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14849: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,217.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14868: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ astrāya phaṭ // GarP_1,217.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14869: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyaṃ tatstripadā /
GP12garup1_u:14870: oṃ āpo jyo 'tī raso 'mṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom /
GP12garup1_u:14876: gāyattrī nāma yā sandhyā raktāṅgī raktavāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:14879: āyātu varadā devī madhyāhne śvetarūpiṇī // GarP_1,217.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14887: oṃ āpo hiṣṭhā mayo bhuvastā na urje dadhāta naḥ // GarP_1,217.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14892: oṃ tasmā araṅgamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
GP12garup1_u:14894: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu oṃ durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smān dveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14902: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ // GarP_1,217.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14905: oṃ udutyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14908: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca /
GP12garup1_u:14910: paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam /
GP12garup1_u:14914: devā gātuvido nāṅgavidvānādbhamitamanasaspata imaṃ devayajñaṃ svāhā vātedhāḥ japet // GarP_1,217.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14918: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14927: oṃ susvāgatāmiti tairukte oṃ viśvebhyo devebhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svāheti devabrāhmaṇapādayordevatīrthenābhugnakuśasahitajaladānam // GarP_1,218.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14930: etadācamanīyaṃ svāhā svadheti brāhmaṇahaste eṣavor'ghya iti brāhmaṇahaste puṣpadānam // GarP_1,218.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14931: oṃ siddhamidamāsanam iha siddhamityabhidhāya oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyamiti saptavyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrvamukhandevabrāhmaṇopaveśanam /
GP12garup1_u:14933: oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14934: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityameva bhavantute iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14935: oṃ adyāsmindeśe amukamāse amukarāśiṅgate savitaryamukatithāvamukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ yathānāmaśarmaṇāṃ viśvedevapūrvakandṛśrāddhaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14936: oṃ viśvebhyo devabhyaḥ svāhā oṃ viśvedevānāvāhayiṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14937: āvāhayetyukte oṃ viśvedevāḥ sa āgata śṛṇutām imaṃ havam /
GP12garup1_u:14938: edaṃ barhirniṣīdata oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14939: ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14940: oṃ oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā /
GP12garup1_u:14943: ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānā bhavantu te /
GP12garup1_u:14944: oṃ apahatāsurā rakṣāṃsi vediṣada iti tritriryavavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14946: oṃ karuṣvetyanujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitraniṣevaṇam // GarP_1,218.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14947: oṃ śanno devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GP12garup1_u:14953: oṃ yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuryā antarikṣauta pārthavīryāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14954: hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstāna āpaḥ śivāḥ śaṃ syonā suhavā bhavantu /
GP12garup1_u:14955: eṣor'gho nama iti brāhmaṇahaste jalaṃ dattvānenaiva pātreṇa pavitragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃstravaṃ pavitraṃ ca brāhmaṇapārśve dadyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14956: tataḥ prathamapātre saṃstravajalaṃ saṃsthāpya kuśopari ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryat /
GP12garup1_u:14958: viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāso yugayajño pavītāni namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14961: tataḥ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ mātāmahapramātāmahavṛddhapramātāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye iti anujñāvacanam /
GP12garup1_u:14964: oṃ amukagotrebyo 'smatpitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ idamāsanaṃ svadhā iti brāhmaṇavāme āsanadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14969: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14971: oṃ apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tilavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14974: pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝṃllokānprīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tiladānam // GarP_1,218.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14975: gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14979: apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam // GarP_1,218.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14982: amukagotrebhyo 'smatpitṛpitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhya etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāsoguṇasottarīyayajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena gandhādidānam /
GP12garup1_u:14988: tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14989_0: oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ devabrāhmaṇahaste
GP12garup1_u:14989_1: dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre
GP12garup1_u:14990: pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ juhomi svāhā pātrābhimantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14995: oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā /
GP12garup1_u:14996: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti siddhārthavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14997: tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:14999_0: tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre nidhāya tadupari
GP12garup1_u:14999_1: bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā
GP12garup1_u:14999_2: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /
GP12garup1_u:15001: bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:15002: annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram /
GP12garup1_u:15005_0: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt
GP12garup1_u:15005_1: iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso
GP12garup1_u:15006: madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15007: madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15011: cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // GarP_1,218.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15015: oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama /
GP12garup1_u:15016: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim /
GP12garup1_u:15017: iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15018: tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15021: pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15022: oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti lavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15028: itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trarjapannannaṃ sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15032: tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ piṇḍāntike /
GP12garup1_u:15033: oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra /
GP12garup1_u:15035: amukaśarman sapatnīka etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu tasmai tesvadheti pitṛpiṇḍasecanam /
GP12garup1_u:15036: piṇḍapātramadhomukhaṃ kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ oṃ pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet /
GP12garup1_u:15037: apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15040: dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15041: vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15043: tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam /
GP12garup1_u:15044: vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ // GarP_1,218.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15045_1: kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī /
GP12garup1_u:15046: yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ // GarP_1,218.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15049: oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12garup1_u:15050: brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15055: akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me /
GP12garup1_u:15061: oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ--dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca /
GP12garup1_u:15062: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti /
GP12garup1_u:15064: yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana /
GP12garup1_u:15068: kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ vācayiṣye-oṃ vācyatāṃ-oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:15069: astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ dadyāt // GarP_1,218.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15070: tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā--devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:15071: oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15072_0: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ amukagotrāya
GP12garup1_u:15074: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15075: susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15076_0: asyamadhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānairiti piṇḍā divisarjanaṃ-āmāvājasya
GP12garup1_u:15076_1: prasavo jagamyādeme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe āmāgantāṃ pitarā cāmā somo 'mṛtatvena gamyāt /
GP12garup1_u:15082: anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ vai yatra kutracit // GarP_1,218.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15084: ityuktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadam // GarP_1,218.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15085: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15090: oṃ amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahānāṃ amukaśarmaṇāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:15093: jātaputramukhadarśanādau vṛddhi śrāddhaṃ pūrvābhimukheṣu dakṣiṇopavītiṣu sayavabadarakuśairdevatīrthena namaskārāntena dakṣiṇopacāreṇa kartavyam // GarP_1,219.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15094_1: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnenayuṣmāsu
GP12garup1_u:15096: tataḥ amukavṛddhau amukagotrāyā matprapitāmahyā amukadevyā nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti prapitāmahībrāhmaṇāmantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:15099: āsane oṃ viśvedevāsa āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭha ivam /
GP12garup1_u:15101: oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ ye me antarikṣe ya udadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:15102: pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:15109: oṃ vasusatyasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ savadaraṃ sadadhi pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ nama iti annasaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:15116: adya amukagotrasya matpituramukadevaśarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikamekoddiṣṭaśrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:15120: tatasmṛptiṃ jñātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhīvāmopavītī ucchiṣṭasamīpe agnidagdhā iti annavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:15121: amukagotramatpitaramukadevaśarmannetatte jalamavanenikṣva ye cātra tvāmanuyāśca tvāmanutasmai te svadhā iti rekhopari vāridhārādānam /
GP12garup1_u:15123: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15134_1: kuśaṃ dattvā pātrāntareṇa pidhāya acchidrāvadhāraṇāntaṃ parisamāpya tathaiva piturapi
GP12garup1_u:15136: uddhāṭanaṃ kṛtvā--oṃ ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye /
GP12garup1_u:15137: teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām /
GP12garup1_u:15138: oṃ ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15139: teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin loke śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15140: etanmantradvayena pitṛpātrodakaṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahapātre vṛddhaprapitāmahapātraṃ parityajya pitāmahaprapitāmahayorudakaṃ pavitrañca pitṛpātre kṣipet // GarP_1,220.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15142_1: pātramutthāpya oṃ yā divyeti paṭhitvā oṃ amukagotra matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka
GP12garup1_u:15143_1: piṇḍasecanārthaṃ pātrāntareṇa pidhāya pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15147_0: aṅguṣṭhaniveśanaṃ tilavikaraṇaṃ kṛtvā amukagotra etatte annaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ
GP12garup1_u:15147_1: savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ ye cātra tvā manuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā iti // GarP_1,220.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15151: pitāmāhadau praśraṃ kṛtvā pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ svaditaṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15152: oṃ amukagotra matpitaḥ amukaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te piṇḍo ye cātratvāmanuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai svadheti piṇḍapātramacchidramastu /
GP12garup1_u:15153: tataḥ saṅkalpa siddhivācanaṃ samāpya piṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasa iti mantradvayaṃ paṭhitvā pitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahapātreṣu kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:15158: suprokṣitamastu śivā āpaḥ santu--vṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam /
GP12garup1_u:15160: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astvityukte svadhāṃ vācayiṇya iti pitāmāhadibrāhmaṇānujñāpanam // GarP_1,220.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15161: oṃ vācyatāṃ ityukte oṃ pitāmahādibhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:15163: astu svadhetyukte oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīriti dakṣiṇābhimukhavāridhārātyāgaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15164: oṃ viśvedevā asmin yajñe prīyantāmiti devabrāhmaṇahaste oṃ yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:15166: piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmahādibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tataḥ pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣo me pradīyantāmityāśīḥ prārthanam /
GP12garup1_u:15167: pratigṛhyatāmityukte dātāro no 'bhivardhantāmiti pātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā vāje vājedṛvisarjanam /
GP12garup1_u:15170: śrāddhaṃ viṣṇuḥ śrāddhakartā phalaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,220.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15171: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānaṃ nāmaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
