GP12garup1_u:15177: śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:15178: śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15180: karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,221.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15182: dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ // GarP_1,221.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15185: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15186: dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15189: na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana /
GP12garup1_u:15190: bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15192: santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15194: idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15196: lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15198: yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,221.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15199: devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:15200: dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam // GarP_1,221.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15202: alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,221.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15208: bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15209: na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15210: yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15212: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15216: annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,221.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15220: kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,221.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15222: jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,221.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15223: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15228: makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15233: snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15235: yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ // GarP_1,222.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15242: yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet /
GP12garup1_u:15243: teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15245: etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,222.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15254: phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,222.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15256: gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet // GarP_1,222.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15270: varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā // GarP_1,222.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15272: striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana // GarP_1,222.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15273: nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam /
GP12garup1_u:15274: prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // GarP_1,222.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15275: udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci /
GP12garup1_u:15276: pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt // GarP_1,222.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15278: mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati // GarP_1,222.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15286: bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,222.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15287: āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat /
GP12garup1_u:15288: śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt // GarP_1,222.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15289: gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:15290: surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban // GarP_1,222.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15291: vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake // GarP_1,222.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15293: vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15295: bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15297: jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā // GarP_1,222.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15305: agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate // GarP_1,222.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15306: satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:15307: aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.40 //
GP12garup1_u:15308: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā /
GP12garup1_u:15310: dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā /
GP12garup1_u:15311: śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15313: suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet // GarP_1,222.43 //
GP12garup1_u:15314: kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam /
GP12garup1_u:15317: asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15318: uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam // GarP_1,222.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15326: krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati // GarP_1,222.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15327: nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet /
GP12garup1_u:15328: vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15329: ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15331: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:15334: vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.53 //
GP12garup1_u:15338: asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā // GarP_1,222.55 //
GP12garup1_u:15339: tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:15342: punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ // GarP_1,222.57 //
GP12garup1_u:15346: antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,222.59 //
GP12garup1_u:15349: upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //
GP12garup1_u:15355: ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //
GP12garup1_u:15360: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate /
GP12garup1_u:15361: ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham // GarP_1,222.66 //
GP12garup1_u:15362: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15365: brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15367: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca /
GP12garup1_u:15369: dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:15370: homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,223.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15372: pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:15375: kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā // GarP_1,223.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15377: caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā // GarP_1,223.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15379: śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15385: catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,223.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15393: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15416: sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15418: prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:15419: tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ // GarP_1,223.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15425: śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,223.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15434: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15436: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām /
GP12garup1_u:15437: strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15439: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ // GarP_1,223.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15443: kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam // GarP_1,223.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15445: tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15446: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15452: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15453: te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15455: viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,224.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15457: varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ // GarP_1,224.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15462: atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka // GarP_1,224.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15464: brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ // GarP_1,224.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15465: ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15469: pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate // GarP_1,224.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15470: evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15471: āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate // GarP_1,224.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15472: vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān /
GP12garup1_u:15476: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe naimittikapralayonāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15483: yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani // GarP_1,225.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15487: yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute // GarP_1,225.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15489: pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam // GarP_1,225.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15491: nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15493: peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15496: tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:15497: naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate // GarP_1,225.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15499: bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi // GarP_1,225.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15505: upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15509: bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ // GarP_1,225.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15513: viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15525: aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ // GarP_1,225.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15526: kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15527: bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,225.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15529: ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kāko madbhuramāmiṣam // GarP_1,225.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15530: madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa-pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15531: apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate // GarP_1,225.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15532: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15533: hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15535: mayūro varṇakaṃ hṛtvā śākapatrañca jāyate // GarP_1,225.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15537: chuchundariḥ śubhāngandhāñchaśaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet // GarP_1,225.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15543: eṣa eva kramo dṛṣṭo gosuvarṇādihāriṇām // GarP_1,225.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15545: asamiddhe hute cāgnau mandāgniḥ khalu jāyate // GarP_1,225.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15549: nikṛtya bandhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ kārpaṇyañca nṛṇāṃ vadhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15551: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā /
GP12garup1_u:15556: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15559: sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:15561: mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam /
GP12garup1_u:15570: mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham // GarP_1,226.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15571: na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15572: kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ // GarP_1,226.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15576: sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ // GarP_1,226.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15577: tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati /
GP12garup1_u:15578: yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā // GarP_1,226.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15582: yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,226.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15586: laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // GarP_1,226.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15594: nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit // GarP_1,226.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15597: prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15598: dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ // GarP_1,226.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15599: prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi /
GP12garup1_u:15600: kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu // GarP_1,226.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15612: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:15617: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15619: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15622: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15625: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15627: ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15629: utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām /
GP12garup1_u:15631: tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān /
GP12garup1_u:15632: na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15633: garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15638: indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ // GarP_1,226.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15639: prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15641: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15646: yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit // GarP_1,227.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15648: jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15653: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:15654: brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam // GarP_1,227.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15655: praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15658: yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ // GarP_1,227.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15663: sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15664: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15665: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15667: dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet /
GP12garup1_u:15668: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15681: yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,227.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15683: na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ // GarP_1,227.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15687: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,227.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15693: sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // GarP_1,227.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15694: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoryasya puṃso na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15698: svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
GP12garup1_u:15701: sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagavyavasito hi saḥ // GarP_1,227.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15702: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:15703: viprendra pratijānīhi viṣṇubhakto na naśyati // GarP_1,227.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15704: dharmārthakāmaḥ kiṃ tasya muktistasya kare sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:15705: samastajagatāṃ mūlaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau // GarP_1,227.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15707: tameva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te // GarP_1,227.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15711: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,227.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15714: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣvakaṣṭalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu /
GP12garup1_u:15715: bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyaikalābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ // GarP_1,227.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15717: vaiṣṇavosmatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati // GarP_1,227.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15719: muktiṃ gatāḥ smaraṇamātravidhūtapāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ paramabhaktimatāṃ janānām // GarP_1,227.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15721: te 'pi mṛtyumatikramya yānti tadvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,227.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15727: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15732: yo namet sarvalokasya namasyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,228.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15734: praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdayālayam // GarP_1,228.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15736: taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ namasye parameśvaram // GarP_1,228.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15740: eko hi bhāvaguṇamātradṛḍhapraṇāmaḥ sadyaḥ śvapākamapi sādhayituṃ saśaktaḥ // GarP_1,228.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15742: sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi // GarP_1,228.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15744: ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāro muktyā tāṃstārayiṣyati // GarP_1,228.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15745: āsīno vā śayāno vātiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā /
GP12garup1_u:15748: tathāpi narake mūḍhāḥ patantīti kimadbhutam // GarP_1,228.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15749: caturmukho vā yadi koṭivaktro bhavennaraḥ kopi viśuddhacetāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15750: sa vai guṇānāmayutaikadeśaṃ vadenna vā devavarasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_1,228.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15754: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrasto mṛgā yathā /
GP12garup1_u:15755: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,228.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15756: svapne 'pi nāma spṛśato 'pi puṃsaḥ kṣayaṃ karotyakṣayapāparāśim /
GP12garup1_u:15757: pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punaratra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya // GarP_1,228.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15766: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣāntaṃ japtvā mukto bhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,228.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15768: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtyakeśavam // GarP_1,228.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15770: saṃsārasāgaraṃ tīrtvā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,228.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15772: spapnāntare na hi punaśca bhavaṃ sa paśyennārāyaṇastutikathāparamo manuṣyaḥ // GarP_1,228.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15773: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15778: dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva ca // GarP_1,229.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15780: yo na pūjayate viṣṇuṃ taṃ vidyādbrahmaghātakam // GarP_1,229.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15782: taṃ yo na dhyāyate viṣṇuṃ sa viṣṭhāyāṃ krimirbhavet // GarP_1,229.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15784: kintvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,229.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15786: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na cārcitaḥ // GarP_1,229.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15787: na tatkaroti sā mātā na pitā nāpi bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15792: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,229.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15795: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15799: ālokya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15800: idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // GarP_1,230.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15801: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kintīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15802: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇamananyadhīḥ // GarP_1,230.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15808: prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ hareḥ saṃsmaraṇaṃ param // GarP_1,230.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15812: yā kācinmanaso vṛttiḥ sā bhavatyacyutāśrayāt // GarP_1,230.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15814: bhuñjañjāgracca govindaṃ mādhavaṃ yaśca saṃsmaret // GarP_1,230.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15817: dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15818: dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet // GarP_1,230.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15819: nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam /
GP12garup1_u:15821: yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram /
GP12garup1_u:15824: smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ // GarP_1,230.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15828: prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt // GarP_1,230.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15830: tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam // GarP_1,230.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15832: saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ // GarP_1,230.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15834: yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau // GarP_1,230.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15838: na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ // GarP_1,230.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15839: sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15840: lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ // GarP_1,230.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15842: canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15843: kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge /
GP12garup1_u:15844: hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ // GarP_1,230.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15846: govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ // GarP_1,230.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15849: asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15851: kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15858: ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,230.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15860: narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15861: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15862: hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane // GarP_1,230.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15864: nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām // GarP_1,230.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15867: na hi dhyānena sadṛśaṃ pavitramiha vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:15868: śvapacānnāni bhuñjāno pāpī naivātra lipyate // GarP_1,230.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15870: yadi nārāyaṇe 'pyevaṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15872: viṣṇubhaktiryasya citte kaṃ vā jīvo nametsadā /
GP12garup1_u:15873: sa tārayati cātmānaṃ tadaiva duritārṇavāt // GarP_1,230.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15874: tañjñānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15876: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /
GP12garup1_u:15877: tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // GarP_1,230.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15878: praṇāmamīśasya śiraḥ phalaṃ vidustadarcanaṃ pāṇiphalaṃ divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15879: manaḥ phalaṃ tadguṇakarmacintanaṃ vacastu govindaguṇastutiḥ phalam // GarP_1,230.40 //
GP12garup1_u:15883: sarvaṃ nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvannapi na limpati // GarP_1,230.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15885: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ māyayā tava // GarP_1,230.43 //
GP12garup1_u:15886: yasminnyastamatirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra navā viśetkathamapi brāhmo 'piloko 'lpakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15887: muktiñcetasi saṃsthito jaḍadhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiñcitraṃ yadayaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // GarP_1,230.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15889: gantuṃ duḥ khodadheḥ kuryurye ca tatra naranti te // GarP_1,230.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15890: rāṣṭrasya śaraṇaṃ rājā pitaro bālakasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:15891: dharmaśca sarvamartyānāṃ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,230.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15893: na yebhyo vidyate tīrthamadhikaṃ munisattam // GarP_1,230.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15896: śūdraṃ vā bhagavadbhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15897: dvijajāti samaṃmanyo na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,230.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15899: tathā viśvasya kartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15908: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15913: pūrvaṃ mātṛgaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaraṃ vākyamabruvan // GarP_1,231.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15917: bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvā rakṣaṇīyā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15921: trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛgaṇena vai /
GP12garup1_u:15932: yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyāto rudraistu bhaktitaḥ // GarP_1,231.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15934: praṇipatya tu deveśaṃ tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,231.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15951: andhakasya vināśāya yā sṛṣṭā mātaro mayā /
GP12garup1_u:15952: anādṛtya tu madvākyaṃ bhakṣyantvadbhutāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,231.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15954: pūrvaṃ kṛtvā kathaṃ tāsāṃ vināśamabhirocaye // GarP_1,231.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15958: saṃhṛtya jagataḥ śarma kṛtvā cāntardadhe hariḥ // GarP_1,231.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15962: anādimadhyāntamaja purāṇaṃ parāpareśaṃ jagatāṃ nidhānam // GarP_1,231.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15964: samātṛvargasya karoti mūrtiṃ yadā tadā tiṣṭhati tatsamīpe // GarP_1,231.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15966: prasādya taṃ devavaraṃ sa labdhvā avyājjaganmātṛgaṇebhya eva ca // GarP_1,231.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15967: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nṛsiṃhastotraṃ nāmaikatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15972: pṛṣṭaḥ śrīnāradenaiva nāradāya tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,232.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15974: yaḥ saṃkāre sadā dvandvaiḥ kāmakrodhaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15979: uvāca tamṛṣiṃ śambhuḥ prasannavadano haraḥ // GarP_1,232.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15982: vakṣyāmi śṛṇu duḥ khaghnaṃ bhavabandhabhayāmaham // GarP_1,232.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15984: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ yasya māyayā // GarP_1,232.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15986: sa nistarati saṃsāraṃ devānāmapi dustaram // GarP_1,232.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15989: sarva ekārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva /
GP12garup1_u:15998: acalaṃ sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16000: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.13 //
GP12garup1_u:16006: yogibhiḥ sevitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.16 //
GP12garup1_u:16008: stutvaivaṃ varadaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.17 //
GP12garup1_u:16013: nāradena purā pṛṣṭa evaṃ sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16014: yettena tasmai vyākhyātaṃ tanmayā kathitaṃ tava // GarP_1,232.19 //
GP12garup1_u:16021: sa viṣṇuṃ samyagārādhya siddhaḥ padamavāptavān // GarP_1,232.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16025: prayatnādyaḥ paṭhennitya mamṛtatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,232.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16026: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kulāmṛtastotraṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16031: dāmodaraṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16033: adho 'kṣajaṃ prapannosmi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16035: mādhavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16037: lokanāthaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16039: mahāyogaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16041: viśvarūpaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mūtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16048: idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate bhaktyā trikālaṃ niyataṃ śuciḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16051: vicintya sūryādatirājamānaṃ mṛtyuṃ sa yogi jitavāṃstathaiva // GarP_1,233.11 //
GP12garup1_u:16052: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyakṛtaṃ mṛtyvaṣṭakastotraṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16057: brahmā pṛṣṭo nāradāya yathovāca tathā param // GarP_1,234.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16060: pratyahaṃ cārcanākāle tathā tvaṃ vaktumarhasi // GarP_1,234.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16062: saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣāṃ ye stuvanti sadācyutam // GarP_1,234.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16065: śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjākāle prasīdati // GarP_1,234.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16077: namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,234.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16097: jaya vedāntavidvedya jaya sarvada mādhava // GarP_1,234.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16099: jaya sūkṣma cidāndana jaya cittanirañjana // GarP_1,234.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16107: tvaṃ prabho chalabhṛdrāmastvaṃ punaḥ sa kharāntakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16110: tvaṃ suparṇastathā cakraṃ tvaṃ gadā śaṅkha eva ca // GarP_1,234.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16111: tvaṃ śrīḥ prabho tvaṃ muṣṭisatvaṃ tvaṃ mālā deva śāvatī /
GP12garup1_u:16112: śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhastvaṃ hi śārṅgo tvaṃ ca tatheṣudhiḥ // GarP_1,234.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16113: tvaṃ khaḍgacarmaṇā sārdhaṃ tvaṃ dikpālāstathā prabho /
GP12garup1_u:16114: tvaṃ vedhāstvaṃ vidhātā ca tvaṃ yamastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,234.28 //
GP12garup1_u:16116: tvaṃ rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sādhyastvaṃ vāyustvaṃ niśākaraḥ // GarP_1,234.29 //
GP12garup1_u:16117: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau tvaṃ marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16118: tvaṃ daityā dānavā nāgāstvaṃ yakṣā rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ // GarP_1,234.30 //
GP12garup1_u:16120: bhūtāni viṣayastvaṃ hi tvamavyaktendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,234.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16123: tvaṃ vedī tvaṃ hare dīkṣā tvaṃ yūpastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16124: tvaṃ patnī tvaṃ puroḍāśastvaṃ śālā strukca tvaṃ stuvaḥ // GarP_1,234.33 //
GP12garup1_u:16125: grāvāṇaḥ sakalaṃ tvaṃ hi sadasyāstvaṃ sadākṣiṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16126: tvaṃ sūrpādistvaṃ ca brahmā musalolūkhale dhruvam // GarP_1,234.34 //
GP12garup1_u:16127: tvaṃ hotā yajamānastvaṃ tvaṃ dhānyaṃ paśuyājakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16132: tava rūpamidaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭyarthaṃ saṃprakāśitam // GarP_1,234.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16146: kṣantumarhasi tatsarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,234.44 //
GP12garup1_u:16147: na śaknomi vibho samyakkartuṃ pūjāṃ yathoditām /
GP12garup1_u:16150: divā rātrau ca sandhyāyāṃ sarvāvasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ // GarP_1,234.46 //
GP12garup1_u:16154: tathā prītirna ca dharmādikeṣu ca // GarP_1,234.47 //
GP12garup1_u:16156: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ karma svargamokṣādisādhanam // GarP_1,234.48 //
GP12garup1_u:16158: pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathā stotraṃ kaḥ śaknoti tavācyuta // GarP_1,234.49 //
GP12garup1_u:16159: stutaṃ tu pūjitaṃ me 'dya tatkṣamasva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:16161: stauhi viṣṇuṃ mune bhaktyā yadīcchasi paraṃ padam // GarP_1,234.50 //
GP12garup1_u:16162: stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti pūjākāle jagadghurum // GarP_1,234.51 //
GP12garup1_u:16164: anyo 'pi yo japedbhaktyā trisandhyaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,234.52 //
GP12garup1_u:16166: putrārtho labhate putrānbaddho mucyate bandhanāt // GarP_1,234.53 //
GP12garup1_u:16168: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ bhagyaṃ kīrti ca vindati // GarP_1,234.54 //
GP12garup1_u:16170: sa dhanyaḥ sarvavitprājñaḥsa sādhuḥ sarvakarmakṛt // GarP_1,234.55 //
GP12garup1_u:16172: asaṃbhāṣyā hi te sarve sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,234.56 //
GP12garup1_u:16174: na śuddhaṃ vidyate tasya mano vākca durātmanaḥ // GarP_1,234.57 //
GP12garup1_u:16180: sakalamunibhirādyaścintyate yo hi śuddho nikhilahṛdi niviṣṭo vetti yaḥ sarvasākṣī /
GP12garup1_u:16181: tamajamamṛtamīśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi bhayamaraṇavihīnaṃ nityamānandarūpam // GarP_1,234.60 //
GP12garup1_u:16182: nikhilabhuvana nāthaṃ śāśvataṃ suprasannaṃ tvativimalaviśuddhaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavapuṣpaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16183: sukhamuditasamastaṃ pūjayāmyātmabhāvaṃ viśatu hṛdayapadme sarvasākṣī cidātmā // GarP_1,234.61 //
GP12garup1_u:16185: tasmādvicintyaḥ parameśvaro 'sau vimuktikāmena nareṇa samyak // GarP_1,234.62 //
GP12garup1_u:16187: sañcintya viṣṇuṃ paramadvitīyaṃ kastatra yogī na laṃya prayāti // GarP_1,234.63 //
GP12garup1_u:16188: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ satataṃ manuṣyaḥ paṭhecca tadvatprayataḥ praśāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16189: sa dhūtapāpmā vitataprabhāvaḥ prayāti lokaṃ vitataṃ murāreḥ // GarP_1,234.64 //
GP12garup1_u:16190: yaḥ prārthayatyarthamaśeṣasaukhyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca tathaiva mokṣam /
GP12garup1_u:16191: sa sarvamutsṛjya paraṃ purāṇaṃ prayāti viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam // GarP_1,234.65 //
GP12garup1_u:16193: yo vāsudevaṃ vimalaṃ prapannaḥ sa mokṣamāpnoti vimuktasaṅgaḥ // GarP_1,234.66 //
GP12garup1_u:16194: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'cyutastotraṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16198: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviṣṇurityeva cintayan // GarP_1,235.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16199: sūrye hṛdvyomni vahnau ca jyotirekaṃ tridhā sthitam /
GP12garup1_u:16200: yathā sarpiḥ śīrasthaṃ gavāṃ na kurute balam // GarP_1,235.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16201: nirgataṃ karmasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ tāsāṃ mahā balam /
GP12garup1_u:16202: tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīrastho na karoti hitaṃ naṇām // GarP_1,235.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16207: lobho mohaḥ krodha etairyuktaḥ pāpaṃ naraścaret /
GP12garup1_u:16209: etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) /
GP12garup1_u:16210: paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā // GarP_1,235.7 //
GP12garup1_u:16214: satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā // GarP_1,235.9 //
GP12garup1_u:16218: bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ // GarP_1,235.11 //
GP12garup1_u:16222: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi /
GP12garup1_u:16223: yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate // GarP_1,235.14 //
GP12garup1_u:16224: jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā /
GP12garup1_u:16227: buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //
GP12garup1_u:16228: saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16233: puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //
GP12garup1_u:16235: karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16237: yadā yāti tadā jīvo yāti muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,235.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16239: dhyānaṃ samādhirityete ṣaḍ yogasya prasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,235.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16243: madhyo dvādaśamātrastu oṅkāraṃ satataṃ japet // GarP_1,235.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16244: vācake praṇave jñāte vācyaṃ brahma prasīdati /
GP12garup1_u:16250: sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,235.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16253: tasyaiva brahmaṇā proktaṃ dhyānaṃ dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16254: tuṣyeta niyato yuktaḥ samādhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate // GarP_1,235.28*1 //
GP12garup1_u:16255: dhyāyanna calate yasya manobhidhyāyato bhṛśam // GarP_1,235.29 //
GP12garup1_u:16257: dhyeye saktaṃ mano yasya dhyeyamevānupaśyati // GarP_1,235.30 //
GP12garup1_u:16259: dhyeye mano niścalatāṃ yāti dhyeyaṃ vicintayan // GarP_1,235.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16261: dhyeyameva hi sarvatra dhyātā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,235.32 //
GP12garup1_u:16269: sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ sthūlarūpaṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,235.36 //
GP12garup1_u:16271: na vinā paramātmānaṃ kiñcijjagati vidyate // GarP_1,235.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16273: oṅkāraṃ paramaṃ brahma dhyāyedabjasthitaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,235.38 //
GP12garup1_u:16275: hṛdi sañcintayetpūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya copari // GarP_1,235.39 //
GP12garup1_u:16279: jñānaṃ tu karṇikā tatra vijñānaṃ kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,235.41 //
GP12garup1_u:16281: karṇikāyāṃ sthitaṃ tatra jīvavanniścalaṃ vibhu // GarP_1,235.42 //
GP12garup1_u:16284: hariṃ saṃsthāpya dehābje dhyāyanyo gī ca bhaktibhāk /
GP12garup1_u:16289: jitendriyātmakaraṇo jñānadṛpto hi yo bhavet // GarP_1,235.46 //
GP12garup1_u:16295: sarvabhūteṣu kāruṇyaṃ vidveṣaṃ viṣayeṣu ca // GarP_1,235.49 //
GP12garup1_u:16297: indriyairindriyārthāṃstu na jānāti naro yadā // GarP_1,235.50 //
GP12garup1_u:16299: sarvavarṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt // GarP_1,235.51 //
GP12garup1_u:16300: dhyānāgninā ca medhāvī labhate paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:16307: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16318: atraivāntargataṃ sarvaṃ śāśvate nādvaye pade // GarP_1,236.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16322: so 'hamasmīti mokṣāya nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye // GarP_1,236.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16323: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ jñānānāṃ caiva sādhanam /
GP12garup1_u:16326: dvividhaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca // GarP_1,236.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16333: yadā sarve vimucyante kāmā yesyahṛdi sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16335: vyāpakatvātkathaṃ yāti ko yāti kva sa yāti ca /
GP12garup1_u:16342: yathā te priyātmā naḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā priyaḥ // GarP_1,236.16 //
GP12garup1_u:16343: bodhamārge yathā cittaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā mate /
GP12garup1_u:16344: sarvadā sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvasya ca mahāmune // GarP_1,236.17 //
GP12garup1_u:16346: jāgratsvapnaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ sauṣuptasukhameva ca // GarP_1,236.18 //
GP12garup1_u:16348: satyamastu tathā vāṇu aśarīraṃ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,236.19 //
GP12garup1_u:16349: nāsti cetsukhaduḥ khānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vedanaṃ katham /
GP12garup1_u:16350: sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet // GarP_1,236.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16352: satya jñānānanta bhinnaṃ syānnasatyaṃ jñānataḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,236.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16355: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ jñātvā tvakhilavidbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:16365: tathā hi rajjururagaḥ śuktiḥ kārajataṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:16374: ekaḥ satyaṃ tathā bhāgī vicāreṇa paraṃ mṛṣā // GarP_1,236.32 //
GP12garup1_u:16376: māyecchayā dvidhā sa syātpatiḥ patnī sukhaṃ jagat // GarP_1,236.33 //
GP12garup1_u:16382: yathā rathādayaḥ svapne santo naiva ca satyataḥ // GarP_1,236.36 //
GP12garup1_u:16383: tathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhūtāni na tu sannidhau /
GP12garup1_u:16384: dvairūpyaṃ māyayā yāti jāgratsvapnapadajña (kṣa) yoḥ // GarP_1,236.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16395: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ātmajñānasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16409: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśo ca kṣetrajñastāni paśyanti // GarP_1,237.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16410: yadā prakāśate hyātmā paṭe dīpo jvalanniva /
GP12garup1_u:16418: ahaṃ kāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāvapi /
GP12garup1_u:16419: prakṛtiṃ puruṣe sthāpya puruṣaṃ brahmaṇi nyaset // GarP_1,237.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16420: ahaṃ bahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate /
GP12garup1_u:16423: kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvānyo veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16425: jñānayajñasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣocśīm // GarP_1,237.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16426: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīmadbhagavadgītāsāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16433: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā // GarP_1,238.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16435: vidhinā yā bhaveddhiṃsā sā tvahiṃsā prakīrtitā // GarP_1,238.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16437: priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,238.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16452: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ proktaṃ padmamardhāsanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,238.11 //
GP12garup1_u:16461: padadvayārthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16475: aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam // GarP_1,239.9 //
GP12garup1_u:16477: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāravarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16480: sannapi brahma tasmātkhaṃ marutkhācca tato 'nalaḥ // GarP_1,239.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16482: tataḥ saptadaśaṃ liṅgaṃ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16484: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ syātpañca vāyavaḥ // GarP_1,239.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16486: manontaḥ karaṇaṃ dhīśca syānmanaḥ saṃśayātmakam // GarP_1,239.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16492: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryaṃ tatsthameva ca // GarP_1,239.7 //
GP12garup1_u:16494: tridhāhri paramātmasthaṃ śarīraṃ procyate budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16498: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīnāṃ sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,239.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16514: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo bhinno nāsti tatkāryatastathā // GarP_1,239.18 //
GP12garup1_u:16518: pṛthvyādhāraṃ vinā nāsti vinā nāsti ca tena sā // GarP_1,239.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16519: tejaśca vāyunā nāsti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi /
GP12garup1_u:16520: yadbrahmaṇā ca khaṃ nāsti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham // GarP_1,239.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16524: tattvaṃpadāntau śiṣṭau ca tatkāro brahmavācakaḥ // GarP_1,239.23 //
GP12garup1_u:16528: satyaṃ jñānamanataṃ hi tvamasīti śrutīritam // GarP_1,239.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16531: gītāsāror'junāyokto yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ // GarP_1,239.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16532: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāro nāmekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16536: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ rudra proktaṃ sāraṃ mayātava /
GP12garup1_u:16539: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādrudra sarvavitsa divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,240.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16541: iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ muktidaṃ śrutam /
GP12garup1_u:16545: mayāpi tubhyaṃ sūtena purāṇaṃ kathitaṃ param // GarP_1,240.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16547: viṣṇuḥ sāratamaṃprāha garuḍaṃ gāruḍaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,240.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16550: śaunaka pravaraṃ proktaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava // GarP_1,240.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16552: vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaśca purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:16554: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni tāni māṃ prāha vai śukaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16555: idaṃ tu gāruḍaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā te śaunakeritam // GarP_1,240.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16563: kṣattriyo kṣattriyasyāpi rakṣitā bhavatīha ca // GarP_1,240.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16566: anyasmai ca vadedvidvān brāhmaṇontarito ya di /
GP12garup1_u:16567: brāhmaṇāntaritai sarvaiḥ śrotavyaṃ gāruḍaṃ tvidama // GarP_1,240.14 //
GP12garup1_u:16569: gāruḍaṃ vasurājaśca śrutvā sarvamavāpa ha // GarP_1,240.15 //
GP12garup1_u:16579: na khādyau tau tvayānīcau caturbhujau ca pakṣipa? /
GP12garup1_u:16584: śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ // GarP_1,240.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16587: tvayā jitā raṇe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16588: āhṛtaṃ tatpurā somaṃ vāhniṃ nirvāpya kāśyape // GarP_1,240.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16589: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau /
GP12garup1_u:16590: tīkṣṇāgreṇa na sā bhaṅktvāvikravetau manohataḥ? // GarP_1,240.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16591: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītameva na bhaktitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16592: tena viṣṇordhvajasthānaṃ vāhanatvaṃ gato hyasi // GarP_1,240.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16593: tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāśca vañcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16594: jahāra cāmṛtaṃ pātraṃ śīghraṃ vai brahmasūdana // GarP_1,240.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16596: vinatā mocitā dāsyātkadvā pūrvajitā raṇe // GarP_1,240.28 //
GP12garup1_u:16597: uccaiḥ śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ityeva bhāṣate /
GP12garup1_u:16601: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadānītaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /
GP12garup1_u:16602: tadā tava suparṇoti nāma sthānaṃ jagattraye // GarP_1,240.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16608: taduktaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16611: yasyedaṃ vartate geha tasya sarvaṃ bhavediha // GarP_1,240.35 //
GP12garup1_u:16612: gāruḍaṃ yasya haste tu tasya hastagato nayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16615: putrārtho labhate putrān kāmārtho kāmamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16616: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ jayārtho labhate jayam /
GP12garup1_u:16618: vandhyāpi labhate puttraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim /
GP12garup1_u:16619: kṣemārtho labhate kṣemaṃ bogārtho bogamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.39 //
GP12garup1_u:16621: kāvyārtho ca kavitvaṃ ca sārārtho sāramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.40 //
GP12garup1_u:16623: idaṃ svastyayanaṃ dhanyaṃ gāruḍaṃ garuḍeritam // GarP_1,240.41 //
GP12garup1_u:16624: nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya ślokamekaṃ tu yaḥ paṭhet /
GP12garup1_u:16629: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
